Tamsalt takatalanit deg Temzikkent n Frankfurt
11 Tubeṛ 2007
Aṭas seg yimura yettarun s tespenyulit ay iYunzan (boycotter) timzikkent (foire) n wedlis tis 59 n Frankfurt
(deg Lalman), yerna aseggas-a, tamsalt takatalanit d nettat ay d-yerran lwelha n medden deg temzikkent n useggas-a, imi ay
d-texleq deg-s uguren.
Timzikkent (foire) n Frankfurt d nettat ay d timzikkent n wedlis (taktabt) tameqrant akk deg ddunit, maca aseggas-a,
kra kan n tsaetin uqbel ma teldi, wid ay tt-id-igan sḥassfen imi ay
... 
en yettarun s tespenyulit seg terbaet n Yikatalaniyen ara yettekkin deg temzikkent-a (foire), d acu kan,
deg wayyur n Yunyu ieeddan, asudu-a yeqqel deg wawal-is u yeqbel attekki-nsen, ladYa imi ay t-ttehmen belli d imsebḍayen
(séparatistes) ay t-iḥeṛsen akk-n ad yeg ay-a.
Maca amur ameqran deg Yikatalaniyen yettarun s tespenyulit, u gar-asen Carlos Ruiz Zafon (ay d-yuran Tili n waḍu), Javier Cercas (ay d-yuran Iserdasen n Salamine)
akk ed Eduardo Mendoza (ay d-yuran Tamdint n wid izaden [La vill
...
alunya deg temzikkent-a (foire) wuYur ara
d-asen azal n 7300 n yemttekkiyen seg 110 n tmura akk-n ad ssenzen idlisen-nsen.
Wid ay d-igan timzikkent-a (foire) la ttṛajun ad d-rzun fell-as azal n 300.000 n medden sya ar ass n lḥedd
(14 Tubeṛ).
Asselmed n tira d tYuri i wid ur neYri ara, adiwenni (dialogue) gar yidelsan akk ed tlelli n wawal d kra
seg temsal timeqranin ay d-xtaren i temzikkent-a tis 59 n Frankfurt.
Seg Dépêche de Kabylie, Lexmis 11 Tubeṛ 2007 – Uṭṭun
1632
Tasuqilt sYur Omar Mouffok

Ussan-a yezrin, yeɣli-d leḥzen di tɣiwant n Leɛǧiba mi yemmut yiwen n umezdaɛ i tenɣa tmacit. Amdan yeɛan 48 n yiseggasen di lɛemr-is yekker tafejrit iwakken ad iruḥ ad d-yeqḍu si Tubiret, imi tuɣ-it d ametjar n lxeḍra. Di tkerrust netta d mmi-s yesɛan azal n 18 n yiseggasen di lɛemr-is nwan ad zegren i ubrid n tmacint ur nesɛi ara aɛessas. Uqbel ad jbun, yiwet n tmacint i d-yekken si tmanaɣt n Lezzayer tejba-d fell-as am tlafsa, ur as-teǧǧi tagnit ad yexdem kra. Yessufeɣ tarwiḥt deg umḍiq, ma d mmi-s ssawḍen-t s lɛejlan ɣer sbiṭer n M’chedallah. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i ɣ-d-iwḍen, ilemẓi-agi iffeɣ si liḥala taweɛrant, tazmert-is tura ur tenṭir ara. Imi tawaɣit-a d tis 13 deg umkan-a, ffɣen-d imezdaɣ s reffu iwakken ad ssutren lɛessa i umkan-a. dɣa, mmugren aselway n tɣiwant d umḍebber n La Daira n Bechloul. Ɣer taggara, ufan tifrat i taluft-a imi llan ttawilat iwejden yakan. Kra n tsaɛtin kan, tamehla n usiweḍ n tmacinin tuzen-d 4 n yiɛessasen ara yilin i lebda deg umkan-a. S waya, ahat ad neɣsent twaɣiwin melba ccekk, imi d amkan ideg ttɛeddin yemdanen d yinelmaden.
M.Smail

Jeudi 17 juin 2021
Ildi-d ubrid ahrawan i tegrawla n talwit !
Tafrent n APN n 12/06 tefka-d abazin ur igguni yiwen, maca adabu yessen-as amek ad t-irwi akken ad iseddu tikerkas simmal.
Maca tella yiwet : yiwen ur yumin s wayen d-iffɣen seg uqelmun n système, am akken yiwen ur yumin ad d-yas azekka wayen ilhan sɣur yecriken n FLN-RND-MSP-Bina…
Ansi tufeg i ters (no comment).
Ass-a, uraren n udabu mačči d aɣbel n wegdud.
Ayen d-ibanen si tafrent-a (neɣ si war tafrent), yugar akk ayen nniḍen : ildi
... 
-inselmen (MSP, Binaa, Adala, …) tban-d tezmert-nsen (ɣas adabu yewwet ad tt-issemẓi) ; nwan tewweḍ-d tegnitt-nsen, ad kecmen agraw n APN d tirni, ad sersen iḍarren-nsen, syen d acrured, ad sbedden ‘’tagduda tinneslemt’’ (république islamique).
-
Imeṭṭurfan-inselmen i yudsen/iqerben FIS-Rachad, iffeɣ ubarud-nsen ; ur zmiren ad d-bedden deg ubrid,
-
Imeɣnasen n ikabaren n FLN, RND…, ass-a ur llin d imeɣnasen n tidett ; yal yiwen ikkat ad d-yawi amkan, ad igzer di tmurt am akken uɣen tanamit. Ansi
...
ufa ad issexreb.
Di tegnitt deg nella, qbel ad icudd tamurt udabu n ‘’Lezzayer taqburt’’, Tamurt n Leqbayel tezmer ad tili d tigemmi/foyer, d amkan anda zemren ad mlilen imeɣnasenn n yal tama. Mačči d ayen iffren ma yella d timlilit n wid d-ikkren s tiɣri n nnig 80 % n Izzayriyen. Di ɣect 1956, di tnemmast n times n ṭṭrad, usan-d si yal tama n tmurt ɣer uswir n Ifri-Uzellagen/congrès de la Soummam !
Abrid n tegrawla yeldi, ɣas yessawen, akken ad d-ilal ugraw ara ibeddlen udem n tmurt n Lezzayer.

Tuddsa Tamaḍlant n Tezmert tettwali d aken sya ar 2020, dduxxan ad yuɣal d ssebba tamenzut n tmettant akked ukrad, s uzal n 10 imelyan n yiseflan yal aseggas.
Duxxan ihi, ad d-yeglu s lmut ugar n waṭṭan n Sida, Lberd, inɣiman, laksidat n tkeryas akked yimenɣan.
Ass-a nettwali dduxxan d ccemma d ayen yeṭṭuqten di Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen, aya d ayen ara yeččaren sbiṭarat imi nettwali aṭṭanen ixabiten caeen ladɣa ttḥazen aṭas imeqranen i d-yeseeddan tallit di ccemma neɣ di dduxxan.
Awelleh akked useɛle
... 
en mliḥ acku d leqdic n tiddukliwin i iɣaben di tudrin-nneɣ s ssebba n ttawilat imi yettwakkes yidles n tdukliwin s ufraɣ n leerac rnu ɣer-s liḥala n yilmeẓyen ur nesei ula d akud i leqdic adelsan neɣ ametti sdat tudert yueren di Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen.
Lmulud Yunsi
Azul, tura ẓran akk medden: ddexxan d cemma ttḍurun vav-is, ula d win yettḥawalen iYisem= l’alcool, yettawi-as-d aṭṭan. Akken qqaren ddexxan-agi lemden-t leqvayel Yef irumyen asmi akken d-kecmen tamurt-nneY, nekk ccfiY-d i lggira-nni, u
...
urdan a tt-id-nelqeḍ, nettsiYi ula d iYeryunen ivawen i wakken ad neanned iserdas-nni. Ma d cemma Yef wakken i d-yenna Charle André Julien: tedda-d asmi d-tekcem tineslemt tamurt-nneY. Yiwen wergaz ikcem ar uxxam-is yettru-yas i tmeṭṭut, Yef wayen iḥellen d wayen iḥermen iwumi yesla ar ccix lğamee : i nekk tura, amek ara qevleY ad ttuY ansayen d-ğgan imezwura-inu! amek i kečč yella wacu n wawal i s-terriḍ iwakken ad tḥuddeḍ Yef wayla-k neY ulac? awah ulac! ihi yeččur uqemmuc-ik d cemma ay argaz!

Yessufeɣ-d umeɣnuj Arifi Ɛali Ajwaw ijjen uvidyu-klip yegga-as i yisem « Ih ya Nnaḍur ». Ad yili d ijjen tmerniwt tecna i arripirṭwar n uɣennij Arifi. Aɣennij-a wanita issawal x twengimin i yeksi umeɣnuj x Nnaḍur d ledcur-nnes d imukan i dag-s. Ixedm-it s ijjen tebridt tecna s waṭṭas. Abidyu-klip-a ittwaffeɣ-d di Fransa issufeɣ-it-id Ɛebdelmalik Bufarit.
A neqqim di Fransa, artista Arifi Jawad Ttanuti, la d netta issufeɣ-d ijjen uɣennij. Issers-it di YouTube iḍennaḍ n 17 zi Yennayer. Aɣennij-a la d netta issawal uḥuyyez-nneɣ i temẓi d ussan i yeɛdan. Jawad Yenna « Merra idneɣ dag-neɣ ijjen uɣezdis n tnusṭaljit, hiwa awi-d ad t-nɣennej… »

LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Yezmel uselway n tegduda, Mass Abdelmadjid Tebboune, ass n uynas, tanaḍt taselwayant yerzan aseɣnew n Usanay Aɣelnaw n Tmetti Taɣarimt.
MSETƔANEM – Asemtar n uselway n Tegduda yettwakelfen s umussu addukklan akked umɣiwan aɣelnaw awerdan Nazih Berramdane yenna-d ass usḍisas (ssebt) deg Msetɣanem dakken timetti taɣarimt tefri s yisrusen i la tettqabal Lezzayer ladɣa deg takkayt-a tanimirt tewǧed akken ad tqabel.
LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Yemmuger uselway n tegduda, Mass Abdelmadjid 
... 
sumren deg ukatar n ucegger n tmenḍawt yerzan tuɣdaḍin n ugman-a d isumren ireslanen yernu, imi, ɣef leḥsab n tmenḍawt-a, ad yeqqel ugman-a yetturar tamlilt n usefqed deffir ma yella, naqal, d agman kan n uciweṛ.
ƐIN DDEFLA – Yenna-d usemtar n uselway n tegduda d-yelhan s umussu aduklan d umɣiwan aɣelnaw deg uzɣar, Nazih Berramdane, ass n usiḍyas deg Ɛin Ddefla, dakken timetti taɣarimt deg Lezzayer tamaynut ur telli ara d tanmezgayt n yisuda n uwanak wanag yessefk ad tili d asemmad n tsuda-a i u
...
t deg unegmu ».
LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Caren-d, ass n uynas (letniyen) deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, yiwet n tallunt n usemyuddes gar mennaw n tiddukliwin d tuddsiwin tiɣelnawin, d tin umi semman Aẓeḍḍa n « Uɣtas d Aɣtas-nnek ».
LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Afetraw n « Iceqfan n Tirga » n Bahia Bencheikh Lefgoun, ay d-yesskanayen amecwaṛ n kra n yimeggiyen n tmetti taɣarimt d taggiwin n yimeɣnasen n yimussa n uccetki seg 2011, iɛedda-d ass n ukwas (lexmis) deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, yernu d win ay walan aṭas n medden.

Awǧez
Awseǧ neɣ Anecfal (Assaɣ ussnan: Lycium barbarum) d yiwet n temdint i d-ittemɣayen deg yiẓra d yideggan iɣuraren acku ur tserri ara aṭas n wegri d waman. Talmest-a teṭṭafar tawsit n uwseǧ deg twacult n teɣsilant.

Idrnan
Anmuggar n Idrnan iga yan unsay azayku g umzruy n idrarn n igizuln, ar sis sfuglunt kigan n tqbilin g waṭlas amẓyan: ɣ iga ida ultit (s tqbilin nns s kṛaḍt: ida ggʷarsmukt, ida usmlal d ida ubɛqqil), Tafrawt, Ayt Ṣwab, Isagn, Ida Ugnidif... atg[1]. Ar ittili unmuggar f tɣzi n kṛaḍ n wayyurn imzwura g usggʷas amaziɣ (innayr, bṛayṛ d maṛṣ), ar ittkka kṛaḍ n wussan g ku usun (akwas, asimwas d uṣiḍyas).
Assaɣ n unmuggar[ssnfl | Snfl asagm]
Anmuggar ad ila ism n idrnan, taguri ad tga asugt, as
... 
gurma... ayad iẓḍaṛ ad ifl iḍiṣ nns f unsay ad, ig t d wayda amazar.[2]
Acku ar nttafa g insayn n wudayn yat tfugla mi ttinin "ḥanuka"[3] tafugla n tifawin ittkkan tam n wussan g ttilint tiram yurfn g uzatim s tugt zun d idrnan s wanawn nnsn... ig darsn ula nttni tafugla n tumrt d usfuglu.

Tluɣ tegnawt aṭas tagara n yimalas-agi, ageffur yewwten d icercuren, iḍ yezrin, yessuzel iɣezran n tmurt n yeqbayliyen. Rnu ɣer ugeffur-a , aḍu qqessiḥen d usemmiḍ d wagu i d-yessersen ṭṭlam. Ar tura urɛad yekkat, izenqan xlan, imdanen berken merra deg yexxamen.
Lezzayer ɣas d tamurt n lgaz, Tamurt n Yeqbayliyen ur tt-id-yewwiḍ ara, ladɣa deg tudrin anda i igezzem usemmiḍ. Imdanen wid yesean cwiṭ ttaɣen-d lmazut neɣ ttsiɣen s trisiti, ma d tuget tagellilt tzeddem-d isɣaren.
Wissen melmi ara tekfu fella-sen liḥala ideg ttidiren?

Tiyeggert
Tiyeggert (Asget: Tiyeggirin) deg yimɣi d agman itteffren učči d waman akken i tegber seg waṭas n taṭṭiwin i d-issufuɣen tagrawt n yikebbiben deg tmiṭṭ n yimɣi yakk d yiferran imeskebren am tbaṭaṭat.[1] Tiyeggert tga d ageṭṭum amɣaw asneflan iteddmen ikebbiben ara ad yemɣin i wakken ad fkenn imɣan d imaynuten.
Tiyeggirin ttusexedmen-tt deg yimɣi am wallal n usegrew d tuffra n imeččiyen, anda i ttakent tagnit i yimɣan i wakken ad qqimen ddren deg talliyin n tsegrest neɣ n unaɣur, anda i tettwasexdem tiyeggert deg talliyin-nni i wakken ad tfares tafasa d imeččiyen i tulsa n wemɣay deg tsemhuyt n gemmu i d-iteddun, neɣ d tarrayt i wemyaraw arzufan
Tiyeggirin tigeṭmanin ttwasilɣent-d seg yiweggiren (iẓuran ddaw n wakal) neɣ d tersemt (iẓuran imraraden sufell n wakal).

Max allig ar zzmawnt tirra s tmazight?
G imagradn ad izrin nsawl xf wanwn n tirra lli issutuln xf tmazight.
– Anaw lli fllas yuran xf ad tt issimzi, iluh s watig ns, zund aylli uran tugtt n inmzruyn lli uranin s taorabt g zik d will nit sul ittaran ass ad nit.
– Anaw lli yuran s tmazight llig as d ur ikki mani, tga dars ghas imiss n kra yadn: zund aylli uran imssann n lislam, Imzabn g Dzayr, d Ibadiyn n udrar n infusn g libya, d dar waggagn n sus zund awzal, d gw uhudig.(lhudaygi)
– Anaw lli fll
... 
s tutlayt tamazight,mac adriz ns ixatr, izmr ad isndudi, igh akw ur irzi kra n itabutn kkan tt inn gan tisiwagh(entraves)dar imazighn, ur tn ujjin ad akzn atig lli illan dar tutlayt nsn, mk lli iga yat tskslt(fenétre) g ar d kccmn imagzarn ar ttinin: ma rad nskar s yat tantala lli ur ittyaran?!
Tizi lli g ar ittara ufgan s wawal ns ar ittgga bzziz xf wayad ad as ig izrkki(respect) izmr ad ighama iga afna ns, mac ur d llig drs imzzi, mac llig t iksud, ur yufi ad t yaki!
Tirra s tmazight skrnt yat
...
ad inigh mas d tutlayt Tamazight tsghawsa bahra i tirra s ils ns acku ur d ghar ad nara f tmazight ad igan intti, macc ad nara f tmazight s tmazight ad bahra ifulkin ig intti imqqurn.
macc tutlayt tamazight ixssa tt ad tg yat tutlayt igan yat lli Zdargh ad ghrgh nkki gh souss, ighr tt urifi ula aqbayli ula htta amazigh n libya, afad ad yili mkad ixssa yagh tugt n imawaln gh kraygat igr: taskla, tussna, aswingm, taflsaft…
tanmirt.
azul fllak a ssi mummad
ar k nttalgh nals nalgh k f tifawin ad nek

Lbusta n tmurt n Kanada d ttin i d-yesuffYen assa, tamber amaynut ilmend n usfugel s ixef ussegass n imaziYen 2971. d iklan (dessin), n Asma 11 n iseggasen, n tmurt n Lmeṛṛuk, anida tura : »Happy Amazigh new year ».
Mačči tikelt tamenzut dgi ad tesfugel tmurt n Kanada, s yixef n ussegass amaziY imi ilindi 2019, texdem tamber i yiwen usečču amaziY n Libya. D iklan yexdem umeYnas amuqran MadYis Madi.
Tamber-agi zemren medden ad cegɛen-yes tibratin daxel n Kanada uk berra n tmurt.
asagem : Vava Innova.

Aseggʷas-a mmuten aṭṭas n lḥujjaj imselmen i iruḥen ɣer Mekka maḥend ad kemmlen ijjen tsenyant zi tsenyanin n ddin-nnsen.
Lḥejj, d ijjen zeg igrawen imeqqranen n yewdan deg umaḍal, ttasen-d imelyunen n yewdan ɣer Ssaɛudiya Taɛrabt.
Ikemmel lḥejj n useggʷas n 2024 di 19 yunyu, maca yejj-d awern-as aṭṭas n uxeyyeq.
Tenna xinsiya n tɣemsa AFP belli mmuten din 922 n yewdan, azgen ameqqran mmuten s leḥmu i yuɛlan i ttuɣa ittakkʷaḍen ca n 50°C.
Xelli amenni, BBC wer tiwiḍ ca ad tdettet zi nnumru-ya ma
... 
layin mxumblent kter”. D aya i d-yenna Carl-Friedrich Schleussner, i yellan d akimlatulug di Climate Analytics ɣer Reuters.
Tirezzutin-nnes qqarent belli ageɛɛed n leḥmu s 1,5°C deg umaḍal s uzday aked uswir i ttuɣa yellan qbel i usenneɛ, s uyenni bnadem izemmer ad t-tewwet tfuct s xemsa n twalatin kter.
Qqaren imussnawen ɛawed aqqa leḥmu izemmer ad igeɛɛed ca n 1,5°C am zi ssa d 2020, ataf ad yejj lḥijj yeqseḥ aṭṭas.
Imxumbal n ddḥas d buxraru
Aṭṭas n yewdan nnan-d belli asugur aɛeffan n tmurt 
...
n n lḥejj”. D aya yenna Mustolih Siradj, ameqqran n wegraw anamur ayndunisi n Lḥijj d Lɛumra.
“Mamec mma yegga ca n ijjen wer ɣer-s bu visa n lḥejj, wer t-nettejji ca, ittxiss-as ad yedwel ɣer tmurt-nnes”. D aya i yenna i BBC Saad Al Qurashi.
Iwessura d imehlak
Aṭṭas n lḥujjaj ttraḥen ɣer lḥijj ar ameggaru n tudert-nnsen, iwdan ttuɣa ssitimen ad mmten amen ttḥijjan.
Tamḍelt n Al Baqi, di tmurt tasaɛudit, i ttuɣa yegga nnabi Muḥemmed, ta d ijjen temḍelt i yettwaqeddsen aṭṭas di leɛwayed imselmen.

Inecraf i d-yudfen ḍ imaynuten ra d nitni usin-d xwan. War ɣar-sen walu, iqqess-iten buheyyuf jar kumisarya d lmeḥkama. D webrid ɣar ubniq. Ursuḍen s ccyaḍ n tidi. Rezzun ad ccen, ad serḍen, ad keyyfen, ad ṭṭṣen…
Ucin-asen-d tnayen n rekraci i ijjen. Bdan eeddren-tent, neccin nettemsiwza akid-sen kur ijjen iṭṭef raq-nnes. Newc-asen min xaf-neɣ iceṭṭen n weɣrum d reeḍes ccin-t yin idjuzen. Newc-asen tiẓra-nni n sabun ad zzay-sent ssirden waxxa tuɣa nḥekk zzay-sent irem-nneɣ.
Maca garru mani ig idja marra yin itkeyyafen qqimen ḍi reɣben nnes. Nessawar nḍeḥḥec ḥend ad ttun, ad nettu mani i nedja. Ufiɣ ixf-inu ittwarsay ad ggeɣ ktar zi tzemmar. Aḍ iniɣ tiḥuja, ad ɣareɣ tiqessisin, ad ɣennjeɣ, aḍ ɣareɣ lquran, ad asen- ssiwreɣ xef umezruy. Mayemmi lla nec ufiɣ-as? Xarrseɣ aked ixf-inu, ufiɣ d wa d raq, d wa d akud mani ɣa ssiwḍeɣ tabrat, ḍa i ɣa ssiwreɣ xef tɣawsa. Marra ucin-ayi amejjun marra qqaren-ayi areni-d. Marra ttseqsan-ayi xef tɣawsiwin d tɣensa axmi nitni zi ca n tmurt nneɣni. Illa ca n drus zzay-sen ssnen maca sqaren.
Maca aṭṭas i ila weddaren deg iyyaren n tudart: Ha yin ila iznuzan kukayin d teḥcict d tseswin. Ha yin i tuɣa ittemsazzaren xf ureqquz n weɣrum jar ddiwana d reswaq d rxedmet di tebḥiren d rebni. Ha yin ig i sseeddun tudert-nsen xef waman deg wayel tḥedjaqen-d iserman war ssinen min ittemsaren di tudart. Da i ssneɣ ila aydud war ɣar-s tewwiḍ tussna ura d aneɣmis n tmunt. Nnhar ɣar-s ɣa yaweḍ ad igg ca.

Iswiyen n Temsirt
Aḥelles n yimeqranen n tmezdayt, imḍebbren n trebbuyae n yinelmaden d imeksawen ɣef umkan isean deg useddu n tmezdayt d ueiwen-nsen akken ad weneen Tiẓwarin-nsen s imenzayen isemras* (pratiques) ara yettuṭebqen di leqdic-nsen, akken illa umedya n “yimḍebber-aqeddac” .
Tarudemt n temsirt (Description du cours)
Tamsirt-a tlemmes ɣef tisraḍ (caractéristiques) ɣef useddu n tidet n tmezdayt di rruḥ. Di tazwara, ad isenqed udmawanen n Tira i yellan d imḍebbren, am Musa, Dawed, Yasue 
... 
anelmad….
- Ad iẓer d acu i d tamlilt n yimeqranen d imeiwnen, akked tiɣariwin-nsen d tmasitin-nsen.
- Ad issiweḍ, ɣer taggara, ad ieqel tukciwin-is am yimḍebber, d ameksa neɣ d aselmad.
- Ad izmir ad isrudem akk iɣaniben n useddu n tmezdayt wad ieqel imihiyen n useddu amdabu (autoritaire)..
Ṭṭbiea : Ɣer Taggara n temsirt, Anelmad ilaq:
- Ad yeg alfad iṣṣeḥḥan akken ad iseddu s leqdic: ad iqdec ɣef tfekka n Lmasiḥ s wannuz d leqdasa s tukciwin d tzemmar i as-d-ifka Yillu.
- Ad yeg azal i tdukkli
...
 yiwen ad innekmal di tudert-is Tiɣri n Yillu.
- Ad ifhem imenzayen n lsas n ferru n tilla yerna ad iwjed akken ad isnes akken iwata tugrint (discipline) n tmezdayt.
- Ad yizmir ad iseddu leibada, ad ibeccer izen neɣ ttebcira tamecṭuḥt ( 15 n ddqayeq) yerna ad iwelleh tazrewt neɣ leqraya n Tira Iqedsen.
- Ad yizmir ad d-yeg tazmamt n tedrimt wad istkellef s temsal timecṭaḥ n tedrimt di tmezdayt.
- Ad iwjed ad d-yeg iswiyen d tsuddest i gemmu n tmezdayt-is s wayen illan d tiɣbula iwejden d umatu.

Asberyun
Asberyun neɣ Aberyun (Assaɣ ussnan: Lacerta viridis), (yettwassen daɣen s: Amulab maca awal-a yekka-d seg Teɛrabt سحلية المولاب) d Talmest n izermummuyen yeṭṭafaren tafesna n tmeskebrin deg wesmil n temraradin.
Timellalin[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Tawtemt n usberyun tessrusay gar n 8 ar 16 n tmellalit, Teggar-itent s ddaw n wakal.
Aglam[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Tafekka n tewtemt tettili gar n 32 ar 36 cm, S wakka ad tugar awtem iy meẓẓeyen fell-as.
Idgan n tudert[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Asberyun yettidir deg Turuft d ugafa n Tefriqt anda yettili unezwu imnummsen.

Ca n merrat ittawi-ayi-d Rebbi ila bnadem itteddren di Lmuɣrib niɣ timura i dags-irewsen ixess-as ad yurja aṭṭas. Bnadem maḥend ad yenjem zi tubberwiyt-a d tubberkent-a i di nella, ixess-as ad yurja, ad yurja Tadimukratit, tilelli, ad issers leɛwin di tarut-nnes.
Izlawiyen d imariten d yenni ttuɣa itturjan aṭṭas. Isuryaliyen di Fransa bedden-as i ssistim ampiryali d iɣes n tmijja. Ad tettafed André Breton d netta ittari deg isiwaḍ di lbiran n Paris, ittemsazzal kunṭra ijjen ssistim iḥerri bnadem
... 
 ig immut, Lorca i zzuɣaren ɣer ijjen wemkan wer t-nessin, qeḍwen-as filu n buḥbel. Wer nessin la d amḍel-nnes ad x-as nessers nnwac d neccin nttraḥ ad nẓur, Granda, Granada-nnes.
Raḥ x-as amenni aked Pablo Neruda d netta iwesseq x Iɛeskriyen n Pinochet i d-yusin ɣer taddart-nnes. Aked Nazim Ḥikmet Aturki, i yessnen leḥbusat n Turkiyya ijjen ijjen, isseɛda tudert-nnes d netta d aḍlib, d ametluɛ zi tmurt ɣer tenniḍen d netta ikessi akid-s tumezt n ucal n Turkiyya d waṭṭas n turjiwin. Aked Dustyuv
...
, Azlawi la d netta mli wer itturji tili yedwel am netta am ḥedd nniḍen.
izlawiyen iderrɛen i Tmarksit, Tcuyuɛit, Tasuryalit, Tarumansit.. Maɣer ? Minzi tturjan bnadem. Rezzun ad d-rren i bnadem tabenadmit-nnes. Ad kid-s bedden, ad as-wcen lḥeqq-nnes. S uya, ay aytma, itteqqes uzellif, xmi i nettaf ca n ijjen, nḥesseb-it x jjmaɛet n yen itturjan, ad isettef ixef-nnes di jjihet nneɣni.
Amek qqaren Irifiyen a beɛda ini lḥeqq di baba-k trewwḥed ɣer-s.

Da Caɛvan, d argaz ḥemlen warraw n taddart-is. Ḥemlent imi yennecraḥ. Ɣas akken deqs i d-yeṭṭef seg insayen iqbuṛen (anciennes traditions) n tmurt, acu kan hraw wul-is. Da Caɛvan yewi-d tameṭṭut i mmi-s Yugurten semmus (5) n iseggasen aya. Tislit-is qarren-as Tafrara.
Ass-mi d-wweḍ Tafrara s axxam, tegdeh aṭas imi ula d yiwen deg uxxam n wergaz-is ur yeqqin ar uẓeṭṭa Internet (réseau). Nettat teɣra taneflit Web (Développement Web). Deqs i tesnefli (développer) n ifecka (outils) Web s useqdec n t
... 
wiɣ-d agerruj i mmi. Ihi ula deg taddart, tilawin akk sawalen-as Lala Tafrara imi ttqadaren-tt aṭas.
Seg ass-mi d-kcem Tafrara ar taddart, tudert n imdanen tbeddel.
Tafrar tuɣal d tanedbalt n tutlayt Taqbaylit deg deqs n isenfaṛen deg Web. Tessuqul, tessidig s tutlayt-is: Taqbaylit.
Tafrara tseqdac deqs n wanawen (types) n ifecka n tsuqilt. Ifecka n tsuqil srid deg Web, neɣ ifecka idiganen (locaux).
Deg tazwara, Tafrara tseqdec asmel Tansifex. Asmel-agi, d anagraw n usefrek n tsuqilt (Système de
...
gestion de messages), ifecka n tunigin (outils de navigation), ifecka n usefrek n yeḍrisen (outils de gestion de textes), ifecka n usefrek n tezmilin (outils de gestion de notes),..atg.
Tafrar thegg-ad meṛṛa allalen-agi. Yerna deqs seg imezdaɣ n taddart-is mudden-as-d afus. Ur teqqim ara kan din. Tafrara tessaram ahat yiwen n was, aselkim meṛṛa ad ittusefrak s Teqbaylit. Tutlayt-is tayematt.
Ur d-muddeɣ ara isem n taddart n Tafrara. Taddart-is teẓram-tt akk. Qqaren-as Taqbaylit.
Muhend Belqasem.

Iberreḥ-d ussan-a yezrin Uxxam n teẓrigin Imru s ttawil n Facebook s tuffɣa n udlis amaynu n tselmadt Katia Benazzouz. D adlis yettwazuzzren akka tura deg waṭas n tnedlisin n Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen. Tefka-as tmeskart azwel : « Amyag deg Teqbaylit -Tasnalɣa- » deg uḥric-ines amezwaru. Ma d ssuma-s, ad d-yesqam s 450 n yidinaṛen.
Adlis-agi tura-t-id massa Benɛezzuz i yiswiren akk n tɣuri. Seg umenzu ɣer uneggaru. Ddant-d deg-s yiluɣma d temsirin s wudem fessusen.

Katia Benazzouz, d 
... 
 terna-d agerdas n nnig turagt (Magister) deg tesnilest n tmaziɣt deg 2013.
Seg useggag n 2014 ar ass-a nqeddec d taselmadt deg tesdawit n Ɛebdeṛeḥman Umira n Bgayet. Akka tur tettkemmil Duktura-ines. Tessuffeɣ-d yakan adlis-ines amezwaru deg useggas n 201, tefka-as azwel : Asezwer deg tmaziɣt – Taqbaylit – Aḥerfi d wuzmir.
Awal-is ɣef udlis ( n tmesekart)
Leqdic-a, nebɣa ad yili d ttawil i usifses n uselmed akked ulmad n tesnalɣa n umyag deg tmaziɣt. Гef waya i aɣ-d-tusa tikti n usizreg-is, i w
...
yag, gar-asent :
- D acu i d amyag (aḥerfi d usuddim).
- D acu-tent tecraḍ-is.
- D acu-tent taggayin n yimyagen i yellan.
- D acu-tent tmeẓra i yellan.
- Amek i tettili tseftit n yimyagen.
- Amḍan n yifeggagen n yimyagen.

Zyada ɣef temsirin ara tafem deg udlis-a n yiswiren akken ma llan, ad tafem daɣen iluɣma i yal tamsirt. S yes-sen, ad yeɛreḍ unelmad ad yeskazel timussniwin i d-yelmed deg temsirt. Ad yexdem asnas i wayen i d-yefhem, ad iẓer ma yegza tamsirt akken iwata.

lhmzo timllalin
Iruh uryaz si taddart r taido a Itnadi axddim. Iwdo, Iskra as jivn atmu Izdq diis, di’ass Ifdtr r vid it Isxdamn, tamddit Itavi as bab utmu imnsi. jal imnsi as Isddu tamllalt. Eddan tlata ‘ajurn Ibqa uxddam ad Iruh r taddart is ad Irzu f imavlan is. Isufq as-d bab utmu tafaturt n tnzduqt d imnsitn.
Ihsb as achal tmllalin i Icca, Iya lhsab achal n ifrax i-d Ifrurxn siisnt imr urtnt Icci uxddam, achal -d Iwi diisn di suqo mi Wdon d ijuzado anctilatn… Tcuff tfaturt anct ujddid. Inna as uxddam :
– tafaturt am ta urs Zmirq ara.
Isavdo it vinna r cre. axddam Iuyad, Izora amqbun ma Ikcm cre a-d Iffq siin Imuqbn uyar n zik. Iruh s amqar azmni Imla as tadiant, amqar Idobbr fllas. dqa siin i Idtf abrid s aqam n cre. Iwdo, Ibdd a Isll i vin Ictkan fllas mi Iteavad lhsab n’ain Ixsr di tmllalin Imccon di imnsitn. ntta Isusm kan. Izzi-d qurs lgug :
– ? acu Tnnido a lflani. tafaturt Neavd as lhsab Nufato Tsohha. ? ad Txllsdo i uryaz ain Tcoido nq ad Tkcmdo lhbs. Xtir.
Inna as uxddam :
– asourdi ur Seiq ara, maca qobl ad Kcmq lhbs Seiq cidt n cql at Xdmq. ur Tedtilq ara.
– ? acu n cql i Tseido.
– Goiq-n tuyi n lhmzo a Ttwa, mi Iwa lhmzo at Zzouq, mi t Zzoiq ad Ruhq r lhbs s udoar iu. ur Rwlq ara.
Inna as lgug :
– ?? ad Tzzoudo lhmzo Iwan.
– at Zzouq.
– Xzu cidtan a lflani, ur Imqoi ara lhmzo Iwan.
– di tmurt di Tfruruxnt tmllalin Iwan, Imqoi lhmzo Iwan.

Iɛazzugen (TAMURT) – Ruḥeɣ iḍelli ɣer Iɛazzugen akken ad d-xedmeɣ lecɣal-iw. D acu i yiswehmen imi ufiɣ yiwet n tegbliwt tessutur deg tlemmast n webrid, mmi-s d amectuḥ, teṭṭef-it deg irebbi-s.
Afus-is izga yeẓẓel ar imessebriden iqbayliyen akken as-id-fken kra n lwaɛda. Mi d-ɛeddaɣ deg uzniq nni, akken i d-wwḍeɣ ɣer tama-s, teẓẓel-d afus-is u tehder iyi-d s tegnawit (darja ines), akken as fkeɣ kra n tṣurddit.
Nekk, suɣeɣ fell-as, nniɣ-as: « Meslay s teqbaylit a tinat. Tessutureḍ
yernu tugiḍ ad thedreḍ tutlayt nneɣ » ? Ilaq am ad tfehmeḍ, aqli kem di
tmurt taqbaylit. Yiwet nniḍen tkeččem ɣer yiwet n tḥunutt akken ad
tessuter ula d nettat, tawaɣit n uqbayli, ttaken-asent idrimen u
heddren-asent meṛṛa s taɛrabt nsent.
Amek ar d-akwin iqfayliyen i yugin ad d-akwin si meɣrud n ddin ineslem i ten-irran d aklan n waɛraben izayriyen.
Anzi n wass-a n teqbaylit « Win ik-ibeddlen s yibiw, kečč beddel-it s yilmec-is ».

Aɣewweɣ n imeḥḍaren
Aɣewweɣ n imeḥḍaren -Wis 2
Aɣewweɣ ixarref, taǧest tendeř, urar iqḍa maca ibeɛɛac ɛad aqa yen farnen imeḥḍaren zi tudrin, zi řeqhawi, zeg ibriden. Wenni i ɣa ɛecqen ad t ksin, ad t xemřen. Ameḥḍar nni issens di texxamt jar wamẓiwen, ifaq-d x tɣuyyit, yarzem tiṭṭawin nnes itwařa ijj isɣuyyu, itekkʷar, arriḥet n crab tticc-d zzayes, tiɣmas war ǧint…ixzar umeḥḍar deg inni i das d inḍen yufa netta i daysen d ameẓyan. Ikkes tisira, arriḥet n yiřef.. ya lullu…!! issummet tisira, uc
... 
nes, igga ad iḍfar ijj n tebrit, mara yexs ad iffeɣ zi tewwart tameqqrant, min ɣa yini řexxu ixeṣṣ ad as iɛawed tiwecca farwicca, aqa ussan d iziraren…” Ameḥḍar idweř as uzeǧif itfewwar, …mařa nniɣ asen aqa “arziɣ ijj n ṭṭumubin, ad ayi inin aqa tarzid tnayen, mařa nniɣ asen aqa marzeɣ i yijj n ssimi, ad ayi inin tmarzed i ɛecra”….uca řuḥ xafes am nni…am itxarreṣ di min i ɣa yini, ixzar ɣar ufus nnes yufa garru nni iqḍa. war issin mammec igga iswi t, ixzar-d dayes ijj n ubeɛɛuc inna as: “řexxu, 
...
ř ijj min i das iqqar, ssenni ggin as min i ɣa yecc, řexxu rwacun imun, marra tfarḥ. Ƴar uneggar, iruḥ ɣar wexxam nnes, yudef di tassut, igga yiḍeṣ n txancet. Ƴar tuffut, ifaq-d, issij ɣar barra, iɣzar n dcar iḥmeř, ass ignu, yisi tiṭṭawin nnes ɣar ujenna uca ibda itxarreṣ di temzida, di texxamt, di řmexzen, ssenni uca inna deg uř nnes:
“ Min ɣa teqqim tudart ɛaad teǧa, taryazt ixeṣṣ ad teqqim řebda teddar, s weẓru, s uɣewweɣ, s minzi mma.”

mamec iourac n wafradv dv cum id itafagh s basuya-ya id yismunan marra iklusay ibaoac, ejjant attas imazdvagh n Nadvur advkabaryan x manaya armi tvadvwar tvandint amcnwa ca n tzubact
zzatv i manaya kkaran imazdvagh n Nadvur s twiza jarasen bac adv snaqsan dg idvurar n bac war itjiyif tvacri dvg ibridvan n tandint
Amxumber n wafradv i yuguran yitmarni di Nadvur ghar warni ma war iwidvan imdvabarn n baladiya advafan ca n wufugh i manaya, s wattas xmini tadvfan ixadamen n tazdvugi d ca n waHran mamec egin assa-a balal. s kurpa n imxuber ghar sen akidv AVERDA: i yitklafan s tvazdvugi n Nadvur

Aṭlas ameqqran
Aṭlas ameqran neɣ Adrar n Dren (s Tsusit) d amur afellay n tezrart n idurar n Aṭlas deg umeṛṛuk tbeddu seg yiri n ugaraw anaṭlas deg teftisin n Agadir deg unẓul utrim alamma d umurakuc, Isek (Taqacuct) yeflalen yakk deg tezrart-a d isek n tugg kal s waddud n 4165 m, Tazrart-a tettwagzem ar snat n tkura yebṭan gar-asent deg usaka n Tilwin, Dɣa d takura tutrimt (n umalu) i yeflalen ɣef tkura tagmudant (n usamar), Tazrart-a tla azal meqqren deg unezwi imi tgezzem tagelda n Umeṛṛuk ar snat n tamiwin tinezwayin (Anezwu aneẓraf deg usamar, d unezwu amnummsan deg umalu)

Imaziɣen iy zedɣen idurar-a ssemman-asen Adrar n Dren acku gan d aɣbalu n waman id yettaken tudert

Ahaggar
Idurar n Ahaggar (s tfinaɣ: ⴰⴱⴴⴴⴰⵔ) d yiwen azrar n idurar i d-ezgan di tlemmast n [[Aneẓč Uneẓruf Ameqran|Uneẓruf Ameqqran]] swaswa deg unẓul asemran n tmurt n Lezzayer. Tajumma-ines tessaweḍ ɣer 550.000 km² (ayen yegdan ⅕ n tjumma tummidt n Lezzayer), yerna yeẓẓel ɣef usaneṭ n uxenẓir i d-t-ibeṭṭun ɣef ugafa.
Isem[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Imucaɣ neɣ Imajeɣen (Imaziɣen n Uhaggar) ssawalen i yidurar-nni (Idurar Uhaggar), D isem i d-yekkan seg wawal Ahaggar (asget: Ihaggaren) i wumi qqaren Ihaggaren (Inublen/Ccerfa) gar Imucaɣ n temnaṭ-a.
Tarakalt[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Tamnaṭ tamedrart n Uhaggar ɣur-es tajumma azal n 540 000 km2, ugar tin n Fransa. Taqacuct n yidurar-a tella d Tahat, deg 3004 lmitrat af yilel.

Tafada tamaziɣt, d ayen i d-yennulfan deg useggas n 1980 sɣur umeɣnas acawi Amar Negadi i yettwassnen s yisem Amar Acawi. Yella umeɣnas-agi i ilulen deg usegas n 1943 deg Tbaten, deg Ugraw n Yimaziɣen (Académie Berbère) deg tmurt n Fransa. Yeqdec deg-s kra n lweqt kan deg yiseggsen-nni 1970. I wakken ad yefk izamulen i umennuɣ d leqdic ɣef tmaziɣt, ixemmen ad yesnulfu tafada n yimaziɣen imi iwala tella tfada n yimasiḥen akked tin n yinselmen. Ihi, inuda acḥal d aseggas i wakken ad d-yaf ansi ara t-yebdu. Yuɣal, yefra-tt d rray-is, u yewwi nnican seg wasmi yuɣal Cacnaq d agellid ɣef yiferɛunen (yesbedd tagelda tis 22) deg useggas n 950 uqbel tallalit n ƐIsa. Aya, ɣef wakken i t-yufa netta deg unadi-ines, imi ar tura mazal ur tefri temsalt-agi n wazemz-agi. Ihi, yekker Amar Negadi, yexdem-d tafada tamaziɣt deg useggas-nni 1980 u yebda amenzu n yennayer 2930, ass-nni 1 deg yennayer 1980. Syin, uɣalen sseɣtan-t, rnan-as ussan ɛlaḥsab n umgarad yellan gar tfada Julien akked tin Grégorien. Teffeɣ-d tfada-agi i tikkelt tamezwarut deg tesɣunt Assaɣen n Tiddukkla n Uɣref Amaziɣ anda yella Amar Amaziɣ. Akka, i d-ttlalent ula d tanfusin ɣer yigduden-nniḍen.

Iɣellaten n uwanak d unabaḍ n Umɣiwan Adamsan n Yiwanaken n Tefriqt n Utaram gan timlilit d tumdilt deg tmaneɣt taghanit yernu ɣetsen ad medlen tilisa-nsen d Mali deg ukatar n tuddsa-a tadumnaḍant yernu ɣetsen daɣ ad ssiglen imsenfalen n yifarisen n usra amenzu d Mali, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna yiwen n ulɣu ay d-yeffɣen deffir ma tfuk tqacuct-a.
Ɣetsen daɣ yimḍebbren-a ad sbedden tallalt tadrimant ay ttakfen i Mali yernu ad gersen ayla n Mali deg Tbanka Talemmast n Yiwanaken n Tefriqt n Utaram. Iwanaken-a ɣetsen daɣ ad d-ɣren i yinmazalen-nsen yellan deg Mali anda ay d-llant snat tuttyiwin tiredsanin deg 2020 yernu tella-d daɣ deg-s tezɣent taɣellisant d talqayant.
Imḍebbren-a n Umɣiwan Adamsan n Yiwanaken n Tefriqt n Utaram kemmlen deg ubrid n tqacuct n Tdukli Tadamsant d Tedrimant n Tefriqt n Utaram ay d-yellan uqbel tqacuct-nsen yernu yenna-d yiwen seg yimedrawen deg tqacuct-a dakken iweddiben ay d-yettwaḥettmen ɣef Mali d « iqessḥanen aṭas ».
Ma d iduba imaliyen xebbren-d, ass n uynas, dakken ɣran-d i yinmazalen-nsen deg tmura-a yernu temdel ula d nettat tilisa-nnes tikalanin d tgennanin yid-sent, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna yiwen n ulɣu n unabaḍ amali.

PARIS (SIWEL) — Tuqqna n MAK n Fransa talemmast i d-yessawlen i tuɣalin n temliliyin n yiqvayliyen ɣer uvraḥ n Stalingrad deg wussan n acer ( lḥedd) mi ḥevsent seg yilendi sebba ukman ɣef waṭṭan Covid-19 i d-yeɣlin ɣef Tmurt n Fransa.
Ass-a 28/02/2021, yella-d unejmue deg Stalingrad anda aṭas n yiqvayliyen i d-yerran i teɣri, imeɣnasen yettidiren di Tmurt n Fransa, d widak ivedden ɣer yidis imeɣnasen n umussu n timunent n tmurt taqvaylit i yellan deg lḥevs n Lezzayer tamhersant am Lwennas Ḥemzi, Ǧamal Azeeim d Lyas Mebarki; akken daɣen i t-id-nnan deg wawalen , ad kemmlen deg usiwel i tuddsiwin tigrɣalinin i yesḥviviren ɣef yizerfan n umdan ad d-skecment iman-nsent akken ad d-yili userraḥ s leejlan i yimeɣnasen-a.
Awal deg temlilit n wass-a, yezzi ɣef yimeɣnasen i wumi d-ssawal taɣdemt tazzayrit tamhersant anda i d-fkan tiɣri i yeqvayliyen ad sezdin tagmat deg wannar akken ad ilin ɣer yidis imeɣnasen i yetteeddayen deg ccrae d yimeɣnasen i yetteedday lḥers deg tmurt.
Tiɣri i yiqvayliyen ladɣa wid yettidirin di tmurt n Fransa, ad ilin s tuget yal mi ara d-yaweḍ ttiead n unejmue deg Stalingrad akken ad d-fken afud i umennuɣ ɣef timunent n tmurt Taqvaylit d yiveddi ɣer yidis yimeɣnasen n yiqvayliyen i yellan ddaw lḥers n lezzayer tamhersant.

Aseggas-a rezfeɣ ɣer tmurt-nneɣ. Dinna ufiɣ ayen yesnecraḥen ulawen, maca ufiɣ daɣen ayen yesluɣayen ulawen. Taddart-nneɣ ufiɣ-tt teččur d ilemẓiyen cebbḥen iberdan. Ayen i d-yennulfan deg taluft-a n turart n ddabex di taddart d yiwet n tlemẓit yetturaren akkd ilermẓiyen,Tilemẓit-a d yilli-s n Tiwal Dihya Boumedjane. Annect-a ufiɣ-t igerrez aṭas. Nniɣ deg wallaɣ-iw: „Wissen ahat ad ilint tlawin iseggasen i d-iteddun ula deg wegraw n taddart, ad ilint deg yal amḍiq anida ttilin yergazen ass d yiḍ.“
Taddart teččur d ṭumubilat, timeɣriwin ugtent. Ccna iteffeɣ-d si tmacinin izehher di taddart. Kra deg-s d tazwawt (taqbaylit) kra d taɛrabt. „Taɛrabt? Wissen acuɣer? I waɛraben sellen i ccna azwaw di tmeɣriwin-nsen?“ I nniɣ deg wallaɣ-iw
.Yiwen wass kecmeɣ ɣer uɣerbaz n taddart anida yella yiwen bat n tmeɣra yesseččay inebgiwen. Axxam ufiɣ-t yeččur d irgazen (ur telli ula d yiwet n tmeṭṭut gar-asen).
Di tlemmast n yiwen n lḥiḍ n texxam-a anida qqaren warrac n taddart yenṭeḍ yiwen n lkaɣeḍ d ameqqran uran fell-as ismawen s taɛrabt, s tefransist. Ma d tutlayt-nneɣ tamaziɣt-tazwawt ulac-itt. Dɣa nniɣ deg wallaɣ-iw:
„Ẓer tura i tidderɣelt-nneɣ. Ula d yiwen ur yeẓri tawaɣit-a.„
Ffɣeɣ akken deg yiḍ ɣer webrid, dinna ufiɣ tira s tutlayt-nneɣ tcebbeḥ taddart. Dɣa rriɣ anehhit acemma!

Wagi d yiwen upupi n ukarṭun, dɣa am wagi yellan af tewlaft-agi i d-seddaɣ i tmacahutt-agi swa-swa. Ihi apupi-agi, yiwen nimiru yellan deg-s d axeṣṣar, uassan-is akk d timucuha, tixeṣṣarin-is ur keffunt ara, ta tetḍafar ta !
Yiwen wass, yekcem-d upupi-agi ar wexxam, ass nni icewwel-it cciw n "lɛarabiya" deg uɣerbaz, rnan yimdukkal-is sfeqɛen-t maci d cwiṭ, imi dija, werǧin yefhem akk acu i ten-icerken netta akk d yimdukkal-agi, ines. Yekcem-d ihi ar wexxam, iḍegger takarṭabt-is (cartable) ar lqa

Deg ussan-a imeggura iẓra Nnaḍur ijjen ugeɛɛed d aɛeffan deg yinni ig ihelken s Kuruna. Yedwel sspiṭar n Lḥasani wer izemmer ad isnuju qqaɛ imehlak d imaynuten. Ɛawed wer izemmer ad igg ttist i merra inni ig imxellaṭen aked imehlak s Kuruna. Lɛamala n Nnaḍur, terr-d ẓẓeyyar d ubelleɛ x temdint maḥend ad tessenqes zeg imehlak.
Di lweqt d ijjen, iwdan merra rezzun x ubiṭamin n C d usafar n klurukin di Farmasiyat. Waxxa lux, iḍbiben n umaḍal ttwessan ad agg°jen imehlak x uklurukin. Abiṭamin C idwel inqes aṭṭas ula d netta. Minzi tnayen-a n isufar sxeddamen-ten maḥend ad sgenfan imehlak s Kuruna.

CMINI DEG AT WEƔLIS (SIWEL) — Ameɣnas n tuqqna tasdawant n Vgayet Lyas At yelha d win i wumi d-iceyyee daɣen udavu amhersan akken ad ieeddi ɣer uxxam n temsulta n Cmini.
Asarag s tiliẓri n mass aselway Ferḥat Mehenni di tesdawit n Vgayet ieeddan akken iwata ass 06 yevrir 2021 yeǧǧa-d arjujen i udavu. Kra wussan kan mi d-yeḍra usarag, adavu iceyyee-d yakan i sin i yimeɣnasen n tuqqna tasdawant Mesṭafa Ɛekkuc akked Bilal Ḥamiṭuc; tikkelt-a, ha-t-an yuɣal-d daɣen ɣer umeɣnas nniḍen Lyas At Yelha.
Imeɣnasen, anda llan gar-asen yesdawanen n tesdawit n Vgayet ladɣa, fkan-d udem icevḥen i umennuɣ n tmunent i tmurt Taqvaylit, Ivan-d deg-sen belli d isdawanen yeɣran, ifehmen, iwalan d acu ixeddmen.
Adavu amhersan, ur yesei ara tifrat nniḍen s-way-s ara iqavel imeɣnasen ifehmen anagar aceyyee ɣer lekwaɣeḍ ɣer uxxam n temsulta d ucarae d leḥvus. D acu kan, iseɣ, levɣi d lefhama izereen deg yal ameɣnas mačči dayen i yezmer udavu.
Ad nini i umeɣnas n wazal Lyas At Yelha, akken ma nella aql-aɣ ɣer yidis-ik.

Yusa-d muh s Marikan aseggwas n 1990, izdegh di San Diego iffus n Kalifurnya lli gh iga tugtt n twwuriwin xf Tmagit Tamazight i wgdud n Marikan netta y-akkw d imddukkal nes yaden (nnniden), immatti d ilemma s tsga (region) n San Francisco aseggwas tigira n 90. Ig yan g medden nna ibedden skun Tamsmunt n imazighen n Marikan ACAA, ayyawn n Kalifurnya. Immagh f tdelsa Tamazight g Marikan, isawl g yat tugtt n iradyuten (Radios) nna tt yiwin g Tamaght n imadanen xf tlelli (tiderfit) d izerfan n ufgan, mek ad af isawl g KPFA g Berkeley, WBAI g New York, KQED g San Francisco, d wiyyad.

S Taârabt[edit | edit source]
Irifiyyen tarin awar nsen s Taâraft minzi tiqqen zi as di lmadrasa. Tira n Taâraft twahvsab d tira n ddin d n ssiyssa, ila âwwad Irifiyyen ighrin zamman marra atagghan.
S Talatint[edit | edit source]
Talitint nigh tira n Tafransist d tira i zi twara Tafransist. Tira ya tudvfad gha Lmaghrib ag listiâmar. Irifiyyen tarin zi as minzi t shir i tighri x tira n Taâraft, ila âwwad gha as ijj tuzemmet tamaqrant zi nahviyya n teknulujya.

LEZZAYER TAMANEƔT – Iwekked-d, ass n usiḍyas deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, uneɣlaf n temguri tawesfart, Lotfi Benbahmed, dakken afares n tgezzayt mgal waḍḍan n Covid-19 ad d-tili s ticcurka d Rrus yernu d tagrawt n Saidal ara yesɛun tamsufɣa akken ad d-tfares tagezzayt-a n Sputnik V.
« D Asenduq Arusi n Usefti Usrid ay yettamden asɣenzi n tgezzayt tarusit n Sputnik V ay d-yesnegma Usudu n Unadi n Tsenbayyurt d Temẓasnudert (Gamaleya). Asenduq-a yesbuda-d, kraḍ n wayyuren aya, kra n tmura ay yesɛan iket
... 
s Benbahmed deg yiwet n tesguri i Tnegga n Yisalan n Lezayer, am wakken ay d-yesmekti dakken asuter anmaḍal i tgezzayt mgal waḍḍan n Covid-19 simal irennu yernu d aya ay yeǧǧan timura tineɣrafin ad sgiǧǧent afares ɣer tmura niḍen akken ad zemrent ad qablent asuter anmaḍal.
« Nekkni, seg yidis-nneɣ, neqbel aya mraw n wussan aya », ɣef wakken ay d-ixebber uneɣlaf ay d-yernan dakken aɣtas-a « yettwaddem deffir ma yella-d umciweṛ gar uɣlif n temguri tawesfart d Tnegga Taɣelnawt n Yifarisen Iwesfaren
...
 tatwilant aydeg llan yisefka itwilanen yessefken i uɣraf n tgezzayt-nni », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna uneɣlaf-a.
I lmend n waya, « ticcurka ad d-tili gar Usenduq Arusi n Usefti Usrid d tegrawt tawesfart tanagdudt n Saidal ay yettwafernen akken ad as-tettunefk temsufɣa i ufares n tgezzayt-a, yernu ad d-yili waya ɣef leḥsab n wammaken itwilanen d yilsanen ay tesɛa », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna uneɣlaf ay d-yernan dakken Saidal tesɛa akettur n ufares n tgezzayt-a s tenga tamenzut ara d-yefk yidis arusi.

Ddurt iɛeddan yessefqed uneɣlaf n yilmeẓyen d waddal Mass El Hachemi Djiar, s yisem-is daɣ d imḍebber n uselmed aɛlayan, taɣiwant n Amizur, anida i yeldi s wudem unṣib kra n yisenfaren yessawḍen ɣer taggara-nsen, yerna issefqed ɣef yisenfaren n waddal d uselmed aɛlayan. Asayes amezwaru n uneɣlaf d ammas n waddal i yeldin tiwwura- ines ugar n sin n yiseggasen ar deffir segmi i t-yeldi lwali n Bgayet, iɛawed-as Mass aneɣlaf di tirza-ines ɣer temnaḍt-a. Yessefqed daɣen ɣef wamek i lḥan lecɣalat n trusi n leḥcic deg unnar n tɣiwant, rnu tiseddarin timaynutin i bennun deg-s. Yetturaju ad ikemmel lecɣal i as-d-yeqqimen i unnar-a deg wussan i d-iteddun .Asayes nniḍen d asenfar n wammas asdawan i yellan di Amizur, Anida i bdan lecɣal deg-s ugar n sin wayyuren. Aneɣlaf, di tirza- ines, yerra lwelha- ines ɣer lecɣal n lebni n wammas asdawan ara yesɛun azal n 6000 n yimukan ibidaɣujiyen, d tmezduɣt tasdawant n 5000 wusawen .Mass aneɣlaf yesla i yisegziyen i as-d-fkan yimḍebben n temnaḍt-a, nutni akked yimawlan n tkebbaniyin i yestkelfen s lecɣal n usenfar. Deg wawal n uneɣlaf yesseḥres ɣef yimḍebren ad fakken deg lweqt iwulmen isenfaren-a.
Soraya Rabia

Awerni ca n simanat n tmeskanin di Bangladic, teffeɣ tanessixeft n iwziren Ccixa Ḥasina Wajed zi tmurt-nnes, timeskanin-a ttuɣa gewwden-tent imeḥḍaren.
Terwel Ḥasina mm 76 n iseggusa di buḥbel-nnes deg ijjen uhilikuptir amek nnan ca n ineqqisen.
Hejmen aṭṭas n imeskanen x tzeddiɣt-nnes di tmaẓunt Daka, mani kksen leḥkam n ijjen temɣart i yekkin ɛecrin iseggusa, wa d akud azegrar qaɛ n ijjen tewzirt di Bangladic.
Teṭṭef leḥkam nettat deg useggʷas n 2009, mani tiweḍ ad teḥkem ca n ɛecrin n iseggus
... 
baq n Bangladic wami ttuɣa iḥekkem Ḥusayn Muḥemmed Ircad.
Maca umi din aṭṭas n yewdan i tt-iḍeffren, tedwel d tikunt d tanamurt. Tettwasti deg useggʷas n 1996 di twalat tamezwarut.
Tfekk amxumbel n waman aked Lhend zi senni tegga ijjen umsetfaq n wafra aked tqebbal deg yeffus n ccerq n tmurt.
Maca di twalat d icten, ttuɣa qqaren x-as ila tettegg “ifassen deg ixbac” mamec i tedɛen i Lhend.
Deg useggʷas n 2001, wer teqqim d tanessixeft, teṭṭef-as amkan Xalida Ḍiyaa i ttuɣa yellan d tameddukelt-nne
...
en belli nitni d “izballaɣen”.
Zegga i d-yusa lehlak n Kuruna, temmerni lmaɛica di Bangladic, s lemsibbet n umerwas i idewlen irẓa aɛrur n tmurt-a tanita.
Din wi iqqaren belli min ittwaggen d asebḥan i ikunumi n tmurt wer zzag-s stifden ca merra yewdan mɣar inni i das-yewdsen i tewzirt waha.
Xelli din aṭṭas n tmesmunin i izemmemn aṭṭas n waddaden n usweḍḍer d tmenɣiwin zeg useggʷas n 2009.
Mamec i ttuɣa tḥebbes aṭṭas n imeɣnas zi ca n imulliten nniḍen zegga ggin timeskanin kuntra i tenbaḍt-nnes.

Islam d ajjed iy deg ttamnen medden belli Yakuc (Rebbi) d yiwen, ur yesɛi mmi-s ur yesɛi tameṭṭot. Ɣur-s lemluk i t-ttɛawanen, yuzen imazanen (les messagers) ɣur medden akken ad ttamnen yis-es. Amazan (errasol) aneggaru deg Lislam d Muḥemmed.
Isem n medden i yettamnen s Lislam, inselmen. Inselmen ɣur-sen 5 n tamara (lefroḍ):
Deg Lislam, yella yiwen wedlis : Leqran, yella daɣen Lḥadit neɣ timucuha ɣef tudert n Muḥemmed. Inselmen ttamnen belli Injil d Turat ttubeddlen, wer qqimmen amek am ten yuzen Rebbi.
Tisuqilin n Leqran s tutlayt Tamaziɣt[beddel]

Iḍleqq-d ususyuluji Marzuq Lweryaci, mmis n Nnaḍur, ijjen ulaɣi maḥend ad sbedden ardar n ca n lebni d aqdim aqqa-t deg wammas n Nnaḍur. Itter zi tmesmunin ad ggent lxedmet-nnsent maḥend ad beddent deg wudem n tsappiwin i yexsent ad hedment lebni-ya aqdim. Mamec i d-inna ɛawed, ila qa lebni-ya aqqa-t x yiri n tɣiwant n Nnaḍur d tmawast n tussna.
Lebni amezwaru, qqaren-as taddart n Benssiɛmar. Ittwabna s thendast Tandalurifit. Ttuɣa izeddeɣ dag-s lbaca. Ijjen lebni yecna s waṭṭas, maca iseɣ-it ijjen zeg ayt Bu igelwan ixes ad igg deg wemkan-nnes ijjen lebni nniḍen. Ajellid Muḥemmed wis xemsa, ttuɣa yekka dag-s ca n wussan wami i d-yusa ɣer Nnaḍur. Minzi di lweqt-nni wer din ca nnutilat.
Lebni wis tnayen ttuɣa-t d amezgun d sini di twalat d icten. D azzreg n tussna d uxarres deg wakud Aspanyu. Deg iseggusa n sebɛin, ttuɣa dag-s tamesmunt n tyemra n lebḥer. Mamec i dag-s ttuɣa ijjen uḥemmas d lbar. Ttuɣa tteggen dag-s iwdan inhezziyen n tussna.
Lweryaci, yenna belli ixess x tmesmunin ad ɛebbẓent anict zemmarent x tɣiwant n Nnaḍur maḥend ad sbeddent ddegg-a n wardar, qbel ma ad d-dewlent d ijjen lebni bla buḥbel.

Yerẓem Mohamed El Montaser tawwurt i wemsawal amezwar jer iḥudriyen n Nnaḍur. Ḥima ra d nitnin ad reccḥen di lintixab i dd ɣa yasen n lbaladiyya n Nnaḍur.
Tabrat i yegga Simohamed i yefsar s Whatsapp d Facebook, yegru dag‑s ifirmaren n tarwa n Nnaḍur inni n daxel d yenni n barra. Yegga‑tt d alaɣi i marra wi ittasmen x temdint n Nnaḍur, ad ssiɣen fus-nsen di lintixab i dd‑yegguren, i ca n iḥudryyen ɣer‑sen tizemmer d timessna deg usugur.
Tasentayt‑ya yegga, yenna xaf‑s, belli wer yeqqin la ɣa ijjen n tidyulujit, niɣ n leḥsabat n pulitik. Iswi‑nnes, ad yuc fus i wudmawen d jjdid, ad beddlen udmawen-nni izehmen, yeṭṭfen lbaladiya n Nnaḍur rexxu iseggusa, mellen‑ten tarwa n temdint.
3000 n Ifirmaren yuca-asen lmijal n uyur, maca di deg ijjen wass d llilt, iwḍen 1000. Awarn‑as ad reẓmen tawwurt i wi yexsen ad yarecceḥ, ad ixḍaren marra iḥudriyyen icarken di tsentayt‑a, ijjen uprugram a xaf‑s xedmen.
Simohamed netta d ca n iḥudriyyen akid‑s, zeg udmawen ittwassnen di temdint n Nnaḍur, deg iyyar n Twiza, ineɣmisen, d min yeqqnen ɣa marra mani tella tcuni n temdint.
Alaɣi‑ya, yettwag s waṭṭas n Tutlayin, ḥima ad ssiɣen fus marra tarwa n temdint mani llan deg umaḍal.

Ḥannibaɛl Berqa
Ḥannibaɛl (s tbunit 𐤇𐤍𐤁𐤏𐤋) yedder gar 247 armi d 183 neɣ 181 ST yellma d ajiniral aqerṭaji yennuɣen mgal tagduda tarumanit deg tallit n yimenɣi abuniqi wis II. D yiwen seg yiɣallen n yiserdasen imeqqranen yesɛan ccan d ameqqran deg umezruy, d mmi-s n twacult n At Berqa.
Baba-s n Ḥannibaɛl, Hamliqar Berqa, yella d iɣil n yiserdasen deg tallit n yimenɣi abuniqi amenzu. Atmaten-is imeẓẓyanen d Azdurbaɛl akked Magun, d aḍewwal n Ḥasdurbaɛl Aḥeqqi, i yellan d aqerru ɣef yisertdasen iq
... 
ibirit (Hisbanya).
Mi yekfa nnfaq abuniqi amenzu, yuɣal-d Hamliqar ɣer tmurt-is i wakken ad iṣeggem idrimen n twacult-is d tmurt-is Qerṭaj, yerra-d Hamliqar allen-is ɣef temcagzirt tibiri, ikeččem-itt s leɛqel s leɛqel, imiren Qerṭaj tella tenḥaf mliḥ, ur tezmir ara ula i uceyyeɛ n teflukin ara yessiwḍen iserdasen-is ɣer swaḥel n Sbenyul n wass-a, ihi Hamliqar yuwet-itt d tilḥin akenni netta d yiserdasen-is. Yegzem-d Numidya ɣef ḍar seg utaram armi d amalu, armi yuweḍ ɣer Yisulas n Hirgliz (d is
...
nsen Ḥennun wis II ameqqran (neɣ Hannu/Ḥennu II).
Irumaniyinen d useqqamu-nsen rran-d ɣef tuffɣiwin n Ḥannibaɛl iɛeddan tilisa-nsen, s usesten i tmurt n Qerṭaj ma yella Ḥannibaɛl yeẓdem ɣer temdint n Saguntum (umi syinna id-kkan akk warazen-nni) s lamer n yinembaḍen iqerṭajiyen s timmad-n,sen neɣ sɣur-s kan, aseqqamu aqerṭaji yerra-d s yifukal id-yemmalen belli Rum ulac d acu i as-xedmen yernbu ur ffiɣen ara i lɛahed nni i yella gar-asen, tuɣal ihi Rum textar nnfaq wala lehna lukud yiqerṭajiyen.

Wikileaks: Iseppunya tbergagen x uzeid ameɣrabi
Ɛawed zi jdid tessufeɣ d Wikileaks řexbar ameqqran x tbergagect n iseppunya x uzeǧid ameɣrabi Moḥemmed wis 6. Ɛlaḥsab Wikileaks ass zegwami ibdan ad bergen niɣ ad cekmen x uzeǧid ameɣrabi. Mmarra manawya imsar, ɛlaḥsab mammec twaran ca n iwdan, imsar řami iruḥ uzeǧid ameɣrabi ɣar sseḥra. Iseppunya arezzun ad ssnen mammec tetxarraṣ lḥukuma tameɣrabect deg umenɣi n sseḥra. Manawya mmarra ɛlaḥsab rexburat id tessufeɣ Wikileaks.
Asseppanyu d wenni tuɣa iṭṭfen sseḥra qbeř. Awarni as yus d Lmeɣrib uca iṭṭef aṭṭas zi Ssehra deg usseggʷass n 1975. Zi ssenni idweř Lmeɣrib iḥesseb Sseḥra zi tmura nneḍni n Lmeɣrib. Iseḥraweyyen s uɛawen n dzayar arezzun ad ggen tammurt nsen di Sseḥra. Amenɣi aya wanita aṭṭas i dayes yemmuten aṭṭas n imeɣrabiyyen d iṣeḥrawiyyen. Amenɣi wanita ɛad tmenɣan xas s uqarṭas d wawař ak tmura n ddunect id yusin di tmurt n umarikan.

Leqeidet-nneɣ mecmi nttuc a netter ṭṭyab[1]
Wami dd-yusa unẓar qbala, ad ffɣent temɣarin d tebriɣin d iḥermucen d yergazen…
Ttawin yergazen ijj n ufunas al ijjen umrabeḍ qqaren-as ccix, ɣerrsen din i ufunas, ttettren llṭef din. Irgazen qqaren:
« U lṭef bina u ddenya teereq bina! »
Timɣarin d tebriɣin qqarent:
« Rebbi ṭayeb xaf-neɣ »
A dd-teffeɣ ijjen twessart, ad traḥ a dd-tawi ijjen tsegnit a tt-tarqez g yijjen unnar d aqdim ur isserwit ḥedd imendi dini, ɣir midden imezgura ssarewten deg-s imendi. Tawessart-nn teqqar tijemein necnin timeẓẓyanin ur tent-nessin.
[1] Teawed-as-tt i S.Biarnay, Sufya yelli-s n Mmuḥ abeqqiw. di Ṭanja asegg°as n 1909.

Agni n Yeɣran
Agni n Yeɣran (Abdar: Agʷni Ggeɣran) d taɣiwant n Tmurt Taqbaylit tezga-d deg ugezdu n Tizi Wezzu di Tmurt Taqbaylit.
Asideg (timella)[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Taɣiwant n Agwni Ggeɣran tella deg unẓul n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu.
Tudrin n Taɣiwant[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Taɣiwant n Agwni Ggeɣran tesɛa 14 tudrin[1] :
- Agni n Yeɣran
- At Ɛmer
- At Aɛmara
- At Ɛli U Qasi
- At Lqayed
- At Yiɣil
- At Sliman
- Iɛzunen
- Tafsa n Wumad
- Tagemmunt
- Tawrirt
- Tazeqqa
- Tiɣeẓẓa
- Tigri
Tadamsa[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Taɣiwant tesɛa taneɣraft tameqrant n tilebbiḍin n waman. Agraw Cevital yeldi aqbrib taɣbalut agi zdat taddart n Agwni Ggeɣran taneɣraft n 23 000 m² id ttaken 2,5 imelyunen n tilebbiḍin deg wass n ticreḍt de la marque Lalla Xediǧa (ticreḍt).
Ẓeṛ daɣen[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
- Tadayṛa n Iwaḍiyen
- Tiɣiwanin n Tadayṛa n Iwaḍiyen
- Tawilayt n Tizi Uzzu
- Tidayṛiwin n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu
- Tiɣiwanin n twilayt n Tizi Uzzu

Di rreḥba tagraɣlant n yedlisen n Frankfurt am Main di Lalman (2010) ttwafessren idlisen si 110 n tmura. Ma d idlisen s tmaziɣt ulac.
Deg wexxam uṭṭun 5 dinna llant teẓrigin n waṭas n tmura. Gar-asent yella unbaḍ adigan akurdi (Lɛiraq). Deg waxxam-a n yedlisen n tmurt n Kurdistan yella yura wannect-a:
“Ministry of Culture Kurdistan Regional Governmet”.
Agemmaḍ n wexxam-a yella wexxam n unabaḍ afidiral n Lɛiraq.
Ihi ɣas Kurdistan d yiwet n “tqernit” di tmurt n Lɛiraq, maca ɣur-s amḍiq-is gar n tm
... 
tat i yesɛan timanit di tmurt n Lɛiraq, acku nekni nennuɣ fell-as. Seg useggas n 1961 almi d 1970 d nekni d imenɣi mgal Araben, almi nessaweḍ nesbedd timanit aseggas n 1970. Fell-as mmuten aṭas n ukurdiyen.
Aseggas n 1975 Sedddam Ḥusin izdem-d fell-aɣ yesseɣli timanit-nneɣ.
D acu kan nekni ur nrebbex ara iɣallen-nneɣ.
Aseggas n 1991 di lgirra mgal Lɛiraq nessaweḍ nesbedd tikkelt nniḍen timanit i tmurt-nneɣ. Imarikaniyen fkan-aɣ-d afus.
1992 Amni akurdi yemsefham d unabaḍ aɛiraqi , tamurt n Lɛira
...

« Ɣef lǧal n tezɣent tadawsant yellan deg tmurt, tella-d temilit gar yinfarasen idiganen n wurrigen isnajyanen Linde Gaz, Sidal (yettwassnen zik s yisem n Air Liquide) d Calgaz Algerie akked uneɣlaf n temguri tawsafart, Aduktur Lotfi Benbahmed, deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna ulɣu-a.
Iswi n temlilit-a d « tamussni n yiketturen n yal amsemhel akken ad iqabel asuter d-yekkan sɣur yiɣsuren n tdawsa, ladɣa deg wayen yerzan uksijin amengan neɣ deg tbeṭṭiwt ».
I lmend n wyaa, iban-d dakken Linde Gaz tezmer ad d-tfares 150.000 n yilitren n wuksijin, ma d Sidal, tezmer ad d-tfares 20.000 n yilitren deg wass, yernu d nitenti ay yessedgaren ifarisen-nsent ɣef yiɣsuren n tdawsa. Msegzant snat-a n teṛmisin akken ad sdukklent iketturen-nsent n ufares d usedger deg wussan ay d-yetteddun s umyalel d teṛmist n Calgaz Algerie.
Taṛmist n Calgaz Algerie tennulfa-d seg melmi kan yernu werɛad ur tesɛi ara agatu n usedger d yisegnafen, d acu kan, tesɛa akettur n ufares n 150.000 n yilitren deg wass deg snat n tneɣrafin-nnes yellan deg Waregla d Leɣwaṭ, am wakken ay tesɛa akettur n usmidel n 500.000 n yilitren.

Deg yiwen n usarag i iga deg tesɣimt n Udabu aɣelnaw amzireg n tefranin, deg taggara n yiwet n temlilit, i iga s wallal tili-sarag, s uttekki n tmagliwin n udabu yellan deg waɣiren, yesseddi-d Mass Charfi dakken iheyyiten n tefranin tidiganin « la teddunt akken yessefk ».
Yenna-d deg tmuɣli-ya dakken, llan 1.366 n wumuɣen n yikabaren i wakken ad ttekkin deg 1.327 n tɣiwanin akked 39 n yigezda akked 13 n wumuɣen n yimzarugen akken ad ttekkin deg 8 tɣiwanin akked 5 n yigezda, dayen jebden-d isetturen-nsen, i d-yenna.
Ad naf llan yisetturen-a deg wakk tmagliwin n Udabu aɣelnaw imzireg n tefranin i yuzzaren deg wakal akk n tmurt, i d-yesmekti.
Deg wayen yerzan acegger afeɣnami n wumuɣen ifrananen, i yebdan ass n usamas (lḥedd), yenna-d uselway n Udabu aɣelnaw imzireg n tefranin dakken « igmaḍ imezwura ssiggzen 25.813 n yiferranen imuyna akked tukksa n 42.000 nniḍen acku mmuten neɣ beddlen tanezduɣt-nsen ».

« Newjed ad neqbel s kra n uɣtas ara d-yilin ɣef wamek ara teḍru d telɣuɣa, maca nekk aql-iyi akked tuqqla ɣer tyaka. Mazal 8 n wussan n wurar i urbaḥ n 24 n tenqiḍin, yernu ssarameɣ nesɛa ammaken akken ad d-neqqel yernu ad nurar ɣef yideggen imezwura », ɣef wakken ay d-yenna Achour Djelloul i Tnegga n Yisalan n Lezzayer.
Tella-d yiwet n temlilit, ass n usamas yezrin, deg tesɣimt n uɣlif n tillumẓa d waddal i usiwel ɣef wamek ay tezmer ad d-teqqel telɣuɣa. Timlilit-a tella-d war ma yeḥdeṛ deg-s uneɣlaf, Sid Ali Khaldi, d uneɣlaf n Tfidiṛalit Tazzayrit n Tcirḍart, Kheireddine Zetchi, yernu d tin ay d-yellan deffir ma tessuter-itt tnarit tafidiṛalit i usiwel ɣef wamek ara teḍru d tyaka taɣelnawt n tcirḍart.
Seg yidis niḍen, yenna-d uselway-anemhal amatu n tegrawt n Serport dakken d Abdelghani Haddi ay d-ssummden d anemhal amatu imi ay yesɛa acḥal n yiseggasen n termit deg usefrek n teṛmisin yernu netta d amazzay deg usaḍuf.
Daɣ, yenna-d Mass Djelloul dakken Anthar Yahia, anemhal addalan amaynu n uqusis-a, yezmel agatu n 3 n yiseggasen yernu yebda ya amahil-nnes.

Usama Ben Laden
Usama Ben Laden neɣ Usama bin Muḥammed bin Awad bin Laden (ilul deg 10 Meɣres 1957 - yemmut deg 2 Mayyu 2011 Abbottabad, Pakistan), d aserdas aqbur n Tgelda Tasaɛudit yerna d argaz n yiweẓla (homme d'affaires) seg twacult tameṛkantit n Ben Laden ay yesɛan aṭas n yiseftiyen (investissements) deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen.
Deg yiseggasen n 1980, Ben Laden yella iqeddec (ɣer yidis n Yimarikaniyen) akken ad iɛawen Afɣanen ad ssuffɣen iɣallen isuvyatiyen seg tmurt-nsen. D netta ay d-yesbedden tuddsa timselleḥt n Lqaɛida ay yettekkan deg tenṭagin 11 Ctembeṛ 2001 deg Yiwunak Yeddukklen akked waṭas n tenṭagin niḍen ay d-yellan yimukan niḍen n umaḍal yerna glant s tmeddurin n waṭas n medden. Seg wasmi ay yettekka deg tenṭagin ay iḥuzan tinmuhal (ambassades) timarikaniyin deg Kenya ed Tanzanya (deg 1998), FBI yessers Ben Laden gar 10 n yemdanen imeqranen akk ayɣef yettnadi. Deg 1 Mayyu 2011, iɣallen imsellḥen imarikaniyen ssawḍen ad nɣen Ben Laden deg yiwen n wexxam deg temdint n Abbottabad, deg Pakistan.

Par Dalila I. | 10 Septembre 2012 | 56 lecture(s)
Tizi wezzu : Idlisen i 74% n yinelmaden i ixuṣen
Ilmend n unekcum aɣurbiz 2012-2013, tanemhalt n leqraya theyya-d yiwen wahil s wazal-is i lemɛawna n yinelmaden n twaculin yenxaṣṣen, deg yal tama n lwilaya. S wakka ad d-setfaydin azal n 105 000 n yinelmaden n yeswiren yemgaraden s wefraq n yedlisen n leqraya mebla lexlaṣ. 74% gar wid yenxaṣṣen ṣaḥen-asen-d 455 699 yedlisen. Ad nar tamawt belli tarwa n yixeddamen deg weḥric n leqraya, inelmaden n useggas amenzu n weswir amazwaru d warac n le préscolaire ara yekecmen ad setfaydin ula d nutni s yedlisen. Si tama niḍen, ad tili daɣen lemɛawna s 3000 n yidinaren i twaculin-a. Akken daɣen ara ttwaferqen azal n n 30 000 n yeqraben di tamiwin yemxalafen n lwilaya.
Dalila I.

Ulamma tettwassen temnaḍt-agi n Ait Aissa Mimoun s lɣella n zzit n uzemmur, maca deg yiseggasen-agi ieeddan, ur tessefraḥ ara tarewt n uzemmur d wayen i d-yettak n zzit imezdaɣ n tama-a. Llan wid i d-yeẓdan yakkan azemmur-nsen, llan wid mazal ttelqaḍen. Maca aseggas-agi yeččur-asen allen-nsen, yerra-asen-d asirem, imi tudert n waṭas n twaculin n tama-agi, ɣur-s i tcudd. Aseggas-agi, ur txus ara lɣella n zzit uzemmur, tella s waṭas, d ayen i yesferḥen imezdaɣ n temnaḍt-a n Ait Aissa Mimoun. D ayen ara yeğğen tuget deg-sen ur d tt-id-ttağğwen ara s tmara. Ulamma deg useggas yezrin txus zzit n uzemmur, maca aseggas-agi yella lxir. Yerna akken tenza ilindi zzit n uzemmur dagi deg Ait Aissa Mimoun i tenza ula d aseggas-agi s 800 DA i litra. Ulamma aṭas n yimezdaɣ i d-yennan belli yezmer lḥal aseggas-agi ad tenz s 750 DA neɣ ahat s 700 DA kan, maca teqqim akken tella, ur terni ur tenqis.
Adaoun Abdelghani

Imentilen n unuri n iřsawen mseɣwen niɣ qqnen ɣar waṭṭas n tmesřayin. Xmi itmetta utarras iḍaffar it yiřes ɣar tmeḍřin. Maca iřes, ca n twařatin itfaqa-d. Waxxa itfaqa-d s ijj n warruḍ nneɣni, maca refhamet nni i das iwca bab nnes tɣima tarwes dayes aṭṭas. Ad negg neccin nnuryen ait n iřsawen, uca iqqim wawař, ma awař nni iqqimen nzemmar ad zzayes nessen axarreṣ n weydud? D manaya ixseɣ ad aniɣ s trekkisent n tuylat. Zi tusna n tuylat niɣ zeg warruḍ i 
... 
rs Tower’, ‘Lincoln Park zoo’, maca war ntettu ca aqa Chigago di ijj n yisem n Ihindaweyen n Umarikan. Chigago inɛarqe-d zi chicagoua, awařa ixs ad yini: ticcart. Ma itadeff aneɣ ɣar waǧi xmi neggur ɣar murakuc belli neggur ɣar tmurt n Yakuc, niɣ xmi neggur ɣar Chigago aqa neggur ɣar tmurt n ticcart! Ad nzar ijj n wawař nneɣni: [a(d) yegga-c Arebbi řebyaḍ]! Niɣ [ad ac iwc Arebbi řebyaḍ]. Aɛraben qqarent i tuccemřeč. Awař deg iyyar n temkussna (semantic) d ijj. Da Imaziɣen war xsen ca ad farnen t
...
wen(ni), s Tmaziɣt. Ad nexzar min ewcin [Illus ille, illa, illud] deg wařsawen n midden. Ille=====→el (el hombre) di Tseppanyut Illa=====→la (la niña) Ad narzu di Tfansist: ille n Tlatinect (Tuylat n Romance) turud le: Ille=====→le (le chat) Illa=====→la (la maison)
Am nni uřa di Tṭalyant (il la) u deg waṭṭas n iřsawen n midden. Wenni ixsen ad issnen aṭṭas x manaya izemmar ad idweř ɣar tuylatin tiqdimin, minzi tarezzut di Tmaziɣt icewwar as twiza ḥuma ad nessen tamhazt (evolution) n tuylat nneɣ.

Alesso neɣ Alessio Baldovinetti (14 ktubeṛ 1425 - 29 ɣuct 1499), ikka-t-inn iga yan umekla awṭalyan n Tleslalit tazaykut.
Ilul-d Baldovinetti g Flurinsa ɣur yat tewja n yimɣaren nna igan tanesbaɣurt. Aseggʷas n 1448, ittuzemmem amm yan seg igmamen n Guild n St. Luke (Luke Agʷrram): "Alesso di Baldovinetti, dipintore."
Ikka-t-inn iga yan umeḍfar n tegrumma-nna n imẓerilawen imassanen d yimẓergamanen n tẓuri nna g yamu allu Andrea del Castagno, Paolo Uccello d Domenico Veneziano. Ɣef uyenna ittuyannan, yuwes nettan g usdikuṛ n teglizt n S. Egidio, is helli ur illi kra n record issenẓun taɣawsa-ad. Tettwaxdamen idikuṛen-ad iseggʷasen n 1441 - 1451 s tkessa n Domenico Veneziano akked Andrea del Castagno. Ayenna ittusenẓan s tidet, iga-t mas d nettan aud ittukellafen s usmad-nnes g yan usakud aḍefran (1460).
Aseggʷas n 1426, ittusemhal Alesso s teklut n fresco axatar n Annunciation g teɣzamt n Annunziata tabaziliyt. Isaguren imek nna ten-nettannay, gan anẓa ɣef tsugert n unaẓur g userwes n yifruriten igamanen s trarit-nnes n teɣʷḍeft nna ineɣden, ayenna yujjan Vasari ad isres snat tesguriwin id-s zdinin: "Ikka-t-inn iḥmel ad yameẓ timuɣliwin issenɣel-tent nnican imek dda gant g ugama-nnsent neɣ ansa-nnsent, d yimek nna aɣef nettannay ilemma ammas n tfelwin-nnes isaffen; tileggʷin, iẓran, imɣayen, igumma, iberdan, igran, timdinin, d wahli n tɣawsiwin-yaḍnin mi ur ili ttmi," d mas "t-inn-ikka iga yan 'inveterate experimentalist' g yisekkinen iteqniyen.

Yerr-d umari d umessuɣel Arifi Mizian Rahou tungalt n “The Pearl” ɣer Tmaziɣt. Tungalt-a tanita i ttuɣa yura umungal Amarikani John Steinbeck issufeɣ-itt-id deg useggʷas n 1950, tettwaḥsab zi tungalin i yettwassnen ɣer umari-ya wanita Amarikani.
Yexḍar Rahou ad as-yegg “tadmamt” i tungalt-a i d-yerra ɣer Tmaziɣt. Tettɛawad tungalt-a x “tudert n Kinu, anegmar n teqqucin, d tzemmar-nnes ḥuma ad d-issenjem memmi-s Kuyutitu i yella umi teqqes tɣirḍemt.”
Amek nessen Mizian Rahou; ɣer-s dduktura di tsekla Tafransist. D aturjman zi tutlayin-nniḍen ɣer Tmaziɣt, ila yezwar-as isturjm-d “Iɣerḍayen d midden” n umari-ya amarikani s ixef-nnes. Mamec i yexdem x usturjem n tqessisin, amezgun d ca nniḍen.
Tungalt-a, ad temmerni ɣer ijjen lxedmet i yettwaggen qbel n usturjem ɣer Tmaziɣt n Arrif i yeggin ca n iturjmanen, mani i yettwaḥsab ungal-a d wis rebɛa i d-ittwarjmen ɣer Tmaziɣt n Arrif, d asitem ad ilint tizemmar-nneḍni maḥend ad immerni wegla n Tmaziɣt s usturjem.

Tutlayt taspnyolit
tutlayt tasblyunit (Español) (nɣ :Castellano) tga tutlayt tunṣibt g tgldit n sblyun d tutlayt tunṣibt g aṭṭas n tmura n tmirikt talatinit، d yiwt sg tutlayin sswaln imzdaɣn n burturiku , da yttmslay tasblyunit jar 322 ar 400 n mlyun n ufgan g umaḍal ، ɣaln imrzutn blli tssnti g kudyira، g ugafa n sblyun. tfsr g maṛṛa timnaḍin n sblyun g tasut tiss tamt d tiss tẓat g tlalit n ɛisa tusad tutlayt tasblyunit sg tutlayt talatinit، nna yuɣaln i tmbṛaṭurt tarumanit، g tasut tiss kraḍt، d tasut tiss snat dat talalit، iwḍn isrdasn irumaniyn tazungzirt tibirit (nna igan imira sblyun d burtugal) ssuɣaln ibiriyn tutlayt talatinit (ddarija) am tutlayt nnsn.
g tazwara n tasut tiss smmust n tlalit، umẓn tqbilin n ijirmaniyn nna ytwassn s (iquṭiyn) ɣaf tazungzirt tibirit، tsul umẓntt iquṭiyn ar asggas 711. . g usggas 711 iwḍn imuslmn maṛṛa ikaliwn n tazungzirt tibirit، . d nbaḍn aṭṭas n igzzumn n tmnaḍt agi ، ar azgn n tasut tiss kraḍ d mraw n tlalit.

Aṭas i yeččant teldunin n udabu amesbaṭli di tmurt n yiqbayliyen deg useggas n 2001(128 d ameɣras). Gar imeɣrasen-a ad naf yiwen n yilemẓi n 35 iseggasen n uweqqas i yettwanɣan ass n 25 yebrir 2001 deg UZELLAGEN. Wayi d SƐIDI AKLI (d ameɣras n uweqqas). D acu kan 13 n iseggasen aya i yezrin segmi yetwaḍel ass n 29 yebrir 2001 deg tɣiwant taqburt n uweqqas. Ayen yessewhamen d aken aẓekka-s ur yettwabna ara ar tura. Ur nezra d acu d ssebba, iɛggalen n twacult-is ur ǧǧin amkan, amer ufan ad as-bnun tajebbant-is i wakken ad tthennin d ayen. I usmekti n umeɣras, ass-nni n 29 yebrir 2014,imdukkal-is d twacult-is d yimeɣnasen n umussu n ufraniman n tmurt n yiqbaylien (MAK) seg TIZI N BERBER D UWEQQAS, rzan ɣef uẓekka-s anda i d-yella wawal fell-as d tɣuri n usefru n ṬAWES ƐEMRUC d userḥem ɣef yiman n umeɣras. Ihi hadret, hadret ay Iqvayliyen ad tettum imeɣrasen-nneɣ n tefsut d taluft n TMAZƔA,yenna DDA LMULUD : "nekni nerẓa asalu,kunwi kemlet tikli ɣer sdat." Sɣur Iɣil Wis

Timura n Wadda
Tagelda n Tmura n Wadda neɣ Timura n Wadda (Tannerlandit : Koninkrijk der Nederlanden , Nederlands) d yiwet n tmurt i-d yezgan di Turuft af yiri n Yilel n Ugafa. Deg 2013, zedɣen-tt azal n 16,828,996 imezdaɣen. Tamaneɣt-is d Amsterdam (tin yugaren tiyaḍ akkw deg Tmura n Wadda), maca useqqamu n udabu ed Tegrawt taɣelnawt llan di temdint n Den Haag.
Tarakalt[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Llan iɣrman imqqranen nniḍen deg-s: Rotterdam, Den Haag (asusru : Den Hax), Utrecht (yettsuser am Utrixt), d Eindhoven (yettsuser am Ayndhufn).
Timnaḍin n Tmura n Wadda[ẓreg | ẓreg aɣbalu]
Timura n Wadda llant ɣur-es 12 n tmnaḍin (s Tannerlandit: Provincies) :
- Groningen
- Drenthe
- Friesland
- Gelderland
- Overijssel
- Utrecht
- Hulland n Ugafa (Noord-Holland)
- Hulland n Wenẓul (Zuid-Holland)
- Zeeland
- Brabant n Ugafa (Noord-Brabant)
- Limburg
- Flevoland

Ass-a n larbee (22 zi Cutenber) tamurt teẓra ijjen temsart ɣer-s lhimmet-nnes d tameqqrant. Nessawal da x warmat n umwan (c) deg uzgen n tmurt n sennej.
Qbel ma ad dd-banent tideyyanin n ujenna, aṭṭas n wagduden iqdimen i ttuɣa ittbeddan x tfellaḥt. Ttuɣa tteggen ficta s umseḍfar n yimiren (saisons) d lweqt n taẓẓut d tmeyra.
Bnadem aqdim ila iḥesseb lweqt s tebridt d taseṭrunumt (astronomique). Bnadem ila iḍeffer anhezzi n tfukt deg ujenna, zzag-s i dd-isaqar aṭṭas n min ieebbed, manaya yeqqim 
... 
 di Yukatan deg yeffus n Miksik. Amkan-a ttraḥen ɣer-s aṭṭas n midden, ttẓuren-t.
Tḥajit teqqar, fiɣar-nni bu wafriwen Kukulan (niɣ qqaren-as Kitzalkwatel) ittas-d ɣer tmurt tnayen n twalatin deg useggas, deg wass n warmat n umwan d wenni n tfeswin.
Ittragg°aḥ-dd ufiɣer ɣer tmurt bac ad imsawaḍ aked inni i t-iḍeffren, ḥuma ad asen-iwwec tuzzegzewt d zzree d seḥḥet d tzemmar qbel ad yehwa deg waman, d netta itteeqqab ɣer umaḍal awadday.
Imayen (zi Maya) ḍefren anhezzi n tfukt mliḥ, x-as ibnan iɣr
...
ɣer tmurt, am « nnayar d leunsert ». Deg wass-a n armat i yellan d ijjen wawal wcin-tt i wass-a wanita. Ttuɣa tteqnen dag-s lmal-nnsen minzi ttuɣa ttɣilen ila ass-a dag-s i yettili umquddi jar llilet (dag-s tuefna) d uzil ( tfawt).
Deg wass-a ttemsumuḥen dag-s iwdan i ttuɣa immenɣen eawed mala ttuɣa treḍled ca n ḥajet, deg wass-a i das ɣa terred.
Maca, qa Imaziɣen aṭṭas n leewayed iweḍḍren, wer qqimen tteggen zzag-sent. Zi eada-ya nettaf Armat min ɣa yella aṭṭas n wudmawen di tussniwin n umaḍal.

Illu iwala belli ayen akk yexdem d ayen yelhan nezzeh. Laṣel n ddunit 1.31
D lḥaǧa yesean azal ameqran ma yella wid iqeblen Sidna Ԑisa d amsellek-nsen, d Ssid-nsen nutni, fehmen akken ilaq asekkud amasiḥi.
Tizrawin agi neɣ leqraya agi, treṣṣa ɣef tlata yixfawen imezwura n Tektabt Iqedsen. Si tlata yixfawen agi i d-teffeɣ tidet iseḥḥan i yellan di Tektabt Iqedsen s lekmal.
Iḥricen nniḍen n Tektabt Iqedsen ttwaḥesben lhan ladɣa i leqraya s telqayt akked uqarren gar weḥric d wayeḍ. Iwakken ad nseddu leqraya tanekmalt n yilmuden imasiḥiyen akken ma llan, ilaq-aɣ aṭas n usqerdec s telqayt akked waṭas n yisteqsiyen ; timsirin agi ihi, ur zmirent ara ad ɣ-ssiwḍent ɣer leqraya tanekmalt, ḥesbet-tent kan d ttawil swayes ara tebdum ad tt-issinem almud amasiḥi.
Iḥricen n Tektabt Iqedsen i ilaq ad tissinem s tuqqna n wallen : At Ifasus 2.4-10 ; Yuḥenna 1.29.
Timsirin:
- Numen s yiwen n Yillu kan
- Numen belli ddnub isefsed ṭṭbiea n wemdan akked txelqit
- Numen s leslak
- Numen s Sidna Ԑisa Amsellek
- Numen s tisin tis snat n Lmasiḥ akked lekmal n leslak

Tirkeft-a caren-tt seg tmesgida n Ṛṛeḥma deg Lḥamiz (agmuḍ n Lezzayer Tamaneɣt) yernu ad d-tekk ɣef snat n twilayin n Temsilt d Lbuṛj Buɛṛiṛij akken ad tessedger din učči, tiduliwin d yiseẓɣalen i 600 n twaculin ixuṣṣen deg yiɣerman, idewwaṛen d temnaḍin tidraranin.
Tirkeft-a yessuddus-itt yal aseggas uɣlif n yiweẓla isɣananen yernu tella-d deg ukatar n uɣawas aɣelnaw yerzan akk tiwilayin n tmurt i temsetlelt d taggayin ixuṣṣen deg temnaḍin tuɣḍisin.
I lmend n waya, yerra tajmilt uneɣlaf n yiweẓla isɣananen i temlilt n yilemẓiyen iwiziwen ay yettekkayen deg tallalt n yimdanen ixuṣṣen d tsentayin ayɣef d-yettweṣṣi uselway n tegduda, Abdelmadjid Tebboune, am wakken ay yessaram ad ggtent tsentayin-a ay d-yesskanayen tamsetlelt d tdukli n uɣref azzayri.

Taṣebḥit n wass aram(letnayen) 14 yunyu 2022, Mass Salah Goudjil Aselway n Usqamu n Uɣlan yemmuger, Mass Si El Hacchemi Assad, Amaray Amatu n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa.
Timlilit-a ḥeḍren deg-s yimazanen akked yiɛeggalen n snat tsudwin-a, ilmend n lemcawrat d uttekki deg usalu yenǧer Uselway n Tigduda, Mass Abdelmadjid Tebboune, iwakken ad yili lmecmel akked tdukli taɣelnawt d useǧhed n tirni n daxel. Timlilit-a tella d tagnit akken i usegzi ɣef tikli d yimahilen n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa i yesfuglen amuli wis 27 n usebdded-ines.
S wakka, mass Si El Hacemi Ɛessad, isumer iwakken ad d-yettuheggi yiwen wass awamni ɣef tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt, acku d irmad am wigi ara yesseḥbibren ɣef tmagit n tmurt n Lezzayer.

Taddart icellaḍen, d yiwet n taddart gar tudrin n Yilulen n Usammer di tama n Uqbu, aɣir n Bgayet . Di tama n ugafa, qublen-tt-id tudrin n Yillula Umalu.
Ma di tama n unzul d taddart n Mliḥa, akkin i wasif di tama n usammer d tudrin n tɣiwant n Yiɣrem”At Amar uzeggan akked d tzaɣart”, ɣer umalu d tudrin N lɛerc n uzellagen.

Si zik i yella yiwen n useqqif iwumi qqaren Afrag n ṭṭmana, yella deg-s yiwen n uɣerbaz anda slemden di lqern wis 19 aṭ

cem ara alamma teedda-d deg Ufrag n ṭṭmana.
Tajmilt i yimeɣrasen n tegrawla n 54
Ass-nni n 19 di ɣuct, taseqqamut n lɛeqqal n taddart n Yicellaḍen s lemɛawna n yimḍebbar n lewzin n Summam Lewnis n udrum At Hmiṭuc, rran tajmilt meqqren i yimeɣrasen n taddart. Ṣeggmen timeqbart, bnan axxam n umezruy anda rsen-t ttsawar d yimagraden i d-yettmeslayen ɣef wayen yeḍran di taddart n yicellaḍen di tegrawla n 54. Ad d-nesmekti d akken taddart n Yicellaḍen tefka-d aṭas n yimeɣrasen di traḍ n 1857 , imi aṭ
...
lagen . Axxam-agi, llan deg-s akk wallalen i iwulmen i leqdic n taddart : ama d idles, addal neɣ aheggi n tmeɣriwin. Yettwabna uxxam i Wat taddart, sɣur imḍebbar n lewzin uyefki Soummam, imi netta yakan d mmi-s n taddart. Di taggara n tirza-nneɣ, nemlal kra n yimezdaɣ mkul yiwen amek i d-ibeggen lferḥ-is:’’ S wallalen-agi i tesɛa taddart, nessaram ahat kra n wass ad d-nebnu kra n tfaska ara yesnernin di ccan n yidles amaziɣ s umata ‘’ i d-yenna Zahir loubar d aɛeggal n tdukkla n taddart.
B. Ben.

Icrek José Miguel Tasende i yellan d amessiwel s yisem n tseḍma taberlamant n “Vox Melilla”, jjemɛa i yeɛdun di ṭṭabla tamezwarut n “Campus’I SUR n tmerselt DENAES (abeddi x tmurt Taspanyut): timegga d tasertant, tadelsant d tamsawaḍant. Abeddi asertan x tidett-nneɣ tasertant” i yettwaggen di Sivilliya.
Deg wawal-nnes, yenna: « Aqqa jjin Mlilet weḥḥd-s zegga i teɛlem uṭunumiya-nnes, wer tt-ssidfen ca deg Wandalus. Nettat [zeɛma Mlilet] wer tzemmer ad tili s waṭṭas n tdelsiwin.» Yessiwel Tasende mani yenna ila « ḥma a ndafeɛ x tidett tamezruyant n tmurt Taspanyut di temdint-a zzat i uzewwer n umezruy ittreddajen tidett n Mlilet.»
Yeffeɣ ɣer-s nican, mani iwekked ila « Tadelsa Tamaziɣt ɛemmers ma tettwaẓẓu.» di temdint-a.
Tameskant n zzat i usinagug
Di tmeskant i yettwaggen ass n 18 Kṭuber zzat i ijjen usinagug di Mlilet, usin-d ca n midden ḥma ad din bedden aked Falesṭin alaḥsab girra-nni ittemsaren aked Israyil.
Iɛawed umessiwel-a mamec lexxu udayen zeɛma “wer zemmren ad yerḍen kippa-nnsen di berra minzi tekkʷren-ten midden.”
Adwal ɣer tidett
Lexbar-a ila tewi-t-id Melilla Hoy x umessiwel-a i yellan deg ijjen umulli aqqa-t kunṭra i imetlaɛ d iberraniyen. Yettwaḥsab zeg ifusiyen iradikaliyen di Spaniya.
Ad d-neydar ila aṭṭas n tarwa n Mlilet bdan deg iseggusa imeggura tteggen aseggʷas amaynu, mamec i yebda din wawal x uselmed n Tmaziɣt i Imaziɣen i yetteggen kṭer zeg uzgen n imezdaɣ n temdint-a Tarifit.

Muḥa ABEḤRI (1950-2003 (g l.e.)), fsis ɣifs a yakal, d aneɣmas d umyaru amaziɣ s tutlayt tafṛansist. Ikka issafeY-d g Tmesna “Etre ou ne plus être”, ungal s tutlayt tafṛansit.
Eumar Derwic (Issaɣulen tullizt-ddeɣ s tmaziɣt), ilul g useggwas n 1960 g yiɣrem n Yigwelmimen. IssufeY-d kraḍ n wammuden n tmedyazt: Anfara g 2005, Taskiwin g 2008, Ha-yi g ubrid g 2009.

08 Mars g ku aseggwas, da isfuglu umaḍal s umata ass n tmeṭṭut, yan wass igan tajmilt i tmeṭṭut Yif twuriwin nna da tesskar. 08 Mars g useggwas n 1908, iga ass g nekrent twetmin n Nyuyurek g tmurt n Marikan, g twada nna g usint asentel “ Iledjigen d uYrum” nna g nnant bibiw (s.o.s) i uzemmuzder d usselku n yizerfan n twetmin g twuri. S teeẓẓit-nnsent rurant-d uddur i tmeṭṭut g umaḍal.
Tawada n twetmin n Marikan yudja-d assa g ittumu umata n tmesmunin yusin anezwum n tmeṭṭut, g usxiter n id mma, 
... 
a xef iYf n tenbaḍt (Dihya, Tinhinan), tanezbayt (Eedju Muḥ, Faḍma n Sumar) d watig n usemYur-nnes axatar iga-t arraw-nnes, ar nettini ugma, uletma; (uletma: ulet + mma= tin mma), (ugma: ug + mma= win mma).
G tmizar n wabuḍ n Merruk nna ur ta nn-igula uratsa (réseau) n yizerfan n tmeṭṭut, tsul temYart tamaziYt da tettidir gar tudert, tudert g ur illi isem n tejmilt i tmeṭṭut, tudert nna g ur illi umya n mayed d-yuwey “wakud amaynu”, ula “tamurt n yizerfan n ufgan”, tudert nna mi ur nufi xes isem
...
Yuyyi i akw mayed igan tamesmunt, tuddsa (organistion) g umaḍal ad awsent tamYart tamaziYt g tmara d usselku nna mi iṭṭef udabu algamu. Ad qqneY amagrad-inu s yan wawal g nessemYur tameṭṭut tamaziYt, tanemmirt i id mma aY-issuḍeḍen idels d tutlayt tamaziYt, atigen n timmuzYa, id mma nna iswan tamara dlent s xub mar ad nidir. Burzemt ay id mma! isul mayed akwent-igan afrag, isul mayed akwent-issnen atig, tarwa-nnkent tgula-nn ayedda tertamt. “Wanna iran yiri-k, amm mma-nnek ur illi.” Inzi AmaziY.

Albanya
Albanya d tamurt n wenẓul-agmuḍan (sud-est) n Turuft, tezga-d deg Tzunegzirt n Balqan. Tajumma-nnes 28.748 km2 (yikilumitren imkuẓen). Zedɣen-tt 2.986.952 n yimezdaɣen (Albaniyen). Tamaneɣt-nnes d Tirana.
Aselway: Bamir Topi. Aneɣlaf Amezwaru: Sali Berisha.
Amur ameqran seg wakal n Albanya d idraren aydeg kra n tqacucin ttawḍent ɣer 2100 ed 2600 n lmitrat deg leɛlu. Izuɣar zgan-d deg utaram (lɣerb) n tmurt, ɣef yiri n Yilel Aderyati. Ugar n tis kraḍ (tis tlata) seg wakal n Albanya d tiẓegwa.
Tuget deg yimezdaɣen n Albanya seg weɣref (cceɛb) albani ay d-yudren seg Yilliriyen iqburen (d aɣref ahenduṛufi). Maca llan daɣen Yegrigiyen, Iziganen, Iserbiyen ed Yibulgaṛiyen deg Albanya. Amur ameqran seg yimezdaɣen n tmurt d Inselmen. Aṭas n Walbaniyen ay yeddren daɣen deg tmura tijiratin am Kosovo, Masidunya, Serbi akked Montenegro. Deg wemgaru-nni (ṭṭrad) n Kosovo n 1999, aṭas n Walbaniyen n Kosovo ay d-irewlen ɣer tmurt n Albanya.
Ass-a, Albanya d yiwet seg tmura tigellilin akk n Tuṛuft. Tadamsa n tmurt-a tebna ladɣa ɣef tfellaḥt yerna deg 1997, Albanya tenḍerr mliḥ seg yiwet n taluft tameqrant n tdamsa.

Tifiɣert
Tifiɣert (assaɣ ussnan: Athene noctua) d talmest n yigṭaṭ yeṭṭafaren tawacult n tiwukdtin (tawukt d bururu), tiddi-ines d tagezlant yakk d tmeẓrit tanzellayt.
AglamẒreg
Aqerru n tfiɣert d imezzi. Iqejjaren-is ɣezzif-it. Ini n tewtemt d azunɣid imal ɣer waras ma d imuren ifellayen deg-sen azagen d imellalen ma d allen-is d tiwraɣin. aqamum-is d awraɣ adnanes, ma d yiṭarren-is ččuren d afriwen iwraɣen yakk d imellalen. Tiddi-ines tga ger n 21-23 cm akken i yulac imgaraden deg talɣa ger n uwtem d tewtemt.[1]
AmyarawẒreg
Tasemhuyt n umyaraw tessentay (tbeddu) seh wayyur n fuṛaṛ. Dɣa assaɣ gar n tyuga n tfiɣert yettili d tin iddusin (ijehden) anda i yettkemmil alamma yemmut yiwen deg-sen. Yettili-d tuska n wegdef (lebni n lɛecc) gar n yiẓra neɣ s ddar n wakal neɣ ula deg tkeryas yettwaɣen anda i tessrusay tewtemt ger n 3-6 n tmellalin sin akin ad tezdel fell-asent azal n 28-33 n wussan. Ma d awtem yettawid učči i tewtemt s teɣzi n tallit n wezdal alamma frurxen-d yifrax sin akin ad myallen deg usečči-nsen. Ifrax-a ttawaṭent i waddar n uferfer d waffag mi ara wwṭen ɣer 30 neɣ 35 n wussan deg waddar-nsen.
Awliwel n uqerruẒreg

Je vous présente un poème que j’ai extrait de la revue "Culture" N° 2 de l’association socio-culturelle "Tilelli" de ma ville natale. Il lui a été envoyé le poète Aṛezqi Gennanu de Ain Benyan.
TamYaṛt
TamYaṛt f yir n lkanun
Terra-tt i lweed ucewwiq,
Ul-is yeḥzen d ameYbun
Di tasa-s iwet uceqqiq,
Arraw-is melmi ad jbun
Γer wallen as kksen lxiq ?
Nutni di lY°eṛba zehhun
Nettat tesea lhem d arfiq ;
Di taddart mar ad-teffeY
« A tağalt !, sawlen-as,
Γeṛ ccwaḍen i tezdeY
Kkaten a teYli lqima-s,
Lukan illa wergaz degneY!
Ahat ad-d iban yebbwas !
TamYaṛt agi d yemma tneY
Ilaq an nadit fell-as ;
D leqṛun gayd tettwaḥkem
Yemma tneY ezizen,
Teṛwa lmeḥna d lhem
Terna aksar d usawen
Tudert ines d ssem
Usu ines d isennanen,
Ul-is dima d asirem :
Arraw-is melmi a-tt-id fekkṛen ?

Arraw-im la d-ttbanen,
Sdukklen afus d sseḥ
Ṭṭfen akw di leahed nnsen,
Txilwet, eint-aY a ṣṣellaḥ!
Ad-d neldi tibbura yYelqen,
TamYaṛt i nesea d rrbeḥ
Tielli nneY a yimaziYen…

Mulud Mɛemmri, neɣ Mulud At Mɛemmer, d amaru, d amdan yefkan azal ameqqran i yedles d tutlayt Tamaziɣt, d netta d amezwaru iy yeslemden Tamaziɣt di tseddawit n Lezzayer. Dda Lmulud ilul ass 28 duǧember 1917 di Tewrirt Mimun deg Ayt Yanni di Tizi Wezzu. Yemmut ass 25 n furar 1989 di Ɛin n Defla deg webrid n tuɣalin-is si Merruk.
Mulud At Mɛammer yelmed, imi yella d ameẓyan, deg uɣerbaz n taddart-is. Deg 1928 yemsafer-d ɣer Lemrruk ɣef texxamt n unat-is deg Rbaṭ. Rebɛa n yiseggasen mbeɛd yuɣal-d ɣer Lezzayer ad ikemmel almad-ines deg uɣerbaz iwumi qqaren “Bugeaud” di temdint n Lezzayer; kra n yiseggasen mbeɛd, imi ikemmel-d almad-is, yeǧǧa-d aneggaru-agi ɣef yewwin aɣerbaz nniḍen iwumi qqaren “Louis-le-Grand” di temdint n Paris i wakken ad yuɣal d aselmad. (Kemmel leqraya...)

Ass amezwaru g tt-yannay ar d-tteggez seg umesnay (bus) ibeddan dat usasu (Café) « les roches » g waqqa n Tiẓgi, isella i kra n wawal ikka-d agensu-nnes, inna-as : «Nker ! Nettat aya ! ». Inmala ɣer amesnay, inna i yirumiyen degs d-ittegzen :
« Anṣuf-issun g waqqa n Tdeɣt ! ». Inmala ɣer tmeṭṭuṭ tawessart, inna-as :
– Azul a massa, anṣuf-issem ! Axes ur trid kra n tɣawsa ?
– Tanemmirt-nnek ! Riɣ ad ɣliɣ asif, ad akiɣ s uqraf n waman. Mek tɣiyed ad i-tawsed ad ɣliɣ !
– S umdaz !
Yumeẓ-as afus, dd
... 
uyt ammi teɣli … ɣef ulxix neɣ ɣef ka yaḍen. Nekkin tillas ag ddreɣ !
Ibedda iddeɣ yannay imeṭṭawen ar sfikkiten ɣef waggayen n Claire. Tenna-as :
– Awed nekkin, addad (situation) amm winnek ag ddreɣ ! Nekkin tazumi (solitude) ayed i-inɣan. Awed yan ur da digi iseqsa. Awed yan i-iran acku wessireɣ !
– Uhu a lalla. Ad ur ttinid ayennaɣ. Ha-yi a-ya idem. Mayed trid ?
– Mer ufiɣ iɣwzif ! Mer ufiɣ ur idk beṭṭuɣ !
Tfesta, ifest awed netta. Teɣra i userbay ad asen-ik ad tčin imekli. Zzrin tameddit n w
...
 ». Tenna-asen : « Ur nniɣ !». Ruran-as : « Ur am illi ».
Nettat ttukraf. Ur yad tɣiy ad tawi arba as yad iqqarem « mma », ula tɣiy ad t-tfel. Teqqima nettat d urba g taddart n mma n Muḥa. Netta iqqima g tmazirt n usemmiḍ. Mzarayen.
Zrin itsen imalasen, yuɣul-d ɣer tmazirt. Iddem diɣ ar ittini i ymerrayen (touristes) g waqqa n Tiẓgi:
– Anṣuf-issun g tmazirt n tafuyt … Alxix n Merzuga … Aɣlay d uneqqeṛ n tafuyt … amm nitni ur illi … g Bariz.
Yaru-t: Aksel AZERGI

Dda Lmulud ilul ass 28 dujember 1917 di Tewrirt Mimun deg Ayt Yanni di Tizi Uzzu. Yemmut ass 25 n furar 1989 di ɛin n Defla deg webrid n tuɣalin-is si Merruk..
Mulud At Mɛammer yelmed, imi yella d amecṭuḥ, deg uɣerbaz n taddart-is. Deg 1928 yemsafr-ed ɣer Lmrruk ɣef taxxamt n unat-is g Rbaṭ. Rebɛa iseggasen mbeɛd yuɣal-ed ɣer Lezzayer ad ikemmel almad ines deg uɣerbaz iwumi qqaren “Bugeaud” di temdint n Lezzayer; kra n iseggasen mbeɛd, imi ikeml-ed almad-is, yeǧǧa-d aneggaru agi ɣef yewin aɣerbaz nniden iwumi qqaren “Louis-le-Grand” di temdint n Paris iwakken ad yuɣal d aselmad.

Tafrara ungal sYuṛ Salem ZeniaTagi t-tadyant n yiwen weqcic, d aqbayli. Asmi yella d ilemẓi immuger yiwet teqcict yebYa at-tyaY nnan-as :
" alla! mačči t-tagi i-k ilaqen " .Alaxater taqcict nni tugar-ik s kra iseggasen.
Asmi i d immed inuda f tlelli n tmurt, inuda f iz'uran-is yufa ulac. Ihi yebda yekka-t uzal ama di 1980 ama di 1982 mi d fYen atmaten inselmen. Ikcem leḥbus yečča aeekkaz almi yemmut.

Lḥu AzergiEumar Derwic.
Ur sar ttuY ass-nnaY. Tessawi tafuyt Yer aYelluy d yennayer Yer tgira-nnes. Nek beddigh ammas n tasukt. Imiq, isteY ususem amm tegnut. Inker uYuyyi. Ngin wasuken s wulli tisiḍaṛin isdey uYyiys. Rwasen-t medden ikjem yizem. Ssnekren-t ageḍṛuṛ. Sfadin-t akal s iḍarṛen gezmen ifexsa d ifurusen s ijenway-nnsen isemmaḍen.
FfYent-d wallen nnsent. Ifassen teYwma tafuyt, ar kerrzen ifs n ugezzay d uters Yef waggayen iswan s imetṭi. Awal ittebbey g imawen izmummḥen, itteffeY-d inn
... 
 tiqqwit n teYwyal. GniY ul-inu. SsaYuleY-t amm tbarda, maka ur riY ad t-zzenzeY. Ur riY ad t-keY i awed yan.
BeddiY ammas n medden ittrun, yuggan iYef i tfekka n umnukal temger tmattant. Awed g tmattant Ywmanas udem ad as-zlen tawerYi. Takerrust tteddu. NezYen-tt iysan iderYalen Yef ubrid isselkamen Yer tmeḍlin. Abrid issa s iYsan n iregzen ittunYan. NezYen medden ulawen-nnsen, ddun deffer n tkerrust tageldant, ar kerrzen udmawen d idmaren-nnsen, sfuffind izlan, ttin i tkerrust iYwman s idammen
...
maren-inu. Ig akw azeggwaY s idammen …
Ajenwi n umxezni ibbey-i ul, ibḍat Yef sin !
NekreY, seksuY Yer asuk seg usfaylu n tgemmi. ẒriY medden da ttrun, ar teddun deffer n tkerrust n ugellid immuten. Nek iYf-inu isul-nn g tgemmi n tmegganin. Tawengimt-inu tsul ar ttini : Ad iddu ad iqewwed … Ad iYus g uzerdab … Idder neY immut … Ur i-iddi ka !
Xnifra, awilan n 1999

Wp/rif/Haj Mohand Tayeb
Haj Mohand Tayeb ijen âlem n din dh'qbayli yetwassen s th'messna ennes tha meqeant dhi g iyyar n th'Mesremt, idhi yegga attas n conferanssath s th qabaylect (tha Mazight n leqbayel dhi Dzayar). isejjel ura dh sintath n xutba dhi th'mesremt s th'mazight. Maca a muar ra Haj Mohand Tayeb yegga ijen erxedheth dh tha meqqrant attas, umi y tujma Quraan elkarim gha th'mazight. Tarjama ya n Quraan thetwadhbeâ dhi Saâudiya mani dhas yetwuwch ijen wissam x erxedhmeth a tha meqqrant n th'messremt y yegga. Zath y u tujem a gh th qbayrect tugh yizwa mass Houceine Jouhadi ituajem Quraan gha th'mazigh n Sous. Awani 10 y seggussa n erxedhmeth yessufeghd Houceine Jouhadi trjama ennes dig segguas n 2003. Houceine Jouhadi yexreq dhi Casablanca 1942 ghas lantrit zi th'wzith n th'ghuri awani 40 y segguassa n erxedhmeth. I zuran ennes zi Ait baâmran mani y yehfedh Quraan yekmer. Zath y u tujem n Quraan yessefughd adhellis eqqan as Tagharast n Ureqqas n Rebbi (Rabat, Publications de l’Amrec, 1995) min ixes adh yini s th'rifect "tha vrit nw a reqqas n Abbi" Houceine Jouhadi edh Mohand Tayeb dhfan s th'zemma ya thi meqqranin y eggin tha vrit tha zirath y thebdha th'jedjidht n i burghwathen dhi ennej n Maghrib. tha vrit a ixef kemmren i mravdhen nwadday n maghrib zi erqan n XV.

Deg tḍullit n ussenked n usnegmu d ussegzi n unfal amsiger di tallit n Baba Hamed d warraw-is, ɣesten ad qedcen deg umsal n tfenda d uheggi anawwaɣ, dɣa deg furar 2000 i d-nnulfa termist-agi. Deg wakud tarmist tamassayt AROMPLUS terfed tamusni tayiwnant seg uramsu-ines d iseflan n teɣlamt.

heyyan i useqdec" i tmegrist d ubreqqes tifendiwin n urekti d imengi i temguri n wagal (glaciers- yaourtiers-patissiers-confisseurs- Biscuiteries...)
