Asedwel ɣer Tmaziɣt : Omar LMEDDAM, Tawlaft : Ahmed Abdelkhalki
Jjiɣ twuri-inu di lqehwa. Wami ttuɣa-ayi zgenfiɣ lemdeɣ ad ymareɣ ijḍaḍ di teḥwict. Ṭṭfeɣ ijjen wesɣun iqseḥ qqneɣ-t ɣer yijjen wurtu tteggeɣ zzay-s ḥennayrur. Ḥennayrur iskukkuḍ-ayi. Itttkkar-ayi ubellaw-inu ameẓẓyan xminni tteggeɣ ḥennayrur. Lemdeɣ afdaḥ di tsarijt zi ttessawen taḥwict. Tekkreɣ zic ad acreɣ igumma zi tseklutin, iyaẓiḍen d tmellalin-nsen d waṣḍawen n yedbiren. Marra imucan n wassḍawen di teḥwict ssneɣ-ten. Min ttaf
... 
Tbehḍeɣ. Tweṭṭa tazart zeg wufus-inu. Sɣellyeɣ tenni deg uqemmum-inu. Tazyawt-inu tfarɣ. Iwḍa zzay-s wezyen. Teyyar d tfuct tezweɣ awarn-as dinni tfawt am tmellalt tarreẓ di tẓewḍa d tazeyzawt. Lmal sebbḥen. Ijjen wejḍiḍ itjaw idbiren tɣerɣiren, ijjen uyaẓiḍ isququɛ, asḥunḍart n yijjen weɣyul isdurri maṛṛa timijjawin wer twiliɣ. Wer twiliɣ ḥa tenni … iteksen arruḍ.
Asiya tekkes arruḍ. Txarrseɣ marra min illan itekkes arruḍ : tiseklutin weṭṭant-asent tefray, iwdan ittwakkes-asen warruḍ, lmal iweṭ
...
: xef uɛeddis-nnes, wef weɛrur-nnesn xef iɣezdisa-nnes, xef uzellif-nnes niɣ tbedd am tzeyyat deg waman teɣli niɣ ksin-tt waman. I cḥal icna mala tɣil wer tt-ittwili ula d ijjen.
Tuliy d teqdiddis. Tettebheḍ. Tesnuffura idmaren-nnes s uɣil nnes aẓelmaḍ, s ufusi swadday nnes. Trezzu s utebheḍ d tiggʷdi. Tamettant-inu ! tettarra s wudem ammu d wammu s tiggʷdi. Tamettant-inu ! tufa nawwa-nnes. Tireḍ-itt amen tarekkʷal. Tweḍḍar temlel-nnes. Tteḍṣiɣ s tibbuhelya. Aɣyul tanya isdurri marra timejjawin.

Waxxa idder tudert d taquḍaḍ maca waxxa amenni ijja limart-nnes deg umezruy n unhezzi n Tmaziɣt. D ijjen ttuɣa-t d artista, isselmad tẓuri ɛawed mamec i t-ttuɣa d ameɣnas n Tmaziɣt. Iqqim lebda iccat x Tmaziɣt ar mani d ass-nnes ameggaru, mani ttuɣa i t-iɣleb uxenzir. Nessawal da x umeɣnas Muḥend Ameẓẓyan Ssɛidi.
Iwdan i t-id-itteffkkren, ttfekkren-t-id s ikarikaturen-nnes i ttuɣa i d-ifesser x jjurnalt n Tmaziɣt, ɛawed s ubeddi-nnes ameqqran aked inekraf n umussu adelsan n Tmaziɣt deg useggas n
... 
y, deg useggas n 1997 immuti ad issɣer ɣer usinan n Mulay Rcid di Rracidiya.
Zeg useggas n 2010-2011 iɛqeb-d ɣer Midelt, amkan mani i ilul. Dag-s i yegga deg wayyuren imezwura ijjen laksiḍa, irreẓ zeg iḍaren, yejj-it waya ad iqqim d ameɛḍur ca n tnayen iseggusa, wer inni ad iggenfa al mani yufa ila axenzir iṭṭef arrimet-nnes.
Laṭṭan-a wer kid-s yufi agenfi, waxxa netta ttuɣa ittmuttuy jar klinikat n Arbaṭ d Lqniṭra ar mani immut tameddit n 21 Dujenbar aseggas n 2013 di Midelt.
Muḥend Ameẓẓyan Ss
...
 itegg tisawurin maḥend ad issemɣar ula zi tzemmer n temɣarin.
Muḥend Ameẓẓyan Sɛidi, ttuɣa-t d argaz d Maziɣ n tidet, iqqim iṭṭef deg izalen n Tmaziɣt, iqqim ɛawed d ilelli, ixḍar ad idder s tinzar-nnes i yuɛlan. Yumen di Tmaziɣt.
Deg wass n tmettant-nnes, deg useggas n 2013, usin-d imeddukal-nnes mani mma, maḥend ad ssijen asijji ameggaru x umeddukel-nnes i yewcin zi tzemmar-nnes i Tmaziɣt, ɛemmers ma iqqemcec x-as s ca n ḥajet. Bandu n Umaziɣ x wemḍel-nnes, iderreɛ i ucal i yessen, yessen-it.

Par DDK | 30 Juillet 2018 | 577 lecture(s)
Aɣlif n uselmed uffrin d unadi ussnan
Yebda seg wass-nni n lexmis ujerred n yisdawanen imaynuten
Inelmaden i d-yewwin akayad n taggara n tesnawit BAC, bdan jerden iman-nsen deg tesdawiyin n tmurt seg wass-nni n lexmis 26 yulyu alamma d ass n 16 cutember 2018, i lmend n useggas asdawan 2018-2019. Ad yili ujerred-agi ɣef 4 yimecwaren (étapes), amecwar amezwaru, yebda ass-nni lexmis 26 yulyu 2018, alamma d ass n ssebt 07 ɣuct i d-iteddun. D talliit ideg ar
... 
ion) n ujerred amezwara, yebda iḍelli n lḥed ad ikemmel ass-agi n letnayen 30 yulyu 2018. Seg uzekka alamma d ass n 07 ɣuct 2018, ad fernen yinelmaden ayen ara ɣren, gar wayen n teskiwin i d asen-d-yettunefken, ad fernen gar-asent. Am wakken daɣen i yexdem uɣlif-agi, tiwwura yellin deg tesdawiyin, yebdan ass-nni n ttlata 24 alamma d ass-agi n letnayen 30 yulyu. Ma d iswi n tewwura-agi yellin, d awelleh iwatan i yinelmaden-agi imaynuten, d tagnit daɣen i wakken ad ẓren d acu bɣan ad ɣren di tesda
...
, gar 13 alamma d 15 ɣuct, i uɛiwed n tmuɣli deg yinelmaden-nni ixesren ikayaden-nni n unekcum, ad yili uwelleh-nsen ɣer wayen-nniḍen. Alaḥsab n tfenda, i d-yefka uɣlif n uselmed uffrin d unadi ussnan, ass n 16 deg waggur-agi i d-iteddun, zemren yinelmaden ad ẓren d acu iten-ceggɛen ad ɣren. Amecwar wis tlata, d ayen yerzan ajerred aneggaru. Annect-agi ad yili gar 02 alamma d 06 cutember i d-iteddun. Ma d amecwar wis rebɛa, ad yili deg-s usersi n zzmamat n usiweḍ d wid n la Bourse.
Ghani Amazigh

Abdessamad Zeryouhi
Diskutikat di Fransa ixessa ad belɛen 4 n simanat i dd-yegguren. Rni ɣer-s ad ziyyaren lqanun i yeqqnen ɣrr tkumam di ssekwilat.
D manaya i yenna uwzir amzewaru n Fransa Jean Castex. Aẓiyyar-a ad ggen ḥuma d sneqsen zeg ubirus n corona.
Abeleɛ n ddiskutikat ad yrbda ass n jjemɛa 10 dujembir. Ɛlaḥsab lwizara n usxinctar ca n 1200 n ddiskutikat i ɣa yeccen tikti s lqanun-a n jdid.
Maca lḥukuma Tafransist a kid-sen teswiza ḥuma wer ssazayen.
Lxedmet zi laggᵒaj (home office)
Zi lux d tsawent ixessa ra d iḥenjiren imeẓyanen ad teggen tikumam di lemraḥ n ssekwila.
Maca wer ttbeliɛen ca ssekwilat ij n umalas zzat i lkunji n tjarst am mamec ggin di Biljik.
Ɛawed yenna Castex ixessa ccarakat ad sxedment ixeddamen zi taddart mecḥal ma zemmerent. Rni ɣer-s tisineft wis 3 i rezzun ad ggen i waṭṭas n yewdan.
Ifransisen i ɣer yella kṭer zi 65 n iseggʷusa zemmeren ad ggen tisineft-a wis 3 bla assejel.
Tisinaf i imeẓẓyanen
Ra d iḥenjiren d tḥenjirin i ɣer illa jer 5 d 11 n iseggusa zemmern ad ggen tisinaf. Ar lux ja tteggen tisinaf i iḥenjiren i di yella lehlak waha.
Lqanun-a n jjdid wer yewɛar am wrnni i ggin di lmujat yeɛdan. Inna uwzir amezwaru Castex: Rux walli ca d akud n ubelleɛ, lqanunat ixsa ad irin am mamec yella lḥal.
Tala: hln.be/

Ayalas El Moudjahid yeldi taẓrigt-is n Usiḍyas-a (ssebt) s tirzi n Uselway n Tegduda Abdelmadjid Tebboune, iga ɣer tesɣimt n Udabu aɣelnaw amzireg n tefranin, anda i d-yesseɣret dakken « tekfa tallit-nni n yitugen.
Yuɣal-d daɣen uɣmis ɣef uḍman n teffrawent i d-yefka Udabu aɣelnaw amzireg n tefranin akked usaḍuf yerna yemmeslay-d ɣef tmuɣli tamatut, s yizwilen, ɣef yisgar n wumuɣen n yimazwaren i d-yettwasumren i yiɣermanen.
Taseɣrut-a n Uselway n Tegduda ters-d daɣen deg usebter amezwaru n uyalas « Horizons » i igan yiwen n ukaram i wass n tefrant-a s umeslay ɣef wallalen itwilanen i yettwafken i wass n usihar-a afranan.
Yella-d daɣen umeslay ɣef ugzam akked tmuɣliwin tiqburin akked useḍru n yibeddilen s wallus n usun asertan deg umni, rnan-d wariden gan yimsensertiyen ɣef utug n uttekki akked tmuɣli-nsen ɣef ugaw i d-iteddun.

Lʼinjil ɣares ṯnayen n yisemawen, qqaren-as Lʼinjil ƹaweḏ qqaren-as Ȓƹaheḏ ḏ jḏiḏ. Lʼinjil ḏayes 27 n ssuraṯ. Ssura wis ṯȓaṯa yuri-t Siḏna Luqa, ṯtarjem ḏanita s ṯmaziɣṯ n Arrif, iƹni ṯarifiṯ. Min iƹna Siḏna Luqa? Netta ḏ ijjen zi ȓmuminin imezwura n Siḏna Ƹisa. Netta ḏ aḍbib ḏ ameddukeȓ n arrasul Bulus, itsafar akiḏes ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes. Ṯeqqar Ssura n Siḏna Luqa ḏeg wuḏem wis 1 zi lʼaya 26 aȓ 35: Wami Ilizabet ṯeǧa ḏi char wis setta, issekk Arebbi Jibril ɣar ij n ṯendint ḏi Ljalil qqaren-as Nnaṣira. Iruḥ ɣar ij n ṯeƹzrect qqaren-as Maryam, kiḏ igga zzujiya ij n uryaz zi ddurriṯ n Dawud qqaren-as Yusef. Yuḏef ɣares lmalaʼika inna-as: "Sȓam xam, ya ṯenni iy xef irḍa Arebbi, Siḏi Arebbi akiḏem." Ḏinni ṯnexȓeƹ Maryam wami ṯesȓa i wawaȓ-a n lmalaʼika. Ṯenna ḏeg yixef nnes mant ȓmaƹna n sȓam-a? Inna-as lmalaʼika: "War teggweḏ, a Maryam, xam arḍa n Arebbi! Aḏ teysiḏ aƹeddis, aḏ tejjeḏ ij n uḥenjir aṯ tsemmiḏ Ƹisa. Aḏ yiȓi ḏ ameqqran, ataf tȓaɣan-as mmis n wenni yuƹȓan. Aḏas yuc Siḏi Arebbi nnes lƹarc n jeddis Dawud. Aḏ iḥkem x ccaƹb n Yaƹqub i ȓebda, ȓmulk nnes ƹemmarṣ aḏ ifna." Ṯenna-as Maryam i lmalaʼika: "Mammec manaya? Qa nec ḏ ṯaƹzrect." Ijaweb-it lmalaʼika nni: "Axam d ihwa Arruḥ iqedsen, jjehḏ n wenni yuƹȓan axam igg ṯiȓi. S manaya aḥenjir iqedsen iy ɣa ṯejjeḏ ataf tȓaɣan-as Mmis n Arebbi. Ɣer niɣ ṣenneṭ swadday i wawaȓen nneɣnit n Arebbi iy d yusin ḏi Ssura n Siḏna Luqa.

Ayyuz Timaziɣin d imaziɣen neɣ…
Ass-a immut Lḥsen Bumyya, Ṛrays amqran nna -d akw nufa, yan g ifittwan (addagen) n uẓawan amaziɣ g iffus (sud) n tmazirt neɣ, Bumyya iga yan Ṛrays nna iflen timitar nes g y-iger n uẓawan amaziɣ g tmazirt neɣ, irir d Ulbensir (Demsiri), d ṛrways imqranen nna yufa g tizi nes, ig s ɣ mek an Ṛrays nna jun ur rad nettu.
Ad isunfu Ṛrays neɣ g usmḍl nes ig as umarg asmun, tg as tmazɣa tar azal, gin as imddukkal d tmddukkal nes tismmunin d ismmunen g tudert an yaḍen.

Ttekkan deg temlilit-a, ineɣlafen yettwakelfen s Ugensu, s Umesni, s Tdawsa, s Temguri n ddwawi, s tsemmeskelt n yisegnaf akked uselway n Tnegga taɣelnawt n tɣellist tadawsant.
Timlilit-a zerwen deg-s "amhaz n liḥala tasenbayyurant n unafafad Bu Tesmert Covid-19 akked wakaten idawsanen yettwazgan i sersen dseg temṣukin tidawsanin akked usegrew n wallalen akked yiɣbula n tmerna i uqabel n unerni aneggaru n umḍan n yimuḍinen", i d-yesseddi ulɣu.
Seg yidis-iḍen, skeyden "tuttra n tiwin n tgezzayt mgal n unafafad Bu Tesmert Covid-19, ladɣa seg d-iban dakken uẓen deg twala n usnefli n termit n ufaris-a seg yidis n mennaw n tnarmin n ddwa", i yerna yenna-d uɣbalu-nni.

Sekkʷar d mizid ‑ ar da nemsefham. Maca cḥal i yxess anec n sekkʷar deg ass? cḥal yeddarra taddut nneɣ? melmi nzemmer ad nini ssekʷar d aɛeffan? ɣerm, ad tesnem.
Ict ict!
- Min yeɛna ssekʷar beɛda?
- Cḥal n sekkʷar i dd‑yekkren i ddat‑nneɣ deg Ass?
- Min ittemsaran i ssekʷar di taddut‑nneɣ?
- Min yeɛna ssekʷar n sanida?
- Ssekʷar n Fruta yifa ssekʷar nurmal??
- Tidet ssekʷar d aɛeffan?
- Ssekʷar d ttebriyyet?
- I mala kseɣ xaf‑s qaɛ?
- Minzi zemmreɣ ad bedleɣ ssekʷar?
- Minzi ɣa sneɣ cḥal n ssek
... 
 ssekʷar d aɛeffan?
Ssekʷar urid d aɛeffan anict n min xaf‑s qqaren. Maca la dda, « Arhaj ittili deg aṭṭas ». Mala nexzer leḥsab n WHO, akd anict n min tetten Irifyyen n sekkʷar. qa wwet setta n tɣenjayin nni di tlata mala drust.
Seḥḥet (tadunt), lehlak n ssekʷar Typ 2, ur d watansyu, d ca n lehlakat n uxenzir. ttgenfan niɣ tmernin mala temmerni macca n ssekʷar.
min yixs ad yini manaya: Wenni itetten aṭṭas n ssekʷar yucit i weṣṭal waha. Itsennaɛ lehlakat‑a di taddut nnes wer ittici. Manaya urid 
...
zi lḥajet‑nni. Malla tettwac zzag‑s dubli, qa d 30% zi macca n wass. maca cek tegged leḥsab n upurtsyun i xaf-s urin waha. Cḥal dag-s n Gramm deg upurtsyun, wer t yeqqer ḥed.
Mant lḥell zi ɣa nssenqess zi ssekʷar yyeffren: Ad nagʷej x macca ixedmen, tpakiṭar teɛdel. ad nec min tsɣemmay tmurt, d min nesnanna s ufus nneɣ. Ad nelmed ad nsu atay d lqehwa d ineqsi di ssekʷar.
Nec beɛda kseɣ xaf‑s zi melmi. i kenniw? qa ɛad tkeṭṭrem ssekʷar deg atay d lqehwa? cḥal dawem itekk kilu n ssekʷar?
Ɣer ɛawd:

Aẓum ntta adday ibeƹƹed benadam i wutci d waman (Astir 4:16 ; Ufuɣ 34:28). La itekkes umumen utci i ddat nnes ḥma ad ur ig lxaḍer nnes ntta maca ad ixemmem g lxaḍer n rebbi. Aẓum maci ad itc benadam g iḍ ḥma ad ur itc s wass. Unna ittaẓumen, maci ḥma ad irzu utci ɣer tadggwat. La ittaẓum umumen ḥma ad iqerreb i rebbi, maci i midden.
Han mayd inna lmasiḥ xef uyad: « adday taẓumem ad ur teqqnat inir nnun am lmunafiqin nna isexsaṛ udmawen nnesen ḥma ad neƹten i midden is aẓumen. S titt awen ttinix 
... 
nesen. Id cegg adday taẓumt, dhen ixf nnec tssirtt udem nnec ḥma ur tteḍhart i midden is taẓumt, maca i ibbac nna issen mayd illan g wul nnec, Ntta ad-ac irar ingratun » (Matta 6:16-18).
Day inni dix altu linjil: Day iqqis sidna ƹisa lqist-ad i winna da ttinin g ixfawen nnesen hatin mnan aha ar tḥeqqarn wiyaḍ, inna-yasen: « Ddan sin n irgezn ɣer taddart n rebbi ḥma ad ẓẓalin, yuk aferrisi d wayḍ aṣennak. Day ibedd uferrisi ar itẓalla ingr-as d ixf nnes ar ittini: « A rebbi, da-c teḥmadx iddex ur
...
 midden ḍnin nna da ttacernin, ar ttekkesex leƹcur xef winna da-d ttrarax kul ». Id aṣennak, ibedda g ttisaƹ ur iɣi awd ad ihezza allen nnes ɣer igenna, ar ikkat idmarn nnes ar ittini: « A rebbi rḥem-yi, hatin gix imeƹsi! » Ad-awen inix: Hatin aṣennak ad idda ɣer taddart nnes irḍa ɣifs rebbi, ur-id am uferrisi. Iddex unna issemẓiyn ixf nnes idda ad ittusxater id unna isxatern ixf nnes idda ad ittussemẓiy » (Luqa 18:9-14).
Sseɣd i lbarnamej n rradyu xef uẓum nna iga sidna ƹisa: Ajerreb n lmasiḥ .

Par DDK | 19 Juin 2017 | 332 lecture(s)
Tiɣri n tcennayt Louiza
Tebɣa ad teḥlu akken ad tkemmel ccna
Ussan-agi ineggura, Tger-d tcennayt taqbaylit Louiza tiɣri i Leqbayel i wakken ad tt-ɛiwnen s tedrimt imi i d-yeɣli-d fell-as waṭṭan. Aṭas n ttawilat i as-ilaqen, ladɣa lmesruf, netta ur tezmir ara ad t-tqabel. Ɣef wakken i d-tenna tiɣri-agi ur tettuneḥsab ara d tuttra, maca tewwed-as tfidi s iɣes. “Xas imejjayen deg tmurt n Lezzayer ẓewwren, maca ulac dwawi i iwulmen’’, i twala tcennayt Louiza. 
... 
ebɛa les scanners d 660 n tsegnatin. Aya-agi yeḍḥa-d dayen ɣlayen, ur tezmir ara ad txelles akk anect-a. Tenna-d belli snen-tt Leqbayel tcennu seg useggas n 1978 ar ass-a n wussan. Mazal ur teqḍiɛ ara layas. Tebɣa ad teḥlu akken ad tkemmel ccna. Tecna ɣef tmurt, ɣef tmeṭṭut , ɣef lḥerma. Tḥemmel ifennan imeqqranen, yecban slimane Azem , Ait menguellet, Matoub Lounes d wiyad-nniden. Tenna-d belli tsetḥa imi i d -tessutet deg Leqbayel akken ad tt-ɛiwnen, meɛna d lehlak-agi d amcum i d-yeɣlin fell-
...
yefk ayen iwumi yezmer ma yehwa-as 100DA, awi-d kan ad ḥluɣ. Kra n win i yi-d-yessutren zik, cennugh-as baṭel imi mačči d adrim i d ssaḥ. Cennugh s nnif d lḥerma, i leqbayel i teqbaylit », i tessuter tdeg Leqbayel tcennayt Louiza. Am wakken, diɣ, tessutur deg tdukkliwin ad tt-ɛiwnen, yerna teqqar-asen ma yella teḥla, ayen ara d-yegrin n yidrimen, ad tent-tefk i tdukkliwin-agi. Tekfa tiɣri-s s wawal-a « Imi i ken-ḥemmleɣ, tḥemmlem-iyi i d-ssutureɣ deg-wen afus n tallelt, akken ad jjiɣ ».
Z. B. Y.

Caṛlman
Caṛlman (S Tfransist: Charlemagne, s Tallatint: Carolus magnus) yiwi ula assaɣ n "Caṛl Amzwaru d Umqqran" , iga agllid n Ifṛankiyn gr usggʷas n 768 d 814 d win Lumbard (774-814), ig amnkud f tmnukda n utaram gr 800 d 814 lli ismunn kṛaḍt tamttiwin ad tnt igan d ifranṣiṣn d Lalman d ṭṭalyan, yat tmnukda iflan ayad da iɣʷin sɣ ugarru Aṭlanti ar yill Ablṭiq, sɣ idrarn n Birini ar asif n Ddanub ig yan wudm yiwin ajahcca ɣammas wamun n iṛmmuyn ɣ wakud ann, ilul d ɣ wis sin n Brir n usggʷas 742 ɣ wakal n Bljiga n ɣassad, immt ɣ wass n 28 Ynnayr n 814, ikka tt inn ar isasra awttas ad iskr yat Urubba imunn s usgd Amasiḥi, ila yan ufus ɣ mad as ismn tankra Takaṛulingit acku issbɣs assudr n tdlsa d ulmmud, iṛẓm tinmal d tsdlisin d Tskribturt (Ɣilli ɣ ar smattayn iḍṛiṣn) ɣ kullu tmizar kcmnin ddu tmnukda nns.

Le Rifain
Isewwer yijjen uḥudri zi Ayt Cicar ijjen ubidyu ifser-it x youtube, yesskan deg-s tisurifin i yeḍfer bac ad yessenw « Taznunt ».
Ta zi maccat i ttun yewdan n yiḍa deg waṭṭas n imucan, aked uɣezdis n maccat nneɣni i ttuɣa tteggen lejdud d tḥennatin-nneɣ. Am lemgibiɛa d uferfur d uḥerḥur d icarecmen ….
Taznunt, amen yesskan ubidyu-ya, ḥeffren-as di tmurt, tteqqden din i ikeccuḍen al ɣa dḥan d tiyerjin. zi ssenni, srusan dinni baṭaṭa d ṭṭri, tterran x-as isli. Ttbellaɛen x-as wer itteffeɣ lefwar. al ɣa sḥeqqen tenwa, ad raḥen a x-as reẓmen.

Par DDK | 13 Aout 2018 | 527 lecture(s)
Souk El Ténine
Asuddes n yiwet n temhelt n usizdeg n ubrid n ugerzu wis 147
Deg tazwara n ddurt iɛeddan, heggan-d yiɛegallen n Useqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Souk El Ténine, yettabaɛen ɣer dayra n Mɛatqa, u s lemɛawna n yiɛeggalen n Useqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Umecras, yettabaɛen ɣer dayra n Buɣni, yiwet n temhelt n usizdeg n ubrid n ugerzu wis 147 icudden aṭas n tɣiwanin n ugerzu, gar-asent taɣiwant n Souk El Ténine d tɣiwant n Umecras. Yusa-d leqdic-agi, 
... 
 izelgen udem n snat n tɣiwanin-agi. Ulac tiɣmert zegglen yiguduyen, seg tɣiwant n Souk El Ténine alamma d taɣiwant n Umecras, ladɣa deg ugudu n Baylek i iɣelqen acḥal d aseggas aya. Yeggra-d ubrid wis 147 deg yir addad seg yiḍuman i ṭeggiren yimsebriden n yal ass deg leryuf n ubrid-agi. Aya, dayen i d-ixelqen iguduyen ur yezgilen ara ula d yiwen n wadag deg ubrid-agi. Ulac amḍiq anda ur tettafeḍ ara ixuččan d iḍuman, ladɣa iqerɛunen n yiɣisem. Ɣef waya, smarsen yimḍebren n snat n tɣiwanin ttawi
...
t n uɛemmer d uḍummu, i wakken ad sneqqsen i twaɣit-agi. Ad nesmekti kan d akken mačči d tikkelt tamazwarut i d-heggant tɣiwanin-agi leqdicat n usizdeg n ubrid wis 147, maca yettuɣal dima ɣer waddad-ines, s sebba lexṣas n tnuggit n yimdanen d imsebriden yetṭeggiren kan iḍuman-nsen deg yal tiɣmert n ubrid. Tamsalt n tezdeg d tamsalt n yal amdan, yal yiwen yewwi-d fell-as ad yesseḥbiber ɣef twennadt d ugama i deg yettidir. Ass-a yewwi-d uɛiwed n tmuɣli deg tikliwin i icudden ɣer tezdeg.
Ali Zalouk

While Microsoft’s Internet Explorer still comes pre-installed on most Windows-based PCs, clearly Microsoft would prefer you to use their Edge browser, which is set as the default when you purchase.
Ddeqs n yiseggasen aya i yeǧǧa Microsoft ticreḍt-ines Internet Explorer, ɣef laǧalt n yiminig-ines Edge i yettwaleqqmen i Windows 10. Ɣas akken, aseqdec ẓẓayen n Edge yesnulfa-d taxxamt i Internet Explore, aṭas aṭas ɣef ssebbat n umṣada n yimahilen.
Dagi, ad nserwes gar yiminig-nneɣ Firefox Browser d 
... 
gi ad d-iban ulac deg-s, maca tidet, anamek n waya d imelyan n yimdanen i yesfaydayen seg termit n internet iwumi ẓẓay usidar d uskan, iwumi isebtar ur d-ttbanen ara akken iwata — rnu ɣef waya akk, uguren n tɣellist iɣef d-newwi awal yakan.
Tidet kan, ssebbat n useqdec n Internet Explorer sɣur ineflayen d asekyed n yismal-nsen akken ad walin sani ttakken acbi ɣef yiminig aqdim neɣ sɣur tkebbanit i yesɛan kzn isnan uzɣinen i iteddun ala akked yiminig Internet Explorer.
Seg tama-nniḍen, Firefox d 
...
n tikci n tirmit meqqren ɣef yibenkan akken ma llan. Deg userwes s lmizan mačči d timsizzelt. Firefox d netta i d-yufraren deg meṛṛa taggayin n uktazal. Ma yella yufa-k-id lḥal deg uxxam n Nana isseqdac Internet Explorer, ahat tebɣiḍ ad as-tefkeḍ tallalt sader-as-d Firefox.

Tineggizt
Tineggizt d azzug i d-ileffun i tesga (tasga d izi i d-izzin i turin).[1] llan waṭas n yisragen d tmentilin iy zemren ad iglun s tneggizt maca ammusen invirusen (am tegnatin n yigem anvirus) yettenfufuden seg turin ar umruj n tesga iga d aserag imezdi yakk s waṭas.[2] Deg yal tikkelt anda ttihriwent turin i wesgunef n wezwu yettili-d umrey gar n tissiwin n tsegwin yuzzgen.[3][4] anecta igellu-d s takma neɣ agaz (leqrḥ) anamsad deg tegnit n usgunef. Takma ayi d takma n yidmaren yeqqnen 
... 
t neɣ tazelmaṭ n yidmaren deg wesgunef aladɣa deg temhelt n uzizzer d usɣunef.[6] Takma trennu deg usgunef alqayan, deg tusut, deg unezzu yakk d tadsa. Yerna takma n tneggizt tezmer ad teddu alamma d tuyat neɣ ar uzagur,[7]
S ugani ɣef umsisreg (ayen yellan d ssebba), Takma n yidmaren yeqqnen ar tneggizt tezmer ad iglu s kra n isekna am:[8]

M’ar awaliY ass-a inelmaden imeẓyanen n tmurt n Leqbayel Yarren tameslayt-nsen, yettnecṛah wul-iw, amḍan (nombre)-nsen yettnerni deg useggas Yar wayeḍ. Deg 1995, llan tamudi n 35 000 inelmaden anda ttekkiY ula d nek. Cceṛeḍent deg-i temsirt-nni i lebda, Yas akken ur cfiY ara aṭṭas fell-asent imir-nni, war ccek d annect-en i yiğğan ar ttaruY aḍris-agi s teqbaylit tura. Aseggas-a, yewweḍ wazal n inelmaden n tmaziYt, d akk iswiren n leqqraya, Yar tamudi n 135 000 inelmaden. D awezYi llan seg assmi tejna ddunit anect-a wid yeYaren taqbaylit di lakul. D ayen ibanen, ur nettebddad ara dagi kan. Γar zdat iswi iban am yiṭṭij d ASMATU (GENERALISATION) N USELMED N TEQBAYLIT DI TMURT N YEQBAYLIYEN. Ass-nni, yezmer ad yesgunfu yiman (ṛṛuḥ) n Dda Lmulud i lebda : azeggar (passage) seg timawit Yar tira ad tenesiweḍ. Assirem-innu nek iress deg tsuta-ya (Génération) tamezYawalt (berbèrophone) yettarun u yeYaren taqbaylit. Ma d wid/tid teğğa tmacit, deg imal (futur), ad asen-gen ahilen n maḥw el-umiya (wagi i teḍsa kan)

Amezruy n Vallalar: Amezruy n yiwen wergaz iɣelben lmut.
Ayɣer ilaq ad neɣreḍ amezruy n Vallalar? Amezruy n tidet n yiwen wergaz iɣelben lmut. Amussnaw n tidet i d-yufan abrid s wacu ara yidir umdan war ma yemmut. Win i d-yufan tussna yettarran tafekka n umdan ɣer tfekka ur nettmettat ara. Win yerran tafekka n umdan d tafekka n tmusni. Win i aɣ-d-yennan abrid akken ad nidir mebla lmut. Wid i d-yesfaydin seg tidet n Rebbi taɣelnawt yerna yenna-yaɣ-d d acu i d ṣṣifa n Rebbi ur nettmettat ara d wan
... 
 ay t-ḥettmen aṭas, Ramalingam yeqbel ad yezweǧ deg leɛmer-nnes n setta ed ɛacrin n yiseggasen. Yezweǧ d yelli-s n weltma-s Unnamulai, Thanakodi. Ama d argaz ama d tameṭṭut ur ţţekkan ara di tudert n twacult yerna llan ttɣummun deg uxemmem n Rebbi. S lqedd n tmeṭṭut-is Thanakodi, tudert n zzwaǧ tettkemmil deg yiwen wass. S lqedd n tmeṭṭut-nnes, Vallalar ikemmel lmejhud-nnes akken ad yaweḍ ɣer tmeddurt ur nettmettat ara. Ramalingam yebɣa ad yissin Rebbi n tidett s tmusni. Ɣef waya, deg 1858, yeff
...
at taṛebbit i usnulfu n tmusni. Imi allen-nneɣ n tfekka ur sɛint ara tazmert akken ad walint tafekka n tmusni, ur zmirent ara ad walint Sidi-nneɣ, yellan dima d yal amkan. Imi tafekka n tmusni tella nnig n tmeẓẓuɣt n tmeẓẓuɣt yettwalin allen n umdan, allen-nneɣ ur zmirent ara ad tt-walint. Vallalar, akken yeẓra, ibeddel di tazwara tafekka-s tamdant ɣer tafekka zeddigen, sakkin ɣer tafekka n ṣṣut umi qqaren Om, sakkin ɣer tafekka n tmussni n lebda, yerna yella dima yid-neɣ yerna yettak-d nnif-is.

Tutlayt n tmaziɣt tebḍa d tantaliyin( taqbaylit, tamazbit, tacawit, tacelḥit, tacenwit, tatargitt), tezga tettwaḥres, tettwamḍel sɣur tutlayin timeqranin am taɛrabt akked tefransist.
Timlilit gar tutlayin tettawi-d amsekcem neɣ amyadef gar-asent, yal yiwet tetteg tazrirt ɣef tayeḍ.
Arnu ɣer-s tamaziɣt tettusemres di tuget-is di timawit, tezga teṭṭef amḍiq wis ssin, imi tezga taɛr
... 
rnu ɣer-s iswi d wayen i aɣ-yeǧǧan a nextar asentel-agi.
Tazrawt-nteɣ d asarwes n umawal i semrasen ineɣmasen n yimaṭṭafen n tmaziɣt (amaṭṭaf wis ssin akked umaṭṭaf n Tizi-Wezzu) d tasleḍṭ i wammud id nesekles d tidwilin, isallen akked udellel.
Ad neɛreḍ ad nerr ɣef isteqsiyen-agi
Imi amaṭṭaf d yiwen s gar walalen n taywalt yesumaɣen, yesnatnayen tutlayt, asteqsi ma yella ineɣmasen xedmen ayen yellan fell-asen akken ad snarnin tutlayt-nsen ?
D acu yettaǧǧan imarḍilen, arwasen, tamlellit n tutlay
...
m tabadut n tmiḍranin ara d-nemmagar daxel n tesleḍt-nneɣ.
Deg ixef wis ssin, d asmekti s umata s tikli n tmaziɣt si tallit n ṭṭrad ar assa n wussan, deg-s ad ban amek yaɛred udabu ad yeɣbu tamaziɣt, akked leqdicat yemxalafen sɣur imeɣnasen n tmaziɣt. Arnu ɣer-s wamek id nulfan imaṭṭafen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt d wamek narnan.
Ixef wis krad, d tasleḍṭ deg ara neɛreḍ ad nessemgired gar umawal n ssin imaṭṭafen, ad nekkes seg ammud ama d imarḍilen, asnulfawal, arwas, tamlellit n tutlayin akked umyadef.

Gren-k-id ger wallen-nsen. Usmen deg-k yemcumen, ulac amkan ideg ur llin. Ɛedmen-k ɛedmen-aɣ. nɣan-k di tefsut! Amek akken, tafsut ar Leqbayel tettmagaraɣ-d s idammen! Usmen deg-k iseṭṭafen, s yemru teṭṭfeḍ-asen-d asawen, terriḍ-asen tadimt.
Kra turiḍ yufrar, kra i d tenniḍ yewzen, d imal n tsuta, d imal n wegdud. Imeɣriyen akken kan bdan ttissinen d acu-k, ẓran abrid-ik yessuffuɣ, tiktiwin-ik d tafat. Wid ur neɣri, yebda yettawḍ-iten-d wawal yelhan, usefru yessakayen, uwelleh yessufuɣen. Ufan-d
... 
 wakken i d aɣ-d ttawin deg wawal yal ass: “am nekni am nutni, d leqrun aya i nesdukkel usawen, ihi ass-a am yiwen neɣ d yiwen, lqebla yiwet.
Ur ɣ-ttarran d Iɣerbiyen, a k-qqaren: s kra nesɛa yekka-d seg Irumyen, s leḥyat-nsen neǧren-aɣ-d abrid n tmusni d tira, i nekni tezdeɣ timawit, yak ur d iteffeɣ wejgu deg umegraman!” Ihi ay amedyaz, tamettant-ik tesgujel-aɣ, nettemruruḍ, ulac win i d yeslan i teɣri-nneƔ!
Ulac anwa ara yessiwḍen awal-nneɣ: “Waaa d Leqbayel, d Imaziɣen, ur nelli ur nettili d
...
ara d-nebdu kra ad azzlen yemcumen-ik/nneɣ a ɣ-sluɣen tala, si 62 ar ass-a ntess-iten d iluɣanen. Thennaḍ kečč yestaɛfan. Ma tkemmel akka ur yettɛeṭṭil ara wegdud ɣef turiḍ, tennuɣeḍ, i triḍ ad yif wiyiḍ ad yernu ar ɣur-k. Kra n iseggasen neɣ n leqrun ad d asen imnuda n yeɣsan ad nadin fell-aɣ, ad zwiren seg taddart n Ulxu. A ɣ-ɣren, ad awin fell-aɣ timucuha am wakken i tent-id wwin mi nedder, ahat tikkelt-a mi nenger ad inin tidet yellan. Yiwen ur yeẓri azekka.

D acu i tenniḍ ?
Yal yiwen ad as-yini d ibawen-iw i yettewwan ! Tamuɣli-nneɣ mazal-itt meẓẓiyet, mazal-itt ur tbaɛed ara nnig wanzaren-nneɣ ! Siwa aya i umi nessen ; Nekk i yeẓran, d nekk i yesnen, d nekk i … rtg. Ɣurwet ad d-tefɣem deg tedwamt i deg i tkecmem ay imaziɣen n wass-a, ayɣer akk ayagi n leḥsed akked yar ttexmim, ayɣer ulac tagmat akked tdukli, akken yenna dda Sliman Ɛazem « yak Rebbi-nneɣ akk yiwen, ad nečč kan am atmaten deg yiwen n uḍebsi ».
Uqlet ɣer deffir d tisutwin, myal tasut
... 
 Ayen i d-ufan deg tsuddut n tmetti taqbaylit ur zmiren ara ad t-rẓen, ayen i d-ufan deg tikli akked zeddi n tmetti d ayen ur yellin ara deg tmettiyin-nniḍen, imi i d-tekcem Fransa tufa-d tamurt n leqbayel tuddes tmetti-ines s tejmaɛt n yal taddart, akken agraw n tuddar i yezdin ttsemmin-as Lɛerc, anejmuɛ n leɛrac i umi ttsemmin Taqbilt. Anagraw-a n tuddsa d ayen i yeǧǧan agdud Aqbayli ibedd ɣer wass-a, ur yeɣli wara, macca deg tallit-a ideg nettidir tura, ur d-teqqim tejmaɛt, ur d-yeqqim Lɛerc,
...
 assaɣen n tizdit daxel n ugdud-a ? D tidet myal yiwen ad iḥareb ɣaf uqerruy-is ?
Ticki yeḍra-d waya ad nsel akter i tenfalit « D ibawen-iw kan i yettewwan », myal yiwen yettargu ad yili d netta i d aqerru, axṣim-is d win ara s-yefken sswab, ula deg leqdic ɣef tmaziɣt s ukukru, win iɛerḍen ad d-yawi awal as-tgezmen seg tikti-nni ideg i d-yebda. Ad kfuɣ awal am yal tikkelt, ass-a ad d-sneṭqeɣ acennay Maɛtub Lwennas yeqqar : « Uqbel ad aɣ-ɛezzin s ttwab, kkert ad d-njab isufar i tdukli-nneɣ ».

Xaled Mecɛel
Xaled Mecɛel d aselway n ḥamas. Ilul deg 28 mayyu 1956 deg taddart slwad g teɣremt n ramallah g falesṭin, yeɣra dis asselmd amenzu ar asseggass 1967 acku izug akk d twacult-is ɣer Lekwit, yedder ɣin deg aswir adamsan ɣif anammas ikemmel dis tiɣri-ines tanammast (tamenzut) d tasinant, d ikemml tiɣri-ines tasdawant ar ma yiwi abaklaryus deg lfizik n tasdawit Lekwit. tga tasdawit Lekwit deg aseggas n 1970 n tasut izrin iktaren s ikabaren isertanen n taɛrabt dis yattuyn, d tfilisṭinit iẓlin, d tẓra abuɣlu n imḥḍaren nna igan amussu yellan din d tsul tmatart iẓiln nna ɣef n yddr ar assa. tiws tad azmez n wurɣ s wanaw ameqqran deg usgmi n twessna nnes d tnfalit n uswingm nnes, acku teẓra afa n tikki nnes d aswingam d umusdu asretan, yesbeff amussu amuslem afilisṭini deg tasdawit lekwit, d yedra deg assuser akabar azrfan n tamuslemt nna tminafsen umuɣen amussu n fatḥ ɣef tamɣuri n wamun yattuyn n imḥeḍaṛn n filisṭin deg lekwit, nḍ akabar nna yezreb ma yuɣaln mbeɛd usufɣ-nnse nn yetussan s tamsmunt tamuslmt imeḥḍaren falisṭin. isufeɣ Mecɛel deg assgwass 1978 yeswuri asalmad n lfizik dg lekwit, awd imɣra mbaɛd sin iseggasen ɣur-s 7 n arrawen, kraḍt tirbatin d kkuẓ iferxan.

Deg taddart n Tbueemmucin, deg tɣiwant n Sedduq, azal n 7 ussan d nutni d anadi ɣef mmi-s n yiwen umeellem n yiwet n tkebbanit i ixeddmen iberdan. Aqcic-a, i yesean 05 iseggasen, azal n ssmana ur d-iban anida yerra. Imezdaɣ n tama-a tekker yakk deg-sen, s teɣzi n smana d nutni d anadi fell-as, ur t-ufin ara.
Almi d iḍelli n lḥedd, yiwen urgaz d tmeṭṭut-is, ufan-t yeṭṭes zdat yiwet tala, anda myegzamen iberdan yettwain ɣer Wat Meuc, Aqbu akked Sedduq.

Asawal (isawalen), téléphone (fr) - phone, telephone (en) - teléfono (es) - هاتف

Addad amaruz: usawal (yisawalen).
Ẓer daɣ: adrawal, agdawal, amawal, amseknawal, aɣawal, asawal, asawlan, aseknawlan, assiwel, awal, awalan, imsiwel, ssiwel, tamawalt, tamsawla, taɣawalt, taseknawalt, ttwassiwel.
Imedyaten:
Asawal-nni ur yetteddu ara a Mass Amzil - Le téléphone ne marche pas, Monsieur Amzil - El teléfono no funciona, Sr. Amzil - الهاتف لا يعمل يا سيد أمزيل
Iban kan ɣef waya ay yessuter ad yessiwel ed Yidir deg usawal - C'est sûrement pour cette raison qu'il a demandé Yidir au téléphone - -
Mi lliɣ ttedduɣ ad ḍḍseɣ, yesserser-d usawal - Au moment où je m'apprêtais à dormir, le téléphone sonna - Me iba a ir a la cama cuando sonó el teléfono - رنّ الهاتف عندما كنت أستعدّ للنوم
Werǧin ssutreɣ ad ssiwleɣ ed Yidir deg usawal - Je n'ai jamais demandé Yidir au téléphone - -

Ḥalli Ɛli, d anaẓur, d amedyaz. Ilul ass n, 18 duǧember 1952, deg At Buɣerdan, taɣiwant n Assi Yusef di Buɣni. Yemmut ass n, 22 unbir 2018, deg yiwen n sbiṭer n Pari di Franṣa di lɛemr-is 66 n yiseggasen, yettwamḍel ass n, 30 unbir deg taddart-is At Ḥiǧa. Yella d aselmad di taddart-is. Cwiṭ akka, yetbeɛ abrid n lfen deg useggas n 1970. Amecwar-is, d amerkanti imi ifaz aṭas, yettwasen aṭas s tezlit-is » Yeǧǧa-id Jeddi Abernus « .
Di tudert-is, snen-t medden d aḥedri u yettɛacar medden. Xas ma yella yesɛa amecwar anaẓuran s wazal-is, maca yiwen kan n uḍebṣi i d-yefɣen sɣur rradyu taɣelnawt, urǧin ixemmem ad yessenz ifarisen-is. Tizlit-agi yettwasnen » Yeǧǧa-id Jeddi Abernus « , d yiwet n tezlit icebḥen, i d-yettmeslayen ɣef tjaddit, tanaṣlit, lḥerma d useḥbiber ɣef tgemmi n tmurt n Leqbayel anda i d-yesbeggen unaẓur tamuɣl-is lqayen, imi ɣur-s abernus d aknaw n nnif, lhiba d nekkwa i d-izeggren tasutin n umezruy d tɣerma tamaziɣt.
» Yeǧǧa-id jeddi abernus « , d-aḍris yura s waṭas n rruḥ imi d ameɣnas n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ. Abernus mačči d talaba kan, d azamul n timmuzɣa imi ad t-naf di Tefriqt n ugafa s umata, d azamul daɣen n tussra d tirrugza. Uɣalent-as aṭas n tejmilin ama di tmurt n Leqbayel ama di Franṣa, sɣur tddukkliwin d terkeftin n tuddar rradyu d tiliẓri. Sgunfu di talwit !
‘’ Yeǧǧa-id jeddi abernus,
Abernus i-s d yeǧǧa baba-s,
Inna-id ḥadr-it ɣef wammus,
Ma yumes teɣli lqima-s,
Fell-as ur ttak afus,
Neɣ areṭṭal n yiwwas ‘’
Chanez Dahlal

Taẓuri sya u sya yegger-as irebbi. Yal ta yesɛa-as akud-ines, yal ta yefka-as azal-ines, yessen akken ma llant ad tent-yesseqnunec. Yessen-as i uẓawan akked wawal, yekcem s tehri s teɣzi s annar n tsekla anda d-yessufeɣ adlis-ines amenzu s wudem n tmacahut deg useggas n 2013, azwel-ines « Lexyal n tebḥirt » {Le bonheur d’épouvantail}, d adlis i d-yefɣen deg teẓrigin n SEFRABER s kraḍ (3) n tutlayin, taqbaylit, taɛrabt akked tferansist.
Tamacahut yesseḍfer-as unuɣen i as-yernan aṭas n tahuski. De
... 
unuɣ, tesdukleḍ-tent akk. Ansi i ak-d-tekka tiɛubbja-agi ?
Tiɛubja wwiɣ-tt-id mebla ccek ɣer sin n yimawlan-iw imi di sin ttarun, u baba daɣen, iɣsan-is di rreḥma, yella icennu. yura kra n tceqqufin n umezgu timectah… Yerna ufiɣ-d tagiṭart deg uxxam… idlisen, ur tebɛid ara tẓuri fell-i.
Tessufɣeḍ adlis deg useggas n 2013, dɣa seg wass-n ur d-terniḍ ara asufeɣ. Ayen akka ?
Kra bɣiɣ ad xedmeɣ ayen yelhan ugar n udlis amenzu, si tama n teɣzi n wedlis bɣiɣ ad rnuɣ tikelt-agi adlis meqqren ciṭuḥ, daɣ
...
nek sya ar sdat ?
Sewjadeɣ sin n les clips i snat n tezlatin deg udebsi-inu amenzu, Tizenqain. Yiwet n tejmilt i ucennay Brahim IZRI s ṣṣenf n la techno, akked yiwen n udlis i warrac imecṭaḥ ad yeddu deg-s uḍebsi n tezlatin daɣen i warrac imecṭaḥ .
Ahat tebɣiḍ ad d-ternuḍ awal uqbel ad nessali tadiwannit-agi ?
Tanemirt ɣef temlilit-agi, d tagnit akken nniɣ-d ayen bɣiɣ ɣef ubrid amecṭuḥ i d-wwiɣ di tẓuri. Sarameɣ aṭas n tebɣest i yal win ibenun tiqenṭar gar inaẓuren d tmetti.

A2: Azul fell akk a Mass.Hemmar Bussaed. Nsuf yisek.
H.B: Azul fell awen, azul i yimsefliden n umattaf wis sin. Tanemmirt s tusda ghef tinubbga-agi nwen.
A2: S tewzel, anwa id Hemmar Bussaed?
H.B: Lligh d aselmad n Teglizit ma ttura fghegh tastaght. Seigh 54 iseggasen. Zewgegh, seigh yiwen weqcic.
A2: Amek i teseeddayed akud-inek?
H.B: Ttbeddilegh tiktiwin d yimdukkal di feysbuk. Ttcaligh deg yidurar. Qqaregh idlisen, ttarugh dighen idrisen deg ughmis Kabylie info.
A2: S wacu tutlayt it ttarud?

aden, tijmilin, tulisin, ticequfin n unezgum. Xedmegh asmuhyet (adaptation).

H.B: Urigh qrad(3) yidlisen: urigh ammud n yisefra s tefransist, azwel-ines “Aimer,rêver et espérer”, ammud n yidrisen s tefransist, azwel-ines “Les déboires d’un poète”, ammud n yidrisen s tmazight, azwel’ines “ Tasekla n Bussaed, gar tilawt d usugen.”Idlisen-agi ttnuzun kan s ttawil n ugarnet di tezrigin lulu.com.
A2: Anda id ttagmed tahregt?

...
ara aseghti, ur znuzuyen ara adlis. Hemmlen kan ad rebbhen idrimen war tidi, war axeddim.
A2: Themmled ad tesled i Radyu?

A2: Anti tidwilin i themmled ugar?
H.B: Hemmlegh “tira”, “cfawat”, “imedyazen”, “tala n yizlan”…
A2: Awal n tagara?

Tizrigin Tira, s lemâawna n tdukkla iselmaden n Bagayet d wexxam n yidles Taous Amrouche, ttheyint-d i wass n larebâa yiwet n temlilit ara d-yawin awal $ef tira n Amer Mezdad. D tu$alin $er tira d yidlisen i d-yura Amar Mezdad, ara d-ijemâen ussan n 4 d 5 deg me$res 2009 aîas n wid terza taluft n tsekla n tmazi$t. Timlilit d tamezwarut $ef tsekla n tmazi$t ara d-theyyi tiérigin Tira s ufus n tallelt ay d-tefka tdukla Tidmi n yiselmaden n tmazi$t n twilayt n Bgayet akked uxxam n yidles n Bgayet. 
... 
iyav ara d-yawin awal $ef umeggal (romancier) d une$mas, da$en $ef tinfaliyin n tutlayt deg wungal n teqbaylit. Wid ara d-yerzun $er uxxam n yidles n Bgayet ilmend n temlilit-a ttwasnen deg unnar n tsekla. Iselmaden n tmazi$t deg tesdawiyin ne$ d imaswaven terza tedyant ara d-igen isaragen, gar-asen : Kamal Bouamara, Mohand Akli Salhi, Djamel Arezki, Said Chemakh, Fadila Achili, Nadia Berdous-Ould Amara, Yahia Bellil, atg. Amar Mezdad, deg teméi-s yakan, yemlal d tsekla : d anelmad deg u$erbaz i
...
 yisekkilen tameslayt d tikta n yimdanen*. Deg yidlisen yura yella Iv d wass (1990), Tagrest ur$u (2000), Tu$alin (2003), Ass-nni (2006), rnu win n yisefra iwmi isemma Tafunast n yigujilen (1989). Brahim Tazaghart, imvebber amezwaru n tiérigin Tira i d-yessewjden timlillit, yenna yewwev-d lawan ideg ara tqeââed tikli $ef tmu$li n tsekla tamazi$t, tasekla d tin i d-yeff$en seg tmetti, ilaq ad teffe$ $er tmetti; akka ara tâiwen isdawaniyen d wid yesselmaden ne$ ilemden deg yi$erbazen.
Dj. Ikhloufi

220 ifroren igi ysmuqqeren ghar taddart n umzruy n Castelló. Vincente Farnas amkelef n tussna n Castelló inna "Asmuqqer n afror n Arrif itecc-anegh-d agra d temgher n tussna zeg-zik". Amsuqqer-a ad tili tarzem zeg 07/09/2009 ar 25/10/2009.
Afror n Arrif ytmegga s ufus, ur staemilan ca tajarat ytemzragen. Afasser ines d qqim amuk ira s teggen imezgura, ujar traghan-t deg ufaran, azuwaq ines ykenneḥ s udaghi.
Afror-a itabber-it xas timettutin, teggen zeg-as marra ḥwajat n taddart am tiḥabin, aqnuc... Ruxa ur yqqim ca attas n iwden 3ad sta3malan afror, su inni ydrus timgharin igi tabberen afror, maca rux iwden aren taynit i marka-ni duwren tsaghent.

* Amagrad-a cerceɣ zzay-s deg wedlis n Muḥemmed Inɛisa, Lwalid mimun, zi ddcar ɣar umaḍal, pp. 30-33

Manaya idrus ɣer yewdan nniḍen ittɣe
... 
yiwalen n zic, uca ittic-as tifras nniḍen. Mara wer terrid taynit mliḥ, imken wer t-ttifhimed min ixes ad yini, ad ak-ittɣil d awal waha ; amm uɣennij “Bu ydunan”, arbiɛ nettaf-it deg yegran, amen d ayi-tɛawed ḥenna, ttuɣa ssawlen akid-s qqaren-as : « Bu ydunan, a bu ydunan, la baba-c, la yemma-c, la wi d-ɣa-ikken awaren-ac », ɣir ad isell i wawal-a ittxeyyaq am bnadem, itteqwis uca iweṭṭa-as wafar. Sefrek asɣiwes-ik
Awitay GNOME d afecku i icebḥen aṭas ad ak-yella ad teseiwseḍ, ad teqqimeḍ deg tqacuct n usɣwes deg wussan d yimalas i d-iteddun, ɣas akken akken ayyuren ččuren d timliliyin d yisihar, n tedyanin tizayazin, d yinigen neɣ d lecɣal niḍen deg tudert-ik.
Rnu syen sefrek ayen i ak-yehwan n yiwitayen d tedyanin s wudem afessas s teskant n wayyur war tilas s uwitay n GNOME, s uwitay n yimalasen akked teskant n tebdart n usɣiwes.
Asidef n tiknulujiyin akk tineggura n GNOME d usemres igerrzen n ufeṣṣel, GNOME Calendar ibennu ittsennid ɣef uqeddac n yisefka Evolution yemmden i usefrek aqettun n tesmektiwin n tedyanin akked umuddu n usilaɣ akked yisnasen niḍen. Tzemreḍ ad ternuḍ aṭas yiwitayen i d-yusan seg yiqeddacen srid yemgaraden ( am yiqeddacen n NextCloud, Google Calendar, akked CalDAV / WebDAV), ad k-ǧǧen ad temtaiḍ tidyanin-ik ɣef waṭs n yibenkan akked tɣerɣar. GNOME Calendar yessefrak daɣen awitay adigan akked wid srid, ihi tzemreḍ ad t-tesqedceḍ anida i teddiḍ, melmi i tebɣiḍ mi ara tettinigeḍ (neɣ seld mi ara teɣli tɣerma.)

Limmer mačči d kra n wuguren i d-mmugren deg umahil-a, tili yettuɛeggen ad d-yeffeɣ deg yiseggasen iɛeddan imi iswi n usizleg-is (adaptation) ɣer teqbaylit, d tajmilt n umulli wis 100 i win yuran adlis ‘’L’opium et le bâton’’ i yuɣalen, syin akkin, d asaru i d-yesuffeɣ Ahmed Rachedi. snaw yecban Mulud Mɛemmeri. ‘’Armi ttekleɣ ɣef yiman-iw akked uswir-iw deg uḥric n usizleg i kkreɣ ɣer usenfar yecban wagi. Ayen yesɛan azal, ilaq-as wazal’’. I d-yenna ɣef usaru-agi. Akka dɣa, asmi ara walin yimdanen asaru Asebsi d Uɛekkaz s teqbaylit, ad as-inin yakk d tagi i d talɣa-s tamezwarut. Meḥsub, am wakken yettwaxdem s teqbaylit, syin rran-t ɣer taɛrabt.
Rnu ɣef wanect-a, tugniwin i yellan deg-s akka tura, ifent tid-nni n usaru-nni s taɛrabt imi ha-tent-in s HD. Ayen yugaren-aya, imi

, meɛna ddreɣ-t’’. Amek ur t-yettidir ara, netta yecnan ‘’Tiɣri nesla mi nteṭṭeḍ, tezwar kul tayeḍ, ɣurwat ad as-tebrum ass-a’’. neɣ mi yenna :

Igjda n Herkulis (s tmaziɣt: ⵉⴳⵊⴷⴰ ⵏ ⵀⵉⵔⴽⵓⵍⵉⵙ, s tlatint: Columnae Herculis, s tgrikt: Ἡpάkλeιaι Etῆλaι Erákleiai Stílai) nɣ Igjda n Waṭlas iga ism azayku lli tn ikkan ɣ uzmz n ayt tagrikt. Ar sis tqṣaḍn idrarn s sin lli illan ɣ tmi n Urupa ɣ iffus d Tafriqt ɣ ugafa, ad tn t igan: Adrar n Musa (nɣ Adrar n Abyla s yism nns azayku) ɣ ugafa n tmazirt n Lmɣrib, d Aẓru n Djabal Ṭariq lli itabɛan i Lingliz.
Kkan-tt-inn irumiyn n uzmz azayku skrn ɣ Igjda n Herkulis zund kran iwtta gr umaḍal lli ɣ tlla 
... 
ill Aṭlasi s ɣinna lli icqqan.
Lliɣ yumẓ Herkulis aɣaras nns s ugdal n Hesperides ɣ ammas n tgzirt n Iritya. Ikka-tt-inn ḍaruri ixṣṣa ad izri f yan udrar ikka-tt-inn iga s yism Aṭlas, ɣ udɣar ayɣli s udrar ann, iga yas tazmrt icqqan nns afad ad izri udrar ann zɣ tuẓẓumt nns at lliɣ d iffuɣ ɣ tsga yaḍni n udrar. S tɣarast ad as ismun Herkulis yill agrakal d yill aṭlasi tiklt tamzwarut d iskr ma mu nttini ɣila Imi n Djabal Ṭariq. Ɣayad ar aɣ ittini zɛma mas Adrar n Musa d Izig n Djabal Ṭariq gan ɣ
...
e Siculus, yan unmezruy agrik, ikka-tt-inn ar ittals mas Herkulis ismun iftasn n Imi n Djabal Ṭariq lli tn yad ikkan mac ikka-tt-inn iwsɛa bzzaf (urd zund ɣaylli ttinin irumiyn) bac ad ur yajj imẓiwn n yill aṭlasi ad kcmn s yill agrakal.
Awsat ɣ tirra n imgradn n Wikipidya s tutlayt Taclḥit afad ad timɣur uggar, Ɣid a ɣ tẓḍarm ad trnum kra n umgrad amaynu, arayat aynna mi tẓḍarm bac ad igutn imgradn s tutlayt Taclḥit.
Iɣ tesɣawsat s tiwisi ɣ tirra n imgradn, tẓḍaṛt ad nn-taggʷt ɣ Tasna n Tiwisi.

Ttemsebḍant tseqqar i tettḥuz temɣart zeg wemkan ɣer wenniḍen. Aṭṭas n tqebbal ɣer Imaziɣen tticcen ij n tlelli d tameqqrant i temɣart ad tegg min txes. Di ca n tqebbal n Imaziɣen n waṭlas, ɣer-sen ɛada n « taqerfit ». Ɛada-ya txes ad tini ila ittemsar ij n umlussen jar uḥudri d tḥudriyt, ttmunen jar-asen maḥend ad msemlacen. Waxxa aṭṭas n yimukan ɛad tteggen ɛada-ya. Maca ttwalan ila wer teqqim ca aṭṭas, minzi lux ṭɣan imassen n tatiknulujit tamaynut.
Amlussen i umsemlec
X ca n ugeddim n yeɣzer
... 
lken ttuɣa izwar-asen ggin ɛada-ya n « Usqer ».
Imelqan s yezlan
Maca ɣir s yezlan waha i zi ttuɣa tteggen ɛada-ya waha; maca ttuɣa Imaziɣen-a tteggen « Aḥidus » niɣ « Aḥwac », deg yiger-a yeqqar Ɛasiḍ: « Iḥudriyen xminni ttemlussunen aked tḥudriyin ttuɣa tteggen ij n tfuct n ccḍiḥ s uḥwac d awardi i nitenti ».
« Awdid » niɣ « Tuckint » tnayen n wawalen qqnen ɣer ɛada n « Asqer ». Ittsemma da xminni « tiḥenjirin ttɣimant aked iḥudriyen tettrent zzag-sen ad ggen aḥwac, uca iḥudriyen tteggen manay
...
ɛada-ya tḥeṭṭar di ca n imukan, tettɣaba deg imukan nniḍen ». Amkan mani tettɣaba ttilin dag-s zzwawi d sḥab iɛecumra ittḥarmen ad nettwala tamɣart mani ɛad akid-s neqqim, akid-s nessiwel.
Zeg ij n uɣezdis nniḍen Ɛasiḍ yeqqar aqqa inni ittḥarmen ɛada-ya d ca n yewdan ɣer-sen ij n tadyulujit d taberranit x tmurt-nneɣ, wer tettmsetfiq ca aked tussna n Tmazɣa innurẓmen mani dag-s ɛadat wtint iẓuran di tmurt. Am tẓuri n « Uḥidus » i di ceṭṭḥent temɣarin d yergazen merra.
Tala: Maghrebvoices Ḥ. Abruk

BBC Tabriṭanit tessiwel x ca n tɣuriwin izwarent, iwḍent ad afent belli lmikrub izemmar ad yeddar mani wer izemmar ad yeddar ca n lexliqet nniḍen.
Tarezzut‑a tettarra‑dd taynit i waṭṭas n ixarrisen d imaynuten, alami baktirya‑ya tedder lemlayn iseggusa deg iẓra yarsan di lallaɣ n lebḥar, izemmar ad tili tudart ‑tarwes di tudart n baktirya‑ya‑ di ca n tmura nniḍen deg ujenna, bla tammurt-nneɣ, Science Magazin twalat d beddu n tarezzut x tudart di ca n imukan ɛemmers ma xarrsen i
...
9% deg ijjjen wakud d ameẓẓyan, ɛawed belli lmikrub‑a yebda ittaru deɣya, mana yessufuɣ ɣar ijjen webrid: mala niweḍ neẓẓu tudart di ca n wemkan, nessu‑yas min t-ɣa‑yejjen ad yeɣmi, nzemmar ad dd-nexleq tudart deg imukan yemmuten. mamek ieemmar ad yarẓem tawwurt di tarezzutin x tudart deg ujenna.
Yuki Murunu yenna i BBC: « rami dayi i dd-ssiwḍen aneɣmis‑a, nniɣ aked yixef- inu, ad yili xḍan, niɣ ṭṭfen abrid n tarezzut urid nican, minzi twafit‑a, tesban-dd belli yella min yeqḍan x lmewt i lebda!«

Deg kra n wussan kan seg taggara n wayyur n Remḍan, d tazzla i tt-yeḍran deg wakk tiwaculin titlemsaniyin. Tulawin la ttmahalent akken ad gerrzent ṭṭabla n lɛid s mennaw n tsekkiwin n yingulen akked tẓidanin.
D ingulen i yis-s tettwassen aṭas tmaneɣt n « yiziyanen ». Ideg yella « Samsam » akked « Igerruten yeččuren sdaxel s lluz, « Timeqrunin s lluz yesɛan daxel arekti n ttmer », « Agerguc », « Warun », Ɣribiyya », d aya i tettent twaculin deg lɛid yerna ttafken-ten-id i yinebgawen.
Iseggasen-a yezrin, yebda la ifessi lferḥ-nni n umyiger i wakken ad niwlen ingulen n lɛid. Tiwaculin akken tulawin yettmahalen senyafent ad aɣent ingulen-nsent seg ɣur tid yemmuzgen deg uniwel-a ansayan yemmuzgen deg-s, acku ulac akud yerna leɣla n yisafaren i smahalen deg yingulen-a.

Di ca n imegraden-nnes i tura di tesɣunt « The Atlantic« , tessawal Olga Khazan x yexf-nnes umi i tegga ad tari adlis. Tewca awal i ca n imeddukkal-nnes di New York bac a t-idd-tessufeɣ di min yudsen. Tezluza taɛejjajt x utebheḍ d terjijat i tt-ileqfen ɣer umezwar, zi lexdenni, ttuɣa tettlaɣa x yemma-s, ca n twalatin tettru, ca n twalatin ɛawed tefreḥ. Tfekker bac ad tbeddel isem-nnes di twitter, tfekker ad temsawaḍ aked imeddukkal-nnes d iselmaden-nnes, a dasen-tini belli ttuɣaa tettbusar waha,
... 
s illa tarwa-nnes, tteḥdajan a dasen-tewc tiseɛɛatin-nsen.
Awal i teqqar i imariten: « Ari s deɣya, ɛdel s cway-cway ». Nettat tettari ij uɣezdis n wedlis kul ssimanet, tettari aṭṭas di letnayen d ttlata. Manaya yeqqar aqa tettari ca n rebɛalaf n tguriwin kul ass. Zi ssenni, tlehha larbeɛ d lexmis aked weɛdal. jjemɛa, tettejja-t i uɛawed n min tura, bac ad texzar ma tegga ca n ufayu, niɣ tettu ca n lḥajet, niɣ wer tiwiḍ ɣer mani texs ad taweḍ. Lmeftaḥ n manaya; ari ɣer umezwar mamec ma turid, zi
...
ḍefren aḍbib ».
Wer tessin Olga ma ula d nettat zi 20% nni niɣ lla. Maca yeḍher illa ittxessa-tt ad tesmutti tarezzut x ddwa i tt-ɣa-yesgenfan zeg wesmutti, ad teɛgez x trezzut n ddwa n leɛgez.
S wawal-nnes aked Laura Vanderkman, tuka Olga aked yexf-nnes d tmiɣist, ɣer-s tizemmar. Zi ssenni, tira, wer das-ssufɣent ca leɛqel.

Ijjen tɣuri tegg-it ijjen tseḍma d Tameɣrabit i yeqqnen ɣer tussna n lebḥer. Tufa qa din ijjen « tḥaryaḍt n lebḥer » (Gyre) di lebḥer n uburan, zzat i Lḥusima.
Asaḍuf n lebḥer di Lḥusima i iḍeffren i usenfar n temɛawant « Odyssea » i tegga tamunt Tawruppawit. S twiza aked furisti d usinag anamur n trezzut di tyemra n lebḥer d tesdawit n Ɛebdelmalek Sseɛdi. Ina merra ḍelqen di Nwanbir i yeɛdan ijj n macina i zi messḥen lebḥer (Glider). Tzemmer ad teɛber iferdisen ikimawiyen n waman n lebḥer, am l
... 
sant, simana-ya ijjen wartikel d amassan x mani iwwḍen di trezzutin-nsen i yettwaggen di twalat tamezwarut deg yeffus n umiditirani. Aya, yus-d deg wegraw n ssistim Awruppawi i uḥeṭṭu n lebḥurat deg umaḍal (EuroGoos). S temccarcut n waṭṭas n imussnawen d inni ig ixeddmen deg ilaburatwaren n lebḥer Iwrappawiyen imaḍlanen.
Lḥusin Nibani, bab n tɣuri-ya, yenna ila qa d ta d twalat tamezwarut i di ɣa nessen ila qa din ijjen tḥeryaḍt n lebḥer deg Uburan. Wa d Afinumin i ttuɣa dd-ḥeṭṭan zi ssatilit wa
...
i daneɣ-ittejjan tiḥeryaḍin n lebḥer.
Taḥeryaḍt i yellan di Lḥusima tessizdig aman n watlanṭik i dd-ittasen zi tizi n Gibralṭar. Uca tbeṭṭa aman x jjihet uɣelluy n umiditirani i yellan yeḥma, d amellaḥ kṭer zeg waṭlantik.
Nibani yenna i La map, ila aqqa leɛbar i tegga macina n Glider tewta ar 500 mitru s nnej i waman, tenna ila aqqa taḥeryaḍt-nni tewta di lallaɣ n uburan, mani ssatilit ttuɣa immal-d udem-nnes n s nnej waha.
Γer eawed: Asaray anamur n Lḥusima.. Amsagar n d waman ixeṭṭfen tiṭṭawin

Tga tusnakt yat tgrumma n tmesniwin timedwanin, d-ikkan asseɣẓen, zerrewnin mnnaw n tɣawsiwin zun d tigrummiwin n tusnakt, imḍanen, talɣiwin, tuẓkiwin, ilsilɣan, atg ; da zerrwent awed tuqqniwin d tmehlin llanin ger tɣawsiwin-a. Gant altu iger n urezzu ikkaten ad isnerni timesniwin-a, d awed taẓlayt tent-isseɣran.
Tebḍa tusnakt ɣef kigan n yiẓlan zun d: tasnemḍant, Aljiber, aslaḍ, tanzeggit, tameẓla tamusnakt, atg. Illa awed yan usemzirey ger tusnakt tuzdigt d tusnakt tamesnast. T
... 
usnakt id tidet ganin tilɣanin s timmad-nnsent, da ttafant isnasen-nnsent g tussniwin-yaḍen g yigran-akk° n tetiqnit. G umnid-a,isawel Eugene Winger ɣef « teṛwi targerrawt n tusnakt g tussniwin n ugama »[1].

Iwweḍ Eali Aeerras ɣer lwacun-nnes di Biljik, zegga isseɛda tenɛac issegusa n leḥbes di Lmuɣrib s ttuhmet n usujed i ca n lexdayem n ttaɛeddu ig inekker netta. Tefsar-dd Farida Aɛerras ijjen ubidyu d ameẓẓyan ssemɣaran zi mmitsen i x-asen iɣaben 12 issgusa. Di ficta-nni ggin tuɣa ttiraren dag-s gitara.
Aeerras ittwaṭṭef di Mritc zeg Isppunya, wcin-t i Lmuɣrib, awarni i umestfaq n Biljik, tamurt mani ig izeddeɣ. Lmuɣrib itter-it zeg ispunya minzi Lmexzen iqqar ila netta ɣer-s ca n tɣuni aked ca n teyrawt d tameslemt tettegg ttaeeddu.
Aṭṭas n imeɣnas n tseqqar n yiwdan, qqaren ila Biljik wer teggi walu maḥend ad tessedwel anamur-nnes. Qqaren ila la d nettat tesmeḥ dag-s di leḥbes n Lmuɣrib. Zeg ijjen uɣezdis nniḍen, yenna-dd ijjen uneqqis n tmura imunen (ONU) belli Aeerras « yenɛem adu uweddeb », mamec ttren zi Lmuɣrib ad as-isnufsel maca walu.
Aɛerras tuɣa izzar-as yegga ijjen tikkest x macca maḥend ad yessen mani iwweḍ ucetki-nnes alaḥsab aweddeb i das-ggin, isseɛda ca n cehrayen x tikkest n macca.
Deg ubidyu, i dd-tefser utcma-s Farida, ittban-d Aɛerras icca buḥbel-nnes maca waxxa amenni ittgerniz, iḍeḥḥek.
Site n "www.lerifain.fr" d ijjen uraq mani nettari s Tmaziɣt waha, dag-s ineɣmisen d merra mayen yeqqnen ɣer tira, aya d tizemmar zeg iḥudriyen maḥend Tmaziɣt n Arrif ad kid-s nennum di tira, ad yemɣar wagra-nnes n tira.

Jabran xalil jabran azwel 1
Mammek dewleɣ d abuhali?
d tanita d tanfust inu i marra wenni irezzun ad issen mammek bbuhelyeɣ.
zeg waṭṭaṣ zeggʷami zfad ma ad lulen waṭṭaṣ n ikucen kkreɣ d zeg ijj n yiḍeṣ yulleɣ ufiɣ marra iḥeyyasen inu ttwakren – sa n iḥeyyasen i armeɣ s ufus inu tuɣa tbeddaleɣ zzaysen udmawen di tudert in
...
 i waẓẓṛi nnes, ijj ayi war qqimeɣ rezzuɣ iḥeyyasen inu axminni ɣaciɣ, xafes sɣuyyeɣ nniɣ: iceffaren n iḥeyyasen inu d imiman!
amya i dewleɣ d abuhali, maca ufiɣ di tibbuhelya a tilelli d unjam, tilelli n uɣimi aked ixef inu d unjam zi tussna n iwdan i tudert inu, ḥit yenni issnen tudert n ca n ijj mɣar ntili d isemɣan nnsen deg ijj n uɣezdis.
maca war ssemɣariɣ ca s unjam inu aṭṭaṣ, ḥit waxxa aceffar aqat deg ubniq netta iggʷej xef iceffaren nneɣni war d as itemsar ca d aԑeffan.
Muḥammed FARISI

Asqamu n tfaska tadelsant taYelnawt n usaru amaziY yesudes-d Tazrigt tis 13 n tfaska n usaru amaziY deg wexxam n yidles Mulud at Meemmar di temdint n Tizi-Wezzu. Aya, ad yili s teYzi n setta n wussan. Leqdic yebda ass n ssebt yezrin u ad yeddu alamma d ass n 28 di maYres. Di tfaska n useggas-agi ad tuɣal tejmilt i unaẓur Mohamed Bouguermouh (i tewwi tmettant deg ussan-agi yezrin), yiwen n wejjgu n tẓuri d yidles amaziY i yeskelsen asaru amenzu s tutlayt n tmaziYt « Taourirt yettwattun (la colline oubliée) », akken daYen i yeḥddar di ddeqs n tezrigin iseggasen yezrin n tfaska usaru amaziY.
inebgawen n lḥerma n tfaska n useggas-a d imaziɣen n Siwa (di Maṣer).
Dɣa d tagnit akken ad yettwasen yidles n yimaziɣen n temnaḍt-a n Maṣer. Ad ttekkin 17 n yisura iYezfanen deg temsizelt ar tzemmurt n wewreɣ. Akken daɣen ara ttekkin 09 n yisura wezzilen i usebYes n yelmeẓyen ara d-yufraren. Ad ner lwelha belli leqdic n tfaska-agi ad-yeddu di 06 n temnaḍin niḍen n ugarzu n Tizi-Wezzu, gar-asent; Wizgan, Larebea nat iraten, Drae ben xedda, Wad Eisi, Tigzirt d BuYni Tafaska -agi di Tizi-Wezzu d-akaz (Reconnaissance) n tteebga ẓẓayen n tutlayt tamaziYt di tmurt n Lzzayer, d wayen id-tefka temnaḍt-agi n Tizi-Wezzu i yedles azzayri sumata. Tadyant-agi d asnarni akk d unegmu n usaru amaziY iwakken ad-yeseu amḍiq-is deg maḍal ger lejnas » i d-yeqar yal tikkelt mass Si Lhachemi Assad.

Jean Ɛemruc, s yisem-is n tidet, Jean Lmuhub Ɛemruc, ilul ass n 6 fuṛaṛ 1906 deg Yiɣil Ԑli (Bgayet). Yemmut ass n 16 yebrir 1962 deg Paris.
D amaru, d aneɣmas – s tutlayt tafransist – deg tedwilin n Radyu. D mmi-s n Faḍma At Manṣur, d gma-s n tmarut-tanaẓurt Ṭawes Ԑemruc.
Deg useggas n 1910, tunag twacult-is ɣer Tunes anda i yas-tettunnefk tɣelnewt tafransist.
Deg useggas n 1921, s yigemmaḍ igerrzen deg ulmud n uswir alemmas, yettwaṭṭef d aselmad n uswir amenzu deg Sus. Ssin, yesɣer deg yiwen n 
... 
aziɣen n tmurt n Leqbayel [Chants berbères de Kabylie], 1947. D ammud n yisefra i d-yelqeḍ seg tgemmi taqbaylit, ladɣa sɣur yemma-s Faḍma At manṣur Ԑemruc. D isefra s snat n tutlayin : Taqbaylit – Tafransist.
Yura s trumit yiwet n termit « Yugurten imezgi » (L’éternel Jugurtha), i d-yeffɣen aseggas n 1946.
Seg tmettant-is ar da, aṭas n wayen yura i d-yeffɣen d idlisen, ama s lmendad n tmusnawt Tasaedit Yasin : - Aɣmis (1928 – 1962) [Journal (1928 – 1962)], 2009.
- Jean Ԑamruc, iminig imezgi [Jea
...
m d wawal, tamedyezt tazzayrit » (Espoir et Parole, poèmes algériens).
Lmuhub Ԑemruc yemmut s wazal n kraḍ n wagguren send timunent n Lezzayer i t-nekṛen. Yemḍel d aɣrib, akkin i wakal n yimarawen-is.
Jean Lmuhub Ԑemruc, d amedyaz, d amaru s ticcert tusdidt. D aggag yesean azal ɣur yimusnawen imeqranen, ladɣa Irumiyen.
Γas s tefransist kan i yura, maca ul-is dima d aqbayli, d amaziɣ. Yenna-d d akken, ɣas yessen ad yaru s tefransit, maca yessen ad iru kan s teqbaylit.
Tajmilt sɣur: Nacer Medjdoub

Tineggura agi imi lqaâa tezga tḥemmu u terwi tikli n tegnawt inejla udfel si tmurt n Iqbayliyen. Di myal tagrest ad nudmen kan kra n ibruyen n udfel u ad sennin kra idudan kan. Ur ireggel ubrid u ttwaḥbasen medden akken ad rẓen asalu. Maca tamurt n Iqbayliyen war adfel di tegrest ixus ssuq-is. Ixus macci drus. Acku adfel di tegrest d aman di tefsut d unedbu. Aman deg unedbu d tagella i medden d tirni.
Timti ara xaṣṣen waman deg unedbu, timti akken ara icuḥ Wanẓar ttuqimen as medden tameYra, sqiz
... 
a, arrac cennun “ara ikkat umeccim, a necc a neqqim...” irgazen ttin iman nsen deg ibarnyas u ttqissiren di tjemmuâa neY deg ixxamen ar yiri n lkanun.
Amek ihi almi assa, imi tura medden Yur-sen allalen d ttawilat, Yran qefzen, maca ur zmiren i cwiṭ n udfel? Tidett attan di tmurt-is! Assa Iqbayliyen jjan ansayen n at zik war ma snulfan-d s wacu ara ten-bedlen. Jjan kan ayen d-ufan si zik u refden ayen d-snulfan wiyiḍ, ayen walan ar Iṛumyen. Macci diri win irefden ayen d-snulfan wiyiḍ. Ala. Dacu 
...
tnezruft ur nezri di tudart nsen adfel nezmer a negzu tagwnitt. Ma d wid idurar ad iniY kan aḥlil. Awidukan, illa Buaziz At Cebbib n Umussu n timanit d imeddukal-is ssawḍen cwiṭ n qeḍyan i wid ur nezmir i udfel!
Dagi diYen imi d Amussu n timanit kan id-igren afus, iban-d i tmurt n Iqbayliyen d akken timanit ines tewwit macci almi d assa. Si zik, tsellek kan iman-is u awi yufan ad yakwi Uqbayli assa d nda mi tekkat wanag adfel iban.
Wid irran diYen ad gren afus am nutni am wiyiḍ, zemren da.
M.A.U

Igures d yiwet n taddart i d yezgan di tɣiwant n At Yeḥya di tanebdaḍt n Tala n Sila (Michelet) deg ugezdu n Tizi Wezzu.
Aɛmer Ubuyaḥya d yiwen umrabeḍ ,tezdeɣ tarwa-s tama n wasif ddaw Igures , di tgerwla mgal amnekcem afransis (1954) tefka d taddart 32 imeɣraṣen am [Akli At Ṭayeb][Tasaɛdit At Ṭayeb] [Messaoud,Madjid,Yamina At Tayeb],[Muḥend Lɛerbi At amar] neɣ [Busɛad Ujidan]. Syina mi yefra ṭrad, ulin atas imezdaɣ d asawen seg wasif mi yuɣen tiferkiwin ɣer taddart n At Mlal id yezgan s ufella n Igures .
Taddart Igures tesɛa tilisa nettat dwatas Ljiranis : At Mellal , At Bu Yusef ( tiferdud+tazruts ) iferhounene (ibelqisen+ahduch)
Taddart igures tebda ɣef 6 Idermans : 1* At Ṭtayeb= ( 4 Ixamen ) 2* At Weftis(ait mouffok) 3* Igujilen + At aemar ( Oudjidane ) 4* At L'mouhoub 5* At Abderrahmane,6*Ait Idir
Tadert igures tesa 6 n yismawen n twacult:
- Ait Tayeb
- Ait MouFFok
- Oudjidane
- Ait Mouhoub
- Ould Abderrahmane
- Ait Idir
Tesɛa taddart azal (983 imezdaɣ) deg useggas 2015 .

Ghass ad, yurrid wakal ad, ar issmghay, mizzgen izuran ns gh ddu wakal.
Tabaamrant, izd isnn adelli ur ttam is rad immghi wakal ?

izd akal ntmozgha a yadd yourrin ar ismgha imazighn ??

« Tuqqla n unmazal n Zzayer ɣer Paris ur d-tettili ara arma yettwazrek uwanak azzayri azrak ummid », ɣef wakken ay d-iwekked uselway Tebboune deg wawal-nnes deg umyager awalan d yimidyaten.
Yerna-d dakken « amezruy ur yezmir ara ad yettwadɣel » yernu « assaɣen d Fṛansa d tamasit n uɣref d umezruy ».
Iger-d daɣ tiɣri uselway n tegduda i Fṛansa akken « ad tettu dakken Zzayer tella d tahrest ».
Zzayer teɣra-d, imalas yezrin, i unmazal-nnes deg Paris i lmend n umciweṛ deffir ma nnan-d kra n yiɣbula ifṛansiyen dakken aselway afṛansi yenna-d tisguriwin ay irekḍen amezruy d tsuda n uwanak azzayri, yernu tettwali Zzayer aya d tagermant ur yettwaqbalen deg yiweẓla-nnes igensiyen.

Amaziɣ Assaɣ li ituyfkan ufgan ililli, bla nzara maydikka, maysawal, man ikl dars illan wala ddin nes. Amaziɣ (yan, awtm), imaziɣn (mnnaw, iwtmn), timaziɣiyin (Asukat n tawtmt= mnnawt/ nttnti).
Dar willi didsn mḥadanin d willi didsn ḥukkanin: ifransawiyn "les bérberes" , Aerab : البربر ingliziyn: berber. Mac dar assaɣn igiyans imaziɣn. Imaziɣn gan middn lli izdaɣn ɣ kraygatt tusut n ifriqya n uffell niɣ tamzɣa z tigzirin tiknariyin ar Missra d Z il n umlil n tuzzumt ar tagant n ifriqya. Γ tizi yad liɣ nlla art nin nttaffa ḥtta ɣ timizar n Fransa ,[[Spanya]
Gh Umrruk llant tachelhit ,trifit ,tamazight n atlas gh dzayr tella tqbaylit ,tacawit gh misra tella tsiwit gh tuns tella tasndit

Di tazwara, ur nezmir ara neẓrew taɣult n usnulfawal qbel ma ad d-nɛeddi ɣef useknawal. Aṭas n yimawalan i d-yeffɣen ilmend n teqbaylit azal n 228 n yiseggasen-aya. Ɣef waya i nra di tazwara ad nissin qbel talliyin n useknawal n teqbaylit ; s tmussni n wid iten-ixedmen, tarrayin i s-way-s ttwaxedmen ? Ma nga daɣen aserwes gar yal Amawal akked umawal n Dali amer ahat ad
... 
in i yessexdem yal amseknawal deg umawal-ines ; ayen icudden s umata ar ugerwisem n yal Amawal ; s teẓrewt n yimecranen i yellan deg ugbur n tidimɣert : Tizwar, igerwismen, tukcimin : akked yimecranen ara naf di tidimmẓit n yal Amawal : Tukcimt, tirawalt, tira tamsislant, taggayt, tagmuẓar, ticṛent, tabadut asmedyet. Llan yimawalen d ikradwalen am umawal n (Paradis) akked win n (Brosselard), Llan daɣen imawalen d isinwalen am yimawalen i yexdem : (Creusat, Olivier, Huyghe, Dallet, Haddadou), Ala
...
enɣit, asečču, …), ismawen imadwanen (anesɣamu), ismawen n wallal (amsedday, amsigres, …), irbiben (imaw, adersan,…). Imseknawalen-a sxedmen daɣen tarrayt n usudes ilmend n usnulfu n wawal amaynut s usdukkel n sin waẓaren n teqbaylit deg umedya asuddes n yisem n wuṭṭun kraḍ d uferdis (et). Yella-d daɣen usexdem
n yinaw aynutlay i tikkelt tamezwarut di taɣult-a n usnawal, ayen ahat ara yesbuɣren neɣ ara yessisehlen aselmed tutlayt-a s timmad-is d tutlayt n tyemmat neɣ ahat ugar d tutlayt tunṣibt.

Tamehla n yedles n n Tizi-Wezzu akk d lemeawna n sindika n yinaẓuren n Tizi-Wezzu, sudsen-d ddurt-agi yezrin deg wass n 08 yunyu asmekti n wass aYelnaw n unaẓur deg wexxam n yedles n Lmulud At Meemmar s teYezi n 3 n wussan. Asmekti-agi yella-d d tajmilt i 04 n yinaẓuren : Oukil Amar, Amar Seghir, Ameziane Mohand Ameziane d Belkhir Mohand Akli.
Γas akken llan wid yerza waṭan, s tebYest ussan-d Yer usmekti Yer tejmilt-agi i yuYalen i 04 n yinaẓuren iqburen i d-teffka temnaḍt n leqbayel,ger-assen i
... 
ula d netta Yer tejmilt-agi is-yuYalen acku yeṭṭef-it waṭan deg ussu, nessaram-as tujya, ger tezlatin yecna » Lfiraq ay atma yuear, yelli-s n Jerjer meskint, Sllam Llah fell-awen…at ». Belkhir Mohand Akli n temnaḍt n Boudjima yussa-d Yas akken ur yezmir ara, maca yenna » Ass-a d ass yiffen akk ussan », ger tezlatin yecna » Tumeint n tfetusin, UffiY-tt di tesga teqqim, Sid Ahmed Abudali…atg ». Dda Amar » Oukil Amar », Yas akken yelḥa deg leemer yettban-d am yilemẓi, mazal lbaraka, yemekta-d tiqdi
...
aẓur yuklal leqdar, tajmilt teedda i tegnatin yelhan aṭas.
Di tegnitt am tagi issulef fell-aY ad-nebder anaẓur xarṣsum stewzel n wawal acku aken nebYu newwi-d awal fell-as, ur nezmir ara ad d-nezzi yakk Yef wayen yexdem. Taẓuri d lebḥer lqayen, d lebḥer wessieen ur yezmir yiwen ad-tyelḥeq akken yebYa.
Taẓuri d tilleli, ur tcudd ara Yer yiwen wemḍiq, tleḥḥu, tessuruf tilisa, trezzef si wa Yer wa, ur tkeffu ara deg-s lYella, ur tesei-ara taggara. Dima yettlalay-d umaynut Yef umaynut.
Islam Bessaci

Agemmay agrigi
Agemmay agrigi d agemmay yettuseqdac di tira n tutlayt tagrigit segmi lqern wis 9 uqbel Ɛisa. Yekka-d uẓar-is seg ugemmay afiniqi.
Igrigiyen ṭṭfen agemmay afiniqi, beddlen isekkilen-is u rnan-t tiɣra (voyelles), yuɣ lḥal agemmay agrigi d agemmay amezwaru i yesɛan tiɣra.
Agemmay agrigi yettwura seg uzelmaḍ ɣer uyeffus. Yettubeddel geddac tikkwal u yefka-d aṭas n igemmayen : Alatini, Aqebṭi, Ssirilik... atg.
Agemmay[beddel]
Ṭṭabla deg ukessar tesskan isekkilen n ugemmay agrigi atrar, mkul asekkil yesɛa aẓari-is deg ugemmay afiniqi.
- Unicode 5.2 Agemmay agrigi

Yettru Useklu mi iwala imdanen gezzmen isekla di teẓgi, yettsuɣu :
– Ay imɣan izedɣen tizgi, akit. Amdan ad yessenger tiẓgi. Ay iɣersiwen n teẓgi…. Ma gezmen-iyi, ad tenger teẓgi, ur tettafem ayen ara teččem, azekka ad aweḍ nuba-nwen.
Kra n yimdanen gezzmen-d isekla mebla ceḥḥa di teẓgi, ssawaḍen itman s axxam. Yenna-as Ḥemmu i umdakel-is, Laḥlu :
– Γiwel ay ameddakel, ma ulac ad aɣ-teṭṭef tmeddit dagi.
– Uff ! Ttuɣalen iḍarren-iw ar deffir, ẓẓay mliḥ utmun-agi ay ameddakel. I as-yerra Laḥlu
– D
... 
ttsuḍu. D nekk iwen-yerran tili deg ussan n yiṭij, seddaw-iw i tettddurim, nekk reqqeɣ kunwi tasgunfuyem.
Ḥemmu d Laḥlu fehmen belli ɛeddan tilas, ayen xedmen ur ilaq ara. Dɣa ddan-d fell-asen, qaddmen-ten-id si teẓgi.
Ḥemmu d Laḥlu ugaden nnan-asen :
– Suref-aɣ ay aseklu, surfet-aɣ ay imɣan d yiɣersiwen. Suref-aɣ a tiẓgi. I as-yenna Ḥemmu i Laḥlu.
Xas akken sutren ssmaḥ, tiẓgi mazal terfa fell-asen, ula d iɣersiwen-is. Yenna-as Ḥemmu i Laḥlu :
– Ilaq-aɣ tura, d nnuba-nneɣ ad neẓẓu isekla, akken
...
dan ẓẓan isekla imecṭaḥ i wwin deg yifassen-nsen. Di yal tallit ttruḥun teẓẓun isekla, akken alarmi d asmi d-slulen tiẓgi i igezmen yimawlan-nsen. Yuɣal Useklu isemmeḥ-asen i Ḥemmu d Laḥlu, imi yegza belli d nutni i iceggɛen araw-nsen akken ad ẓẓun isekla di teẓgi-nni gezmen.
Seg wass-nni, tiẓgi-nni tufa iman-is, ulac win igezzmen isekla-s. Imɣan, iɣersiwen d yigḍaḍ ufan iman-nsen. Igerdan deg-s tturaren timqademt akked tuqna n tuffra, tteffren deffir n yisekla.
Fahim MESSAOUDENE – Aseklu Yerfan

Tafaska-a ad d-tili deg tzeqqa n Ibn Zeydun deg Usira n Riadh El Feth yernu tella-d d tajmilt i ukerwa ameqran n tezlit n uceɛbi Mahboub Safar Bati (1919-2000).
Deffir ma tɣab tfaska-a 7 n yiseggasen, teqqel-d s « wahil n tmeɣra kan », yernu ssefran ad d-teqqel tyaka deg teẓrigt ay d-itteddun ara ssuddsen deg Remḍan n 2023, ɣef wakken ay d-yenna unesmil n tfaska, Abdelkader Bendamache.
Ma d taneɣlaft n yidles tesmekti-d s temlilt taxatart ay tetturar tfaska-a deg tmussni d usmal n yimẓawanen ilemẓiyen.
Deg tsehṛa-a tamezwarut, derwen icennayen Samir Lalleug (Leblida), Aissa Baba Ammi (Taɣerdayt), Yacine Zouaoui (Bgayet), Rachid Guettafa (Mestɣanem) d Ccix Abderrahmane El Kobbi n Zzayer Tamaneɣt.
Tafaska-a ad tkemmel arma d 15 Ɣuct yernu ssefran ad ilin, deg wahil n wass n usimwas, yicennayen Rachid Bellik (Tizi Uzzu), Djamel Megharia (Cclef), Hamid Laidaoui d Nacereddine Galiz (Zzayer Tamaneɣt) akked Khaled Chahelal n Mestɣanem.

Kuruna ttuɣa yeḥwaj yallah 32 n wussan maḥend ad immutti zi 32 melyun n imehlak ar 40 melyun. Qbel, ttuɣa yeḥwaj 38 n wussan maḥend ad imutti zi 20 ar 30 melyun. Mamec yeḥwaj 44 n wussan maḥend ad imutti zi ɛecra ar ɛicrin melyun n imehlak. Mani ttuɣa abirus ila yeḥwaj telta chur maḥend ad yaweḍ ɛecra melyun tamezwarut. Zeg wami i d-iban abirus di twalat tamezwarut di temdint n Wuhan Tacinwit.
Lehlak-a izemmem ca n nnumrawat uɛlan aṭṭas. Ttakk°aḍen ar 400 alef deg wass. Deg yimalas i yiɛdan wwḍen nnumrawat ɣer ca 347 alef n imehlak deg wass deg umaḍal. Nettaf di tmura n Umarikan d Lhind, d nitnti d timura inḍerren s kuruna deg umaḍal qqae. Awern-as-tent dinni Arrusiya, Kulumbiya, Braẓil, Miksik, Piru, Arjuntin…
Site n "www.lerifain.fr" d ijjen uraq mani nettari s Tmaziɣt waha, dag-s ineɣmisen d merra mayen yeqqnen ɣer tira, aya d tizemmar zeg iḥudriyen maḥend Tmaziɣt n Arrif ad kid-s nennum di tira, ad yemɣar wagra-nnes n tira.

Lexmis i iɛeddan yessawel-iyi-d lberzidan di tilifun:
– Allo, Azul ay abibiḍ ! Ur k-yuɣ wara? Amek yella Muṭṭiḍ, Mectiṭuḥ, Lina, Aksil d wiyaḍ merra ?
– Ad fell-ak isal lxir ! I keč ? I la grippe-nni ?
– Tura, ça va mieux. Mačči am wussan-nni imezwura. Au fait, ssawleɣ-ak-d bac da waen nefkeɣ ttiɛad pour le Premier Novembre, ad nkemmel leqdic nneɣ.
– Ad nemcawar gar-neɣ, sakin ad ak-d-rreɣ s lexbar a mass Lberzidan. wellah ar d as-nniɣ ma testufaḍ akk aussan-agi !
– Acimi ?
– Tamettant n Qeddafi d wayen akk iḍerrun, ladɣa di tmura n waɛraben…
– Pas du tout ! Imi tenniḍ,
Qeddafi n’a que ce qu’il mérite: akka i tḍuru d win ur naɛrif. Zgiɣ qqareɣ-as “a wlidi, bezzaf tnecfeḍ. Yelha laɛqel…” Jami iḥess-iyi-d. Tura, twalaḍ si Zenga, zenga ar zigu, zigu, ad aɣ-yesser Rebbi.
– Amin !
– Ihi, akka ay abibiḍ lexbar ar ɣur-k. Slam-iw i twacult-ik d taddart-ik. ini-asen ḥemleɣ-ten aṭas, aṭas. Ini-asen daɣen belli d nutini i d iyi-ttaken lǧehd. Ɣef lǧalt-nsen i ckentḍeɣ ɣef ukursi. U mazal-yi qimeɣ fell-as, skud ur d iyi-teɣḍil ara la grippe.
– Neẓra akk ayen i d aɣ-txedmeḍ u neqquder sacrifice-nek ɣef taddart. Ula d nukni n ḥemmel-ik. Et c’est parce que nḥemmel-ik i nebɣa ad as-tserreḥeḍ i ukursi u ad d-delhuḍ cwiṭ d terwiḥt-ik, uqbel ma teɣḍel-ik la grippe.
Qim di lehna a mass Lberzidan ! slam-iw i twacult-ik.

Yeffeɣ-d udlis amaynut deg wussan-a, d ammud n tmedyazt ɣer Teẓrigin Baghdadi, sɣur yiwet n tmarut, tagi d Massa Zoulikha Issahnounen. D adlis amezwaru n tmarut ara d-yeffɣen ɣer unnar, ɣas akken aṭas-aya segmi tebda tira, u teṭṭef deg usirem n ussuffeɣ n udlis kra wass, dɣa d lebɣi-ines i tt-yessawḍen ɣer usirem-is. Ammud-a, tefka-as asentel “Tajeǧǧigt n yiḥulfan”. Deg-s 31 n yisefra, wwin-d ɣef waṭas n temsal d yisental yerzan tudert d tmetti, ad d-nebder gar-asen kra n yisental am « Tamazɣa, 
... 
unit, Amlelli ».
Ɣas akken Massa Issahnounen tuɣ-itent deg tezmert-is, maca lebɣi d leḥmala n tutlayt tayemmat, d tallelt i as-fkan kra seg wid yettarun, yeǧǧa-tt ad tefreḥ u ad tger iɣallen i tira, acku seg zik i tt-tettawi deg wul, ladɣa tira s / ɣef tmaziɣt d tudert qeṣṣiḥen i tettqabal di tmetti, ur nefki ara aṭas n wazal i umeɛḍur. Zoulikha Issahnounen, d yelli-s n temnaḍt n Uqbu, texdem kra n temliliyin i usuzer d usenɛet n udlis-is, ɣas di tallit-a iḥerṣen s waṭṭan i yurzen amaḍal.
Terza 
...
 wussan yezrin ɣer temdint n Tizi Uzzu anida i d-tella temlilit i d-yessemlalen kra n yimedyazen, gar-asen tella nettat, teɣra-d kra seg yisefra n wammud-is amezwaru, akken i tga asarag amecṭuḥ deg tzeqqa n Uxxam n yidles Mouloud Mammeri, diɣen tessenz kra n yidlisen s ubuddu. Nessaram afud igerrzen i yal win neɣ tin yewwin abrid n tira s tmaziɣt, akken yella deg wawal, « Yal win ara d-yessersen aẓru-ines, yettekki deg lebni n tutlayt n tmaziɣt, i yesran akk i yiɣallen n tarwa-s ».
Khaled Achoui

Tikta i nezmer a nessiked ɣur-s mi ara nɣer di Tira d tin n wassaɣ yellan ger Yillu d wemdan i d-ixleq. A nger tamawt ɣer yixf wis sin di “Laṣel n ddunit”, taseddart tis sebɛa. Degs a nwali, amek d-yemsel Yillu tafekka n wemdan seg uɣebbar n wakal. D acu kan, amdan mačči kan d tafekka i deg-s. Akken t-id yexleq, yefka-yas ula d tarwiḥt, nnefs n tudert, tigzi aked leɛqel. D talsa, temxallaf d iɣersiwen d ugama.
Lmasiḥ yusa-d ɣer ddunit i leslak n yemdanen. Yettwaḥbes yerna ḥekmen fell-as s lmut i
... 
ṛṛa di Lɛehd Aqdim deg-sent licarat yeɛnan Lmasiḥ. Win akken ara d-yasen d amsellek n ddunit. Tuggett n lenbeyya i d-yemmeslayen fell-as. Tuggett n “ymeɣaren n talsa” yellan di Tira, tudert-nsen d lecɣal-nsen d azamul d tiɣri n Lmasiḥ. Aṭas n tedyanin ɣef d-ttmeslayen Tira ara ɣ-d-ibanen am akken d “tidyanin n leslak”.
Amek i tettnerni teflest deg ul n yal amdan?
Azal amezwaru n liman d lmasiḥ s yiman-is. Yis ara yamen yal amdan yernu ad yessers lettkal-is deg-s, deg awal-is d laɛanaya-ines. Lim
...
fel-ines ɣef umidag, s ḥeggu-ines si ger lmegtin, i s-d-yewwi lḥal a namen, a nessers lettkal-nneɣ deg-s.
D adlis aqdim i d-uran iqeddacen n Dawed d yemyura nniḍen i yɛerḍen a d-snejmaɛn meṛṛa tiẓilla d ccnawi. D izlan i s icennun tayri n Ṛebbi d leslak-ines i d-yefka i wid yumnen yis, itteklen fell-as. Ar aas-a timezgidiwin meṛṛa deɛɛunt cennunt s “Ihellilen”. Tikta n ihellilen s umata, d taẓallit d leḥmadi. D aɛenni ɣer Yillu. Azal-nsen di Tira d alemmas. Sseǧhaden di liman rennun-as deg afud.

imazighn[edit]
Imaziɣen d imezdaɣ imzwura n tefriqt ugafa,tutlayt nsen d tamaziɣt, llan aṭas zeg-sen ass-a sawaln taɛrabt.
Imaziɣen ḥerren-d akal d ameqran, yewwet seg wemda n Siwa, deg Utaram (lɣerb) n Maṣer alamma alamma d Targa Zewwaɣen d M
... 
iḍen, tikwal sɛan kan akal d amecṭuḥ, tikwal bitt, cerken-t akk d yegduden nniḍen. Imaziɣen ttuneḥsaben d agdud n yiri (race) amellal, xas ma yella nettaf gar-asen aṭas n yimibriken d yiberkanen.
Aṭas n Yimaziɣen ay d-mazal la ttmeslayen tamaziɣt, yernu deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, aṭas n trebbaɛ timaziɣin ay d-yennulfan i wakken ad wwtent u ad ḥerzent tutlayt-nsent. Xas ma yella tantalyin (dialectes) ay ttmeslayen Yimaziɣen mxallafent si tama ɣer tayeḍ, maca kkant-d akk seg yiwen n uẓar, seg yi
...
ṭfen deg waṭas n wansayen (lɛaddat), ladɣa wid yettidiren di Merruk akk d Uneẓruf (ṣṣeḥra), d acu kan, ass-a, aṭas n wansayen imaziɣen ay yellan ɣef yiri n nnger, la ten-ttaǧǧan medden yernu ur d asen-ttgen ara leqrar. Nnig waya, ula d tutlayt tamaziɣt la tettuɣal ɣer deffir deg waṭas n tmiwa n Tmazɣa, medden la tt-ttaǧǧan, ilmeẓyen ur a ttlemmden ara, dɣa yessefk ad yettwaxdem kra n leqdic s lḥir i lmend n ussukkes n tutlayt di tmiwa-ya.
Ass-agi llan azal n 45 imelyan n imaziɣen g ddunit ilkul.

Tawilayt n Tizi Wezzu
Tawilayt n Tizi Wezzu d Tawilayt deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Zedɣen-tt 1 127 607 n yimezdaɣen. Ma d tajumma-ines tesɛa azal n 3 568 km². Tamanaɣt ines d tamdint n tzi Wezzu. Tawilayt-a tebḍa ɣef 21 n tdayriwin:
- Tadayra n Ɛin Lḥemmam (At Bu Yusef, Aṣqif n Ṭmana, At Yeḥya, Aqbil)
- Tadayra n Yiɛeẓẓugen (Iɛeẓẓugen, Friḥa, Ifiɣa, Iɛekkuren, Zekri)
- Tadayra n Uẓeffun (Aẓeffun, Aɣrib, Aqerru, At Cafaɛ)
- Tadayra n Wat Dwala (At Meḥmud, At Ɛisi, At Dwala, At Zmenzer)
- Tadayra n Wat Yenni (At Yanni, Ibudraren, Iɛeṭṭafen)
- Tadayra n Buɣni (Si Yusef, Buɣni, At Smaɛil, Amecras)
- Tadayra n Wat Wizgan (At Ziki, At Wizgan, At Yeǧǧer, Ilula Umalu)
- Tadayra n Draɛ Ben Xedda (Draɛ Ben Xedda, Sidi Neɛman, Tadmayt, Tirmitin)
- Tadayra n Draɛ Lmizan (Ɛin Zawiya, At Yeḥya Musa, Draɛ Lmizan, Frikat)
- Tadayra n Yiferḥunen (Iferḥunen, Imsuḥel, Illilten)
- Tadayra n Larebɛa Nat Yiraten (At Aggwaca, Irǧen, Larebɛa Nat Yiraten)
- Tadayra n Lemɛatqa (Lemɛatqa, Suq Letnin)
- Tadayra n Makuda (Buǧima, Makuda)
- Tadayra n Meqleɛ (At Xellili, Meqleɛ, Ṣṣwameɛ)
- Tadayra n Wat Wasif (Tamdint n At Bumehdi, At Tudert, At Wasif)
- Tadayṛa n Yiwaḍiyen (Iwaḍiyen, Agni n Yeɣran, At Buɛadu, Tizi n Tlata)
- Tadayra n Wat Wagnun (At Ɛisa Mimun, At Wagnun, Timizart)
- Tadayra n Tigzirt (Iflisen, Mizrana, Tigzirt)
- Tadayra n Tizi Ɣennif (Mkira, Tizi Ɣennif)
- Tadayra n Tizi Wezzu (Tizi Wezzu)
- Tadayra n Tizi Raced (At Umalu, Tizi Raced)

Deg wayen yerzan akman amuran deg uxxam, akman yerza tiwilayin n Udrar, Leɣwaṭ, Um Lebwaqi, Tabatent, Bgayet, Tibeskert, Beccaṛ, Leblida, Tubiret, Tibest, Tlemsan, Tizi Uzzu, Zzayer Tamaneɣt, Ǧiǧel, Sḍif, Ssɛida, Skikda, Sidi Belɛebbas, Ɛennaba, Galma, Qsenṭina, Mestɣanem, Tamsilt, Mɛeskeṛ, Waregla, Wehṛan, Lbeyyeḍ, Bumerdas, Ṭṭaref, Tinduf, Tisemsilt, Wad Suf, Tixencelt, Suq Ahṛas, Tipaza, Nnɛama, Ɛin Timucent, Taɣerdayt, Ɣilizan d Wlad Ǧellal.
Deg wayen yerzan tiddit n medden, ssaglen amesni amdinan d ubruzzlan gar twilayin deg tgara n yimalas gar akk tiwilayin ay yerza ukman.
Deg wayen yerzan aseɣzef n umdal, ad ttwamedlen wulzuzen n yimseddayen yettwanehṛen, tizeɣwa tikaddalin d tzeɣwa n waddal, ixxamen n yilemẓiyen d wammasen idelsanen.
Deg wayen yerzan imsegrawen inagduden, ttwagedlen yimsegrawen n wakk azunen, ula d imsegrawen iwaculanen n tmeɣriwin d useḍher.
Tizeɣwa n tmeɣriwin ur izerrken ara akat-a ad asent-tettwakkes tisemt i lebda.

D tacequft n umezgun i d-urar yiwet n terbaɛt n yelmeẓyen deg uxxam n yedles Ali Zamoum n tubiret iḍelli ass n 31 Meɣres. D tiddukla n tẓuri d umezgun « asayas» n tqerbust i tt-id-iheggan, tura-tt-id Nassima Benyoucef. Tacequft-a n umezgun tella-d i lmend n warrac. Tettmeslay-d ɣef ugama d useḥbiber ɣef tamnaṭ. Dɣa imeskaren-is ttwellihen iqrar imecṭaḥ i wakken ad ḥadren ɣef ayen akk i ɣ-d-yezzin.
Taoudiat Adel, dɣa d netta i-d-yefkan afus n lemɛawna deg usbeddi d uheggi n tcequft-a, yenna-d belli «taqsit-a n yiwet n teẓgi i yellan tecbeḥ, tesɛa isekla, isafen, agur, d wayen yeddren am yefrax, awtul …»
Ayaki akk yedder deg umnekni netta d wayen i s-d-yezzin deg ugama. Maca, seg akken ad d-yekcem ɣer-sen wemdan «Mimo», ad yessexreb yal taɣawsa, yerna ad yerreẓ amnekni-nni yellan gar ugama d wid yeddren deg-s. D yiwet n teqcict, m’i-d-tusa ɣer teẓgi-nni ara d-yerran icuddan d wayen yelhan gar teẓgi d wemdan segmi ad ttwellah win-a yesxerben agama d temnaṭ.
«Cbaḥa yettrun» d tacequft n umezgun i yettrebbin igerdan d warrac ɣef uḥemmel n tamnaṭ d ugama, i wakken ad tili tudert n wemdan tgerrez, w’ad d-tili di liser d tezmert d telwit.
Slimane Chabane

Kabyle(i)
1 Di tejmaɛt n temdint n Antyuc llan lenbiya d lɛulama : Barnabas, Semɛun ițusemman Aberkan, Lusyus n temdint n Qiṛwan, Manahen i d-ițțuṛebban d Hiṛudus Antibas, akk-d Caɛul.
2 Yiwen wass atmaten nnejmaɛen iwakken ad uẓummen yerna ad dɛun ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi. Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen yenna-yasen-d : Swejdet-iyi-d Barnabas akk-d Caɛul i ccɣel-nni iwumi i ten-heggaɣ.
3 Mi ẓummen, ssersen ifassen-nsen fell-asen, rnan dɛan ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi, dɣa ǧǧan-ten ad ṛuḥen.
4 Barnabas akk-d Caɛul i gceggeɛ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen
... 
as Sidna Ɛisa, Yeḥya ibecceṛ țțuba s weɣḍas n waman i wegdud n wat Isṛail.
25 Uqbel a t-ṭṭfen ɣer lḥebs iwakken a t-nɣen, Yeḥya yenna i lɣaci : Nekk ur lliɣ ara d win akken i tɣilem; lameɛna a d-yas deffir-i yiwen, ur uklaleɣ ara ad fsiɣ ula d lexyuḍ n warkasen-is.
26 Ay atmaten! Ay arraw n Sidna Ibṛahim d wid akk ițțaggaden Sidi Ṛebbi! I nukkni iwumi i d-ițțuceggeɛ wawal-agi n leslak.
27 Axaṭer imezdaɣ n temdint n Lquds d imeqqranen-nsen, ur fhimen ara d acu-t Ɛisa-agi, ur fhimen ara daɣen imes
...
n wat Isṛail feṛḥen mi slan s wannect-agi, țḥemmiden awal n Ṛebbi; wid akk yețțuheggan i tudert n dayem umnen.
49 Awal n Sidi Ṛebbi yețțubecceṛ di mkul amkan n tmurt.
50 Lameɛna at Isṛail sḥeṛcen imeqqranen n temdint akk-d d kra n tilawin timeṛkantiyin i gettabaɛen ddin n wat Isṛail; sekkren-d aqehheṛ ameqqran ɣef Bulus d Barnabas, ssufɣen-ten si tmurt-nsen.
51 Bulus d Barnabas zwin aɣebbaṛ n iḍaṛṛen-nsen, ṛuḥen ɣer temdint n Ikunyum.
52 Ma d inelmaden ijdiden, ččuṛen d lfeṛḥ akk-d Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.

Agʷjjim iga yan umudr iṣḍaṛn g tawja n imḥrurdn nɣd iqqjdar. Unuɣ abṛṛani nns irwas bahra adinuẓuṛ nɣd aɣuchaf mẓẓin, ar tlkkm tiɣzi nns iɣ imqqur ar 75 cm, d ar ttinin imzdaɣn n tniri zund imaziɣn itargin: mas gis llan kigan n ibɣurn i tfgga n ufgan, ɣikan af-at gʷmmrn d ar t cttan.
Unuɣ n umudr ad ittuẓla s ugayyu nns igan amkṛaḍ d tfgga nns imẓẓin d ils nns izurn, amma acṭṭab nns izur macc ar ittisdid imikk s imikk ar ixf nns, d ula tafgga nns tzur d tdus.
Iṭṭaf umudr n ugʷjjim smmus iḍuḍan ɣ ku aḍaṛ s ibbackaṛn imsadnin, amma aklu nns iga gr uzgzaw d uqqhwi nɣd abrɣdi d g uɛrur nns kra n tbkkatin tiqqhway immrksn d uwraɣ, d imi nns iṭṭaf uxsan msadnin idusn, d ucṭṭab nns gis kra n 23 n igʷyya n ilm gan zund ɣɣʷilli illan g uɛrur n uɣuchaf, d ad ur nttu mas iṭṭaf takayt n iẓṛi idusn d umussu urmiḍ. Ar ittddr iqqjdr n ugʷjjim g tniri n yiẓẓlmḍ n tfṛiqt d uslallu aɛṛab ar iṛan.

Azzul, ad sreḥbeɣ yissek gar-aneɣ.
Wikipedia d asenfaṛ n tsanayt s tutlayt n Teqbaylit, la tt-yettarun d imdanen am keč d nek. Ass-a, s twizi n waṭas n yemdanen si akk Tamazɣa, Wikipedia s Teqbaylit deg-s 2,899 n yimagraden. Ma tebɣiḍ at ɛiwneḍ ula d keč, wali dagi. Ma tesɛiḍ isteqsiyen, fkiten-d dagi.
Tella daɣen tektabt s tutlayt n Tefṛansist ɣef Wikipedia it zemreḍ ad tilicarjiḍ sagi. Ssarameɣ aɣ d-tefkeḍ afus !
